Content:
路透上海7月1日 - 中國上海復星醫藥（集團）股份有限公司<600196.SS><2196.HK>周四晚公告稱，擬分拆控股孫公司以色列Sisram赴港首次公開發行（IPO）並上市。
    
    公告稱，本次上市主體為Sisram或本次擬為分拆Sisram而新設的一家公司，發行規模不少於Sisram擴大後股本的25%，其中包括新股以及老股東可能出售的老股。此次，承銷商將獲得發行股數15%的超額配售權。　

    此次募集資金將用於技術研究及新產品開發，市場擴張及品牌推廣，償還Sisram的銀行及股東或關聯方貸款，補充Sisram運營資金，收購兼並等。
    
    公告稱，復星醫藥全資子公司Ample Up Limited及控股子公司Chindex Medical　Limited間接持有Sisram共計約66.2%股份。Sisram持有Alam Lasers公司約95.3%股權，後者是Sisram主要業務和資產來源，主要從事醫療美容器械的設計、開發、生產及銷售。
    
    截止去年底，Sisram凈資產為3,254.5萬美元，去年公司實現營收1.1億美元，淨利796萬美元。
    
    2013年5月，復星醫藥子公司能悅公司、Chindex Medical及復星-保德信中國機會基金三家聯手透過Sisram這家專為收購成立的主體，以2.22億美元收購以色列醫療美容器械公司Alam Lasers公司約95.2%股權。其中三家收購方出資1.48億美元，其餘部分由Sisram通過銀行貸款解決。
    
    復星醫藥A股周四收報19.02元，過去一個月累計上漲2.04%。（完）

 (發稿 林琦; 審校 曾祥進)
 ((路透中文新聞部:+86-21-61041787;傳真 86-21-61041728 ;qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai July 1 - China Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical (Group) Co.,Ltd. <600196.SS> <2196.HK> It was announced on Thursday night that it planned to spin off Sisram, the controlling subsidiary of a controlling Israeli subsidiary, in going to Hong Kong for an initial public offering (IPO) And the market.
    
    The announcement said the main body of this listing is Sisram or the new company to be proposed for the spin-off of Sisram, with a size of not less than 25% of the expanded share capital of Sisram, including new shares and old shares that may be sold by old shareholders. This time, the underwriters will receive an over-allotment of 15% of the shares in issue. The company is located in:

    The proceeds will be used for technical research and new product development, market expansion and branding, repayment of Sisram's banks and shareholders or related loans, replenish Sisram working capital, mergers and acquisitions and so on.
    
    According to the announcement, Ample Up Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Fosun Pharma, and Chindex Medical Limited, a controlling subsidiary, indirectly held approximately 66.2% of Sisram's shares. Sisram holds approximately 95.3% equity interest in Alam Lasers, which is Sisram's principal business and asset source and is principally engaged in the design, development, production and sale of medical beauty devices.
    
    As of the end of last year, Sisram net assets of 32.545 million US dollars last year, the company achieved revenue of 110 million US dollars, net profit of 7.96 million US dollars.
    
    In May 2013, Fosun Pharma subsidiary Nintendo, Chindex Medical and Fosun-Prudential China Opportunities Fund jointly joined hands with Alam Lasers, an Israeli medical and beauty equipment company for $ 222 million, through Sisram, a privately held entity. Approximately 95.2% of the equity. Three of the acquirers contributed $ 148 million and the rest were settled by Sisram through bank loans.
    
    Fosun Pharma A stock closed at 19.02 on Thursday, up 2.04% over the past month. (Finish)

 (Press Lin Qi; Review Zeng Xiang)
 (Reuters Department of Public Information: + 86-21-61041787; Fax 86-21-61041728; qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中港個股：復星醫藥擬分拆以色列孫公司Sisram赴港上市

Content:
路透香港7月4日 - 中國主要的投資集團--聯想控股<3396.HK>周一稱，將發行總額不超過35億元人民幣第一期公司債券，募資以償還有息債務。
    
    據公告，聯想控股將於7月6-8日向合格投資者發行公司債券，其中，基礎發行規模為20億元及擬超額配售規模不超過15億元。
    
    本期債券包括期限五年和十年，初始預設基礎發行規模各為10億元及預設超額配售規模7.5億元，兩個債券品種間可進行相互回撥。
    
    債券按固定利率發行，五年期品種票面利率預設區間為2.9-3.9%，十年期品種票息區間為3.8-4.8%。債券主承銷商為銀河證券和中金公司，信用評級機構聯合信用對聯想控股及本期債券均授予AAA評級。
    
    聯想控股此前向中國證監會申請發行總額不超過100億元公司債券，期限不超過15年，可分期發行。[nL4T18V3HO]
    
    該股周一早盤收跌0.11%，報18.3港元。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0704/LTN20160704726_C.pdf)
    

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 曾祥進)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 4 - China's major investment group - Legend Holdings <3396.HK> said on Monday it will issue a total of not more than 3.5 billion yuan of the first phase of corporate bonds to raise funds to repay interest-bearing debt.
    
    According to the announcement, Legend Holdings will issue corporate bonds to qualified investors from July 6 to July 8, of which the basic issuance will be 2 billion yuan and the proposed over-allotment will not exceed 1.5 billion yuan.
    
    The bonds include a period of five years and ten years. The initial default basic issuance size is one billion yuan and the default over-allotment size is 750 million yuan. Mutual calls can be made between two types of bonds.
    
    The bonds are issued at a fixed interest rate. The pre-set coupon rate for the five-year variety ranges from 2.9 to 3.9%, while the coupon rate for the 10-year variety ranges from 3.8 to 4.8%. The lead underwriter is Galaxy Securities and China International Capital Corporation Limited, credit rating agency Credit Union granted Lenovo Ratings and the current bond AAA rating.
    
    Legend Holdings previously applied to the China Securities Regulatory Commission to issue a total amount of not more than 10 billion corporate bonds, the term of not more than 15 years, can be issued in installments. [nL4T18V3HO]
    
    The stock closed 0.11% lower at 18.3 Hong Kong dollars earlier in the day. (Finish)
    
    To view a statement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0704/LTN20160704726_E.pdf)
    

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Zeng Xiang)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：聯想控股將發行總額不超過35億元人民幣首期公司債券

Content:
路透北京/新加坡7月4日 - 中國政府最新發放的2016年第三輪成品油出口配額較上年同期高出79%。
    
    今年的出口配額總規模已較去年前三輪配額總和高出一倍多。
    
    消息人士周一稱，中國已向煉廠發放608.5萬噸的第三輪成品油出口配額。至此今年前三輪配額總計已超過4,000萬噸，高於上年同期的1,900萬噸，因為中國今年已批準獨立煉廠，即所謂的“茶壺”(teapot)煉油廠出口成品油。
    
    今年第三輪配額低於此前第二輪的1,450萬噸以及第一輪的2,090萬噸。
    
    汽油在第三輪出口配額中占據較大比重，為244萬噸，儘管2月以來亞洲汽油供應過剩，但這仍低於第二輪的320萬噸以及第一輪的440萬噸。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL4N19Q1Y5]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 劉秀紅；審校 于春紅)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING / SINGAPORE July 4 - The third-round export quota of refined oil products released by the Chinese government in 2016 was 79% higher than the same period of last year.
    
    The total size of export quotas this year has more than doubled as compared with the sum of the three rounds quotas of last year.
    
    Sources said on Monday that China had issued a quota of 6,085,000 tons of the third round of refined oil export to the refinery. As of this year, the first three rounds of quotas total more than 40 million tons this year, up from 19 million tons in the same period of last year because China has approved an independent refinery this year, the so-called "teapot" refinery to export refined oil.
    
    The third round of quotas this year is lower than the previous round of 14.5 million tons and the first round of 20.9 million tons.
    
    Gasoline accounted for a large share of the third round of export quotas at 2.44 million tons. Despite the oversupply of gasoline in Asia since February, it is still below the 3.2 million tons in the second round and 4.4 million tons in the first round. (Finish)

    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nL4N19Q1Y5] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Liu Xiuhong; revision in Chunhong)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國能源：2016年第三輪成品油出口配額較上年同期高出79%

Content:
路透香港7月5日 - 知名投行中國國際金融股份有限公司<3908.HK>稱，該公司與中投證券就戰略合作及業務機會進行探討，惟目前處於非常初步階段。
    
    中金公司周一晚間在聯交所的聲明並稱，兩間公司並未達成任何意向或訂立任何具約束力的協議。
    
    “此外，致力於不斷優化業務結構，本公司將繼續積極發掘合作機會，並與業內優質企業進行廣泛商討。”公司指出。
    
    此前彭博報導，中金與中投證券就可能的併購事宜正在商談。
    
    中金周一收報11.96港元，過去一個月累計跌逾2%。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/SEHK/2016/0704/LTN201607042457_C.pdf)

 (記者 雷美珍；審校)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 5 - Well-known investment bank China International Capital Corporation Limited (3908.HK) said the company and CIC Securities discussed the strategic cooperation and business opportunities, but is at a very preliminary stage.
    
     China International Capital Corporation Limited said in a statement on the Stock Exchange on Monday evening that the two companies did not reach any intention or enter into any binding agreement.
    
    "In addition, with its commitment to continuous optimization of its business structure, the Company will continue to actively explore opportunities for cooperation and hold extensive discussions with quality enterprises in the industry," the company said.
    
    Earlier, Bloomberg reported that China International Capital Corporation Limited and CIC Securities were discussing possible mergers and acquisitions.
    
     China International Capital Corporation Limited closed at HK $ 11.96 on Monday, down more than 2% in the past month. (Finish)
    
    To view a statement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/SEHK/2016/0704/LTN201607042457_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; revision)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：中金確認與中投證券探討戰略合作及業務機會，惟非常初步

Content:
路透香港7月5日 - 中國發電設備生產及電站工程服務商--哈爾濱電氣<1133.HK>周二稱，該公司獲得迪拜一項清潔燃煤電站EPC（設計-採購-施工）合同，總金額為23.5億美元。
    
    據公告，合同方分別是哈爾濱電氣之附屬公司哈爾濱電氣國際工程與Hassyan Energy Phase 1 P.S.C.，項目為迪拜Hassyan 2400MW清潔燃煤電站。
    
    哈爾濱電氣早盤初段一度漲近3%，報2.96港元。香港時間09:44，該股升1.39%，大市恆生指數<.HSI>則跌0.98%。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽於香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0705/LTN20160705050_C.pdf)
    
    

 (記者 雷美珍；審校)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 5 - China Power Equipment Manufacturing and Power Plant Service Provider - Harbin Electric <1133.HK> said on Tuesday that it was awarded EPC (Design-Procurement-Construction) contract for a clean coal-fired power station in Dubai for a total amount of 23.5 billion US dollars.
    
    According to the announcement, the parties to the contract are Harbin Electric International Engineering and Hassyan Energy Phase 1 P.S.C.,respectively, a subsidiary of Harbin Electric and the Hassyan 2400MW coal-fired power station in Dubai.
    
    Early in the morning, Harbin Electric rose nearly 3% to HK $ 2.96. At 09:44 a.m.,the counter rose 1.39%. Hang Seng Index Hang Seng Index <.HSI> dropped 0.98%. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0705/LTN20160705050_E.pdf)
    
    

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; revision)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：哈爾濱電氣獲得迪拜清潔燃煤電站EPC合同，金額23.5億美元

Content:
路透香港7月6日 - 中國黃金開採商--紫金礦業<2899.HK><601899.SS>周三表示，公司正籌劃非公開發行A股，其A股將自周四（7日）起停牌。
    
    紫金礦業此前曾籌劃非公開發行A股，擬集資不超過90億元人民幣。但公司在今年4月底表示，監於去年下半年以來市場發生較大變化，決定終止發行A股事宜。
    
    公司今天的聲明未有透露此次擬集資的規模，公司表示，在A股停牌期間，將就相關事項及具體方案進行論證，盡快確定是否進行上述重大事項，並按照上交所的有關要求，于A股停牌之日起的10個上交所交易日內公告非公開發行A股進展情況。
    
    紫金礦業H股今天逆市收高4.07%，報2.81港元；其A股亦漲5.75%，收報3.68元人民幣。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布于香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/SEHK/2016/0706/LTN20160706846_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 曾祥進)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 6 - Chinese gold miner - Zijin Mining <2899.HK> <601899.SS> said on Wednesday that it is planning a non-public offering of A shares and its A shares will be suspended on Thursday (July 7) .
    
    Zijin Mining had previously planned non-public offering of A shares, to be raised no more than 9 billion yuan. However, the company said at the end of April this year that it has decided to terminate the issue of A shares due to the significant market changes in the second half of last year.
    
    The company's statement today did not disclose the scale of the proposed fund-raising, the company said that during the suspension of A shares, the relevant issues and specific programs will be demonstrated as soon as possible to determine whether the above major issues, and in accordance with the relevant requirements of the Shanghai Stock Exchange, A Shares suspended from the date of the 10 Shanghai Stock Exchange trading day notice of non-public offering of A shares progress.
    
    Zijin Mining H share today against the market closed up 4.07% to 2.81 Hong Kong dollars; its A shares also rose 5.75% to close at 3.68 yuan. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement of a listed company on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/SEHK/2016/0706/LTN20160706846_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revisers Zeng Xiang)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中港個股：紫金礦業擬捲土重來增發A股，A股股份明天起停牌

Content:
**明報**
    --銀河娛樂<0027.HK>副主席呂耀東接受澳門媒體訪問時表示，銀河第三、四期項目發展計劃將於今年底或明年初動工；公司在發展新的項目時，亦會主攻中場，並且涵蓋家庭及會展客，期望引進一、兩項蒙地卡羅的元素到澳門的項目。
    --僅集資1億港元的香港商業物業發展商星星地產<1560.HK>，據初步統計公開發售超購逾500倍，已穩坐今年新股“超購王”第五位。
    
    **星島日報**
    --馬雲“愛股”瑞東<0376.HK>發盈警，指今年上半年虧損將擴大3倍，估計超過2.2億港元，而去年則蝕5,218萬港元。
    --受惠油價下跌的上海石油化工<0338.HK><600688.SS>發盈喜，預期截至6月底止上半年淨利將增長70%-90%，至29.43-32.89億元人民幣，因產品平均售價下降幅度小於原材料價格下降幅度，毛利增加。
    
    **蘋果日報**
    --彭博引述消息人士指，新濠國際<0200.HK>及新濠博亞<MPEL.O>聯合營運的新濠影�正計劃本季度加設三個貴賓廳，由太陽城集團及德晉集團負責營運，安排內地賭客到貴賓廳及向他們提供貸款。
    --據券商國泰君安預計，今年底內地銀行的不良貸款餘額將達2.1萬億元人民幣，信託業不良資產規模達4,700億元，非金融企業不良資產規模達6.3萬億元，並預計今年不良資產處置規模達約1.5萬億元。
    
    **東方日報**
    --保誠<2378.HK>近日發出通知，下月起客戶如以銀聯卡繳付續保保費，需收取1.2%行政費，且中介人不能代客繳付。
    --標準普爾將領展<0823.HK>的評級展望由負面上調至穩定，重申其長期企業信貸評級為A，以反映公司嚴守財務紀律，以及其業務在零售淡市中具彈性。（完）
    
    注：以上的評論僅為摘要，並且不代表路透立場。

 (整理 雷美珍；審校 林高麗)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
**Ming Pao**
    - Galaxy Entertainment <0027.HK> Vice Chairman Lv Yiu Tung said in an interview with the media in Macau that the Galaxy III and Phase IV projects will start construction by the end of this year or early next year. When developing new projects, the company will also focus on the midfield, Covering family and convention visitors, looking forward to introducing one or two Monte Carlo elements to the Macau project.
    - HK $ 100 million fund-raising Hong Kong commercial property developer Star Land <1560.HK>, which surpassed No. 5 in this year's new share, Super King, according to an initial statistics of a 500-fold oversubscription of the open offer.
    
    ** Sing Tao Daily **
    - Ma Yun "Love Share" Rwanda <0376.HK> issued a profit warning, which means the loss in the first half of this year will be tripled to an estimated more than 220 million Hong Kong dollars, compared with 52.28 million Hong Kong dollars last year.
    - Shanghai Petrochemical (0338.HK) <600688.SS, which benefited from the drop in oil prices, issued a positive profit alert and expects net profit for the first half of June to grow 70% -90% to RMB29.43-32.89bn as of the end of June, The average selling price is less than the decline in the price of raw materials, margin increased.
    
    ** Apple Daily **
    - Bloomberg quoted sources as saying that MELCO INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT LIMITED, a joint venture between MELCO INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT LIMITED (<0000.HK>) and MELCO INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT LIMITED (<MPEL.O>), is planning to add three lounges this quarter , Operated by Sun City Group and the Deutsche Bank Group, arranged for mainland gamblers to visit the VIP lounge and provide loans to them.
    According to Guotai Junan, a brokerage, the non-performing loan balance of mainland banks will reach 2.1 trillion yuan by the end of this year, the non-performing assets of the trust industry will reach 470 billion yuan, the non-financial assets will reach 6.3 trillion yuan and the non-performing assets of this year The scale of disposal reached about 1.5 trillion yuan.
    
    ** Oriental Daily News **
    - Prudential (2378.HK) recently issued a circular. Starting from next month, customers will be charged 1.2% administrative fee if they pay the renewal premium with UnionPay card, and the intermediary can not pay on behalf of the customer.
    - Standard & Poor's downgrade CRBC's rating outlook from negative to stable, reiterating its long-term corporate credit rating of A to reflect the company's strict financial discipline and its flexibility in light retail markets. (Finish)

Title: 《香港報摘》--其他報紙重要消息7月7日

Content:
路透香港7月7日 - 近日股市波動，中國大型券商東方證券<3958.HK><600958.SS>周四稱，其價值78億港元香港IPO在面向散戶的公開發售部分未獲得足額認購，國際配售部分則錄得適度超額。
    
    東方證券於6月20日即英國公投當周開始招股，在9.57億股發售股份之中，公開發售占7.5%，國際配售占92.5%。
        
    據公告，公開發售部分錄得0.96倍認購，相當於整個IPO比重7.18%，國際配售部分則獲得適度超額認購。經由國際配售補足後，東方證券如期明天（8日）在聯交所掛牌上市。
    
    一般情況之下，如果IPO面對嚴重認購不足，很大機會會擱置或推遲其上市計劃。
    
    東方證券IPO最終以原區間中低端的每股8.15港元定價，按9.57億股發售H股計集資78億港元；若扣除8,700萬股原有股東出售舊股，上市公司實際籌70.9億港元。
    
    該公司獲得10名基礎投資者認購共4.5億股股份，占IPO比重47%，相當於上市後股本7.32%。這些基礎投資者包括環能國際<1102.HK>執行董事祝立家私人持有的紅佳金融、交行<3328.HK><601328.SS>旗下交銀國際投資、東航國際、上海電氣集團、上實集團、惠理<0806.HK>等等。
    
    香港時間09:54，東方證券A股升0.7%，報17.23元人民幣。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.iporesults.hkex.com.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0707/03958_2670268/C102.PDF)
    

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 7 - Recently the stock market volatility, China's major brokerage Orient Securities <3958.HK> <600958.SS> said on Thursday that its HK $ 7.8 billion Hong Kong IPO in the retail-oriented part of the public offering has not been fully subscribed, International placing part recorded a modest excess.
    
    Orient Securities on June 20 that the British referendum week began to offer shares, among the 957 million offer shares, the public offering accounted for 7.5% of the international placement accounted for 92.5%.
        
    According to the announcement, the public offering partially recorded a subscription of 0.96 times, equivalent to 7.18% of the entire IPO, while the international placement was partially over-subscribed. Completed by the International Placing, Orient Securities will be listed on the Stock Exchange as scheduled tomorrow (8th).
    
    Under normal circumstances, if the IPO face serious lack of subscription, a great opportunity to shelve or delay its listing plan.
    
    Dongfang Securities IPO was eventually priced at HK $ 8.15 per share at the mid-range and low-end of the original range and HK $ 7.8 billion was raised at HK $ 957 million for H shares. Except 87 million shares sold by existing shareholders, the listed company actually raised HK $ 7.09 billion.
    
    The company received a total of 10 basic investors to subscribe for a total of 450 million shares, accounting for 47% of the IPO, representing 7.32% of the issued share capital. These foundations include BOCHL International <1102.HK> Executive Director Zhu Lijia, privately-held Hong Jia Financial, Bank of Communications International <3328.HK> <601328.SS>, CEIEC, Shanghai Electric Group, Group, Value Partners <0806.HK> and many more.
    
    At 09:54, Hong Kong time, Orient Securities A shares rose 0.7% to 17.23 yuan. (Finish)

 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters

Title: 香港新股：東方證券稱公開發售認購不足額，國際配售則適度超額

Content:
路透北京7月7日 - 中國股市滬綜指周四震盪近收平。分析師指出，今日大盤出現較大幅震盪，股指連漲數日後在3,000點上方出現獲利盤回吐，目前雖較前期出現溫和放量，但量能水平仍不足以支持權重板塊連續上漲，短線料仍震盪蓄勢。
    
    滬綜指<.SSEC>收報3,016.85點，跌0.44點或0.01%，上證A股今日成交2,698億元人民幣，上日為2,462億元。    
    
   “今天我覺得就是休整一下，因為已經連著漲了幾天了，存在一個休整回調的需求。”山西證券策略分析師麻文宇稱。
    
    她並認為，短期市場情緒仍是主導行情的關鍵因素，但大盤進一步上攻缺乏政策或經濟數據改善等實質性利好支撐。近日有關軍工板塊的政策和事件較多，刺激該板塊前期表現較強，短期獲利回吐壓力較大，導致今日價格出現明顯回調。    
    
    繼昨日成交爆出天量後，今日萬科A<000002.SZ>低開低走，最終收跌4.95%，昨日入市搶籌資金悉數被套。 
    
    萬科<2202.HK>大股東深圳鉅盛華周三繼續在二級市場上增持股票。據萬科周三晚間公告，鉅盛華及其一致行動人前海人壽保險（合稱寶能系）共持有萬科A股27.6億股，占公司總股本的25%。[nL4T19T01C]
    
    中航電子<600372.SS>收跌2.53%，中航機電<002013.SZ>收跌4.72%。
    
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>收報3,209.95點，跌0.21%,；滬深300指數期貨主力7月合約<CIFN6>收盤報3,185.6點，漲0.25%，成交12,262手。130億元額度的滬股通<.NQUOTA.SH>凈賣出1.76億元。（完） 

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, July 7 - The Shanghai Composite ended shaken nearly flat on Thursday. Analysts pointed out that today's broader market appeared more volatile, the stock index rose even more days after 3,000 points in the profit taking took the lead, although the previous moderate moderate heavy volume, but the level of energy is still not enough to support the continuous rise of weight plate, short-term expected Still shocked.
    
    Shanghai Composite Index <SSE> closed at 0.44 points or 0.01% at 3,016.85. Shanghai A-shares traded 2,698 billion yuan today, up from 2,462 billion yuan last day.
    
   "Today I think it is a break, because it has been linked up for a few days, there is a need for a break callback." Ma Wenyu Shanxi Securities strategist said.
    
    She also believes that the short-term market sentiment is still the key factor leading the market, but the broader market further upside lack of substantive good support such as policy or economic data improvement. In recent days, there are many policies and incidents concerning the military sector, which have stimulated the earlier performance of the sector to exert greater pressure on short-term profits and take-backs, resulting in a clear correction in prices today.
    
    Following the yesterday's turnover burst the amount of days after today Vanke A <000002.SZ> Dikaigaozou, eventually closing down 4.95%, yesterday, the market grab funds raised all quilt.
    
    Vanke <2202.HK> Shenzhen Jushenghua, the major shareholder, continued to increase its holdings in the secondary market on Wednesday. According to Vanke's announcement on Wednesday night, Gushenghua and its acting person Qianhai Life Insurance Co.,Ltd. (collectively, the "Department") held a total of 2.76 billion shares of Vanke, accounting for 25% of the total share capital of the Company. [nL4T19T01C]

    The CSI 300 Index closed at 3,209.95 points, down 0.21%. The main contract of the CSI 300 Index closed at 3,185.6 points, up 0.25% at 12,262 contracts. 13.0 billion of the amount of the Shanghai Stock Connect net sales of 176 million yuan. (Finish)

Title: 中國股市：滬綜指震盪近收平，短線連續上漲後獲利回吐壓力加大

Content:
路透北京7月8日 - 中國證監會周五表示，已完成對丹東欣泰電氣股份有限公司<300372.SS>涉嫌欺詐發行及信息披露違法違規案的調查工作，深交所將對欣泰電氣啟動退市程序，且根據相關規定，欣泰電氣不可重新上市。發行人股份將被採取凍結或限制減持措施；承銷券商興業證券<601377.SS>5.5億元人民幣先行賠付。  
    
    中國證券網報導稱，證監會已對欣泰電氣及相關當事人作出了行政處罰及市場禁入決定，並已對相關中介機構採取調查，對興業證券和興華會計師事務所發送了行政處罰事先告知書，對東易律師事務所還在調查中。
    
    欣泰電氣公告稱，證監會認定欣泰電氣首次公開發行股票並在創業板上市申請文件中相關財務數據存在虛假記載；上市後披露的定期報告中存在虛假記載和重大遺漏。決定對欣泰電氣責令改正，給予警告，並處以832萬元罰款；對董事長溫德乙和劉明勝給予警告，並分別處以892萬元和60萬元罰款。對兩人採取終身證券市場禁入措施，終身不得從事證券業務或擔任上市公司董事、監事、高級管理人員職務。
    
    公司股票將於7月12日開市起復牌，交易三十個交易日後，預計於8月23日開市起停牌，深交所在公司股票停牌後十五個交易日內作出是否暫停股票上市的決定。自7月12日起欣泰電氣股票復牌交易的三十個交易日期間，證券簡稱將調整為“*欣泰”，證券代碼不變，股價的日漲跌幅限制比例不變。
    
    對此，溫德乙表示，由於身背6.26億元的巨額債務，公司退市後，將不得不走破產程序。
    
    興業證券亦公告稱，證監會對公司給予警告，沒收保薦業務收入1,200萬元，並處以2,400萬元罰款；沒收承銷股票違法所得2,078萬元，並處以60萬元罰款。對蘭翔、伍文祥給予警告，並分別處以30萬元罰款，撤銷證券從業資格。此外，擬對兩人分別採取10年證券市場禁入措施。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, July 8 - The China Securities Regulatory Commission said on Friday that it has completed its investigation of suspected illegal issuance and disclosure of information disclosed by Dandong Xintai Electric Co.,Ltd.,and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange will start the operation of Xintai Electric Delisting procedures, and according to the relevant regulations, Xintai Electric can not be re-listed. The issuer's shares will be frozen or restricted reduction measures; underwriting brokerage Industrial Securities <601377.SS> 550 million yuan first line payment.
    
    China Securities Network reported that the Commission has Xintiao Electric and related parties have made administrative penalties and market forbidden decision, and has been to investigate the relevant intermediaries, Industrial Securities and Xinghua Certified Public Accountants sent a notice of administrative punishment in advance , Dongyi law firm is still under investigation.
    
    Xintai Electric said in a statement that CSRC found Xintai Electric's initial public offering of shares and that the relevant financial data in the GEM application file contain false records. There are false records and material omissions in the periodic reports disclosed after the listing. Xintai Electric Co.,Ltd. decided to order correction, give a warning and impose a fine of 8.32 million yuan; warned Chairman Wende B and Liu Ming-sheng and imposed a fine of 8.92 million yuan and 600,000 yuan respectively. Lifelong securities market for the two people to take measures to stay for life can not engage in securities business or as a listed company directors, supervisors, senior management positions.
    
    The company's shares will resume trading after the market opens on July 12. After trading for 30 trading days, it is expected to suspend its trading on the market opened on August 23, and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange will decide whether to suspend its listing within 15 trading days after the shares of the company are suspended. Since July 12, Xintai Electric shares resumed trading transactions during the 30 trading days, the short name will be adjusted to "* Xintai," the same stock code, the daily price limit the percentage change in the same limit.
    
    In this regard, Wende B said that as a result of a huge debt of 626 million yuan, the company delisting, will have to go bankruptcy proceedings.
    
    Industrial Securities also announced that the Commission warned the company to confiscate 12 million yuan income from sponsorship business and imposed a fine of 24 million yuan; confiscation of underwriting illegal gains of 20.78 million yuan, and impose a fine of 600,000 yuan. On Lan Xiang, Wu Wenxiang give a warning, and respectively impose a fine of 300000 yuan, cancel the qualification of securities practitioners. In addition, it is proposed to impose a 10-year ban on securities markets separately for both. (Finish)

 (Posted Zhang Xiaoguang; review Zeng Xiang Jin)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國個股：證監會對欣泰電氣啟動強制退市程序，不可重新上市

Content:
路透香港7月8日 - 中國房地產商--龍湖地產<0960.HK>周五公布，其間接附屬公司重慶龍湖企業拓展有限公司將於下周向合資格投資者發行第三期境內公司債券，基礎規模20億元，並可超額配售最多17億元。
    
    龍湖地產的聲明稱，第三期境內公司債券分為五年期及七年期兩個品種，票面利率詢價區間分別為3-4%及3.3-4.3%。最終票面利率將於7月14日根據簿記建檔結果確定。
    
    公司表示，發債所得資金在扣除費用後，將全部用於調整債務結構。

    信用評級公司中誠信證券評估對發行人重慶龍湖及第三期債券給予�AAA�評級。
    
    龍湖地產今天微幅收低0.1%，報9.86港元，過去一個月及三個月分別跌約1.5%及12%。（完）

 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 8 - Chinese real estate developer - Longfor Properties <0960.HK> announced on Friday that its indirect subsidiary, Chongqing Longhu Enterprise Development Co.,Ltd.,will issue the third domestic corporate bonds to eligible investors next week, 2 billion yuan, and can be over-allotment of up to 1.7 billion.
    
    Long Lake real estate statement said the third period of domestic corporate bonds are divided into five-year and seven-year two varieties, coupon rate range of 3-4% and 3.3-4.3% respectively. The final coupon rate will be determined on July 14 based on the bookkeeping results.
    
    The company said all proceeds from the debt issue will be used to adjust the debt structure after deducting fees.

    CCB Credit Rating Company Ratings Assigned 发AAA  to Issuer Chongqing Longhu and No. 3 Bonds.
    
    Long Lake real estate fell slightly 0.1% today, to 9.86 Hong Kong dollars in the past month and three months fell about 1.5% and 12%. (Finish)

Title: 香港個股：龍湖地產境內附屬擬發行公司債券，總規模高至37億元人民幣

Content:
(更正末段光大控股管理資�總額為�逾490億港元�)
    路透香港7月8日 - 中國金融控股企業--光大控股<0165.HK>周五宣布，旗下人民幣夾層基金近日成功入股希望教育，雙方並簽署了全面戰略合作協議。此外，希望教育將考慮在合適的時間引入其他專業投資機構以及籌備上市工作。
    
    光大控股的新聞稿稱，擬通過與希望教育�強強聯手�，提高希望教育的資本運作水平，�其未來的跨越式發展進一步助力。
    
    �此次光大控股投資希望教育，是在國家大力發展職業教育的背景下，與中國品牌教育機構合作的先例。�光大控股執行董事兼首席執行官陳爽稱。
    
    他指出，光大控股過往有很多通過金融資本推動�業發展的成功案例，本次合作有利於推動希望教育的加速發展，進一步拓展光大控股在內地發展的領域，助推中國教育�業的發展。

    希望教育組建於2007年，目前發展�擁有西南交通大學希望學院、貴州財經大學商務學院、山西醫科大學晉祠學院等三所本科學院，四川天一學院、四川文化傳媒職業學院、四川希望汽車職業學院、貴州應用技術職業學院等四所高職學院，以及一所技師學院、七所中職（技工）學校、一所中小學、若干培訓學校的綜合性教育集團，所屬院校在校學生規模超過10萬人。

    截至2015年底，光大控股管理資�總額逾490億港元。（完）

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 林高麗)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))

    Reuters Hong Kong, July 8 - China Everbright Limited (0165.HK), the financial holding company in China, announced on Friday that its RMB mezzanine fund has successfully invested in Hope Education recently and both parties have signed a comprehensive strategic cooperation agreement. In addition, it is hoped that education will consider introducing other specialized investment institutions and preparations for listing at the right time.
    
     China Everbright Limited's press release said it intends to enhance the capital operation of Hope Education through further cooperation with Hope Education, and further boost its future leaps and bounds.
    
       China Everbright Limited invests hope education in the background of vigorously developing vocational education in the country and cooperates with Chinese brand education institutions. Chen Shuang, Executive Director and Chief Executive Officer, China Everbright Limited.
    
    He pointed out that China Everbright Limited has a lot of success stories of promoting the development of its industry through financial capital in the past. This cooperation is conducive to accelerating the development of hope education and further expanding the field of China Everbright Limited's development in the Mainland to boost the development of education in China development of.

    Hope that the education was established in 2007, the current development of   owns Hope College of Southwest Jiaotong University, Guizhou University of Finance and Economics Business College, Jinci College Shanxi Medical University, three undergraduate colleges, Sichuan Tianyi College, Sichuan Cultural Media Vocational College, Sichuan Hope Automobile Vocational College , Guizhou Vocational and Technical College and other four vocational colleges, as well as a technician college, seven secondary vocational (mechanic) schools, a primary and secondary schools, a number of training schools, a comprehensive education group, affiliated institutions in school students than the scale 10 million people.

    As of the end of 2015, China Everbright Limited has a total management capital of more than HK $ 49 billion. (Finish)

 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 更正-香港個股：光大控股入股希望教育，後者考慮合適時間籌備上市

Content:
(新增深交所評論)
    路透北京7月8日 - 中國證監會周五表示，已完成對丹東欣泰電氣股份有限公司<300372.SS>涉嫌欺詐發行及信息披露違法違規案的調查工作，深交所將對欣泰電氣啟動退市程序，且不可重新上市，並稱將密切關注有關公司的市場傳聞，加強股票交易的實時監控。承銷券商興業證券<601377.SS>已出資5.5億元人民幣設立先行賠付專項基金。  
    
    證監會微博新聞稿稱，證監會已對欣泰電氣及相關當事人作出了行政處罰及市場禁入決定，並已對相關中介機構採取調查，對興業證券和興華會計師事務所發送了行政處罰事先告知書，對東易律師事務所還在調查中。
    
    證監會將對欺詐發行相關責任人所持首次公開發行股票前股份採取凍結或限制減持措施，並關注相關股東在欣泰電氣立案後減持股份行為的合規性，督促欣泰電氣管理層履行勤勉忠實義務，確保欣泰電氣正常生產經營，對首發剩餘募集資金進行專戶監控，並將對欣泰電氣採取出具警示函、記入誠信檔案等措施。
    
    欣泰電氣公告稱，證監會認定欣泰電氣首次公開發行股票並在創業板上市申請文件中相關財務數據存在虛假記載；上市後披露的定期報告中存在虛假記載和重大遺漏。決定對欣泰電氣責令改正，給予警告，並處以832萬元罰款；對董事長溫德乙和劉明勝給予警告，並分別處以892萬元和60萬元罰款。對兩人採取終身證券市場禁入措施，終身不得從事證券業務或擔任上市公司董事、監事、高級管理人員職務。
    
    公司股票將於7月12日開市起復牌，交易三十個交易日後，預計於8月23日開市起停牌，深交所在公司股票停牌後十五個交易日內作出是否暫停股票上市的決定。自7月12日起欣泰電氣股票復牌交易的三十個交易日期間，證券簡稱將調整為“*欣泰”，證券代碼不變，股價的日漲跌幅限制比例不變。
    
    對此，溫德乙表示，由於身背6.26億元的巨額債務，公司退市後，將不得不走破產程序。
    
    興業證券亦公告稱，證監會對公司給予警告，沒收保薦業務收入1,200萬元，並處以2,400萬元罰款；沒收承銷股票違法所得2,078萬元，並處以60萬元罰款。對蘭翔、伍文祥給予警告，並分別處以30萬元罰款，撤銷證券從業資格。此外，擬對兩人分別採取10年證券市場禁入措施。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
(Added by Shenzhen Stock Exchange)
    Reuters BEIJING, July 8 - The China Securities Regulatory Commission said on Friday that it has completed its investigation of suspected illegal issuance and disclosure of information disclosed by Dandong Xintai Electric Co.,Ltd.,and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange will start the operation of Xintai Electric Delisting procedures, and can not be re-listed, saying it will pay close attention to the company's market rumors and strengthen real-time monitoring of stock transactions. Underwriters Societe Generale Securities <601377.SS> has invested 550 million yuan to set up special compensation fund.
    
    CSRC Weibo press release said that the SFC has made administrative punishments and market forbidden decisions to Xintai Electric and related parties and has conducted investigations on relevant intermediaries and sent administrative penalties to Industrial Securities and Xinghua Certified Public Accountants in advance Notice, Dongyi law firm is still under investigation.
    
    CSRC will freeze or restrict the reduction of shares held before the initial public offering of shares held by the responsible person for the fraud issue and pay attention to the compliance of the relevant shareholders in reducing shares after Xintai Electric filed the case and urge the management of Xintai Electric to perform Diligence and faithful obligation to ensure the normal production and operation of Xintai Electric, the first remaining funds raised to monitor the special account, and Xintai Electric will issue a warning letter, credit records credited and other measures.
    
    Xintai Electric said in a statement that CSRC found Xintai Electric's initial public offering of shares and that the relevant financial data in the GEM application file contain false records. There are false records and material omissions in the periodic reports disclosed after the listing. Xintai Electric Co.,Ltd. decided to order correction, give a warning and impose a fine of 8.32 million yuan; warned Chairman Wende B and Liu Ming-sheng and imposed a fine of 8.92 million yuan and 600,000 yuan respectively. Lifelong securities market for the two people to take measures to stay for life can not engage in securities business or as a listed company directors, supervisors, senior management positions.
    
    The company's shares will resume trading after the market opens on July 12. After trading for 30 trading days, it is expected to suspend its trading on the market opened on August 23, and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange will decide whether to suspend its listing within 15 trading days after the shares of the company are suspended. Since July 12, Xintai Electric shares resumed trading transactions during the 30 trading days, the short name will be adjusted to "* Xintai," the same stock code, the daily price limit the percentage change in the same limit.
    
    In this regard, Wende B said that as a result of a huge debt of 626 million yuan, the company delisting, will have to go bankruptcy proceedings.
    
    Industrial Securities also announced that the Commission warned the company to confiscate 12 million yuan income from sponsorship business and imposed a fine of 24 million yuan; confiscation of underwriting illegal gains of 20.78 million yuan, and impose a fine of 600,000 yuan. On Lan Xiang, Wu Wenxiang give a warning, and respectively impose a fine of 300000 yuan, cancel the qualification of securities practitioners. In addition, it is proposed to impose a 10-year ban on securities markets separately for both. (Finish)

 (Posted Zhang Xiaoguang; review Zeng Xiang Jin)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 更新版 1-中國個股：證監會對欣泰電氣啟動強制退市程序，不可重新上市

Content:
* 亞航考慮在香港二次上市--消息
    * 考慮在中國成立合資公司，面向快速發展的城市
    * 儘管擔憂經濟，但認為北亞等地區增長空間廣闊
    * 英國航空展之前，與空客談判增訂飛機

    路透英國范堡羅7月10日 - 消息人士周日表示，亞洲航空(AirAsia)<AIRA.KL>正考慮在香港二次上市，這是該公司發展成為泛亞洲低價航空公司計劃的一部分，該公司也將在中國成立合資公司。
    
    消息人士在英格蘭范堡羅航空展前夕表示，亞航還在考慮購進更多飛機，以滿足北亞等地區的強勁需求。
    
    亞航計劃成立一家得到中國國企支持的企業，以開發迅速增長的中國二三線城市的出行需求。該公司是亞洲最大低價航空集團，關聯公司已經遍布東南亞。
    
    亞航聯合創始人暨首席執行官Tony Fernandes周日在推特(Twitter)上暗示亞航可能進行二次上市，但未提及上市地點，並暗示將購買新的飛機。
    
    “在考慮擴大輔助性收入、增大運載能力以及二次上市，”他說。
    
    一名消息人士稱，亞航在與中資銀行及潛在股東進行磋商，其中包括中國光大銀行。
Content_EN:
* AirAsia to consider second listing in Hong Kong - News
    * Consider establishing a joint venture in China for the fast-growing city
    * Despite concerns about the economy, they think there is room for growth in North Asia and other regions
    * Before the British Air Show, negotiations with Airbus to upgrade the aircraft

    Reuters, UK Farnborough, July 10 - The source said on Sunday that AirAsia <AIRA.KL> is considering a second listing in Hong Kong as part of its plan to become a pan-Asia low-cost airline, The company will also set up a joint venture in China.
    
    On the eve of the Farnborough Air Show in England, the source said AirAsia is still considering buying more aircraft to meet the strong demand in North Asia and other regions.
    
    AirAsia plans to set up a business supported by Chinese state-owned enterprises to develop the rapidly growing travel demand in China's second and third tier cities. The company is Asia's largest low-cost aviation group, affiliates have been all over Southeast Asia.
    
    AirAsia co-founder and chief executive officer Tony Fernandes hinted on Twitter on Tuesday that AirAsia may go public twice without mentioning the place of listing and hoping to buy a new plane.
    
    "In considering expanding secondary income, increasing the carrying capacity and secondary listing," he said.
    
    A source said AirAsia was negotiating with Chinese banks and potential shareholders, including China Everbright Bank.
Title: 《獨家新聞》亞航考慮在香港二次上市，並擴大北亞業務

Content:
路透北京7月11日 - 中國股市滬綜指周一小幅收升。分析師指出，今日大盤衝高回落，近期經濟數據舒緩了市場對通脹的憂慮，對市場投資積極性提供一定支撐。但目前量能未能持續放大，存量資金主導下的大盤運行節奏較遲緩，成長股出現回落，顯示本輪板塊輪動或將告一段落，3,000點整數關口壓力有待持續消化。    
    
    滬綜指<.SSEC>收報2,994.917點，漲6.823點或0.23%。上證A股今日成交2,679億元人民幣，上日為2,094億元。    
    
   “技術面上，3,000點整數關口的壓力相對比較大。”首創證券策略分析師書邵帥稱。
    
    他並認為，周末公布經濟數據對市場流動性和預期的穩定提供了條件，同時CPI數據給貨幣政策提供了空間。當前經濟數據穩中偏好，上市公司業績逐漸恢復，價值股投資安全性偏高，市場資金向估值相對合理的績優股湧入。
    
    國家統計局周日公布，6月居民消費價格指數(CPI)<CNCPI=ECI>同比上漲1.9%，重回“1”時代的CPI舒緩了市場對通脹的憂慮。6月工業生產者出廠價格指數(PPI)<CNPPI=ECI>同比下降2.6%；但依然是2014年10月以來最小降幅。[nL4T19W02W]      
    
    今日有色金屬、煤炭、食品板塊領漲大盤，紫金礦業<601899.SS>、馳宏鋅鍺<600497.SS>漲停報收。      
    
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>收報3,203.33點，漲0.35%,；滬深300指數期貨主力7月合約<CIFN6>收盤報3,176.6點，跌0.02%，成交15,212手。130億元額度的滬股通<.NQUOTA.SH>凈買入15.93億元。（完） 

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, July 11 - The Shanghai Composite rose slightly on Monday. Analysts pointed out that the market finished lower today, the recent economic data to ease the market's concerns about inflation on the market to provide some support for investment enthusiasm. However, the current volume can not continue to enlarge, the stock market-driven slowdown in the capital market, growth stocks fell, indicating that this round of plate rotation or will come to an end, the pressure of 3,000 integer points to be continued digestion.
    
    Shanghai Composite <SSE> closed at 2,994.917 points, up 6.823 points or 0.23%. Shanghai A-shares traded 2,679 billion yuan today, up from 209.4 billion yuan last day.
    
   "Technically, the pressure of the 3,000-point integer is relatively high." Shao Shuai, the first securities strategist, said.
    
    He also believes that the release of economic data on the weekend provided the conditions for market liquidity and the expected stability, while the CPI data provided room for monetary policy. The current economic data is stable, the performance of listed companies is gradually restored, the safety of value-added shares is relatively high, the market capitalization is relatively reasonable valuation of the inflow of blue-chip stocks.
    
    National Bureau of Statistics announced on Sunday that in June the consumer price index (CPI) <CNCPI = ECI> rose 1.9% from the same period of last year. The CPI back to "1" erased the market's concerns about inflation. June PPI <CNPPI = ECI> fell 2.6% YoY in June, but still the smallest decline since October 2014. [nL4T19W02W]
    
    Today, non-ferrous metals, coal, food sector led the broader market, Zijin Mining <Chihiro Zinc and Germanium <600497.SS> daily limit close.
    
    The Shanghai and Shenzhen 300 Index <.SI3> closed at 3,203.33 points, up 0.35%. The main CUS-HSI contract for July CSI300 closed at 3,176.6 points, down 0.02% and traded 15,212 contracts. A total of 1.593 billion yuan was bought by the Shanghai Stock Exchange with a total amount of 13.0 billion yuan (.NQUOTA.SH). (Finish) 

 (Posted Zhang Xiaoguang; review Zeng Xiang Jin)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國股市：滬綜指衝高回落小幅收升，3,000點整數關口壓力有待持續消化

Content:
路透台北7月12日 - 台灣股市周二盤中升逾0.5%至近四個月高位，追隨美股和亞洲其他股市的漲勢。
    
    0201GMT，加權股價指數<.TWII>漲0.42%或36.87點至8,823.34點，稍早一度漲0.6%至3月21日以來高位。上日該指數收升1.7%。
    
    電子類指數<.TELI>和金融保險類指數<.TFNI>均漲約0.6%。

    亞股在兩個半月高位附近持堅，上日美股創紀錄高位，因美國數據樂觀以及預期各國實行更多刺激措施。
    
    鴻海<2317.TW>微升0.7%，此前該公司發布6月銷售業績。(完)

Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei July 12 - Taiwan stocks gained more than 0.5% to near four-month highs on Tuesday, following gains in the US and other Asian markets.
    
    0201GMT. Weighted Share Index <.TWII> gained 0.42% or 36.87 points to 8,823.34 points, up 0.6% from the morning high since March 21. The index closed up 1.7% on the previous day.
    
    Electronic index <.TELI> and financial and insurance index <.TFNI> both rose about 0.6%.

    Asian shares held steady near two-and-a-half highs. US stocks hit a record high last day as optimism was expected from the U.S. data and more stimulus measures were expected from various countries.
    
    Hon Hai <2317.TW> edged up 0.7% after the company released its June sales. (Finish)

Title: 台灣股市：盤中觸及近四個月高位，電子和金融類股上揚

Content:
路透北京7月12日 - 中國股市滬綜指周二收升1.8%，創近三個月新高。分析師指出，今日大盤早盤略有回調後獲得支撐，午後震盪高走，市場風格明顯切換，二線藍籌股成為帶動大盤走強的主力，中藥、家電板塊領漲；在權重板塊帶動下，場內人氣也有所回升，近期滬綜指面臨3,100點附近的籌碼密集區域，多空雙方或在此位置進行爭奪。     
    
    滬綜指<.SSEC>收報3,049.38點，漲54.46點或1.82%，此前收盤高點為4月15日的3,078.12點；上證A股今日成交2,862億元人民幣，上日為2,679億元。    
    
   “市場想要做出把行情持續下去的努力，然後就做一些風格上的切換。”光大證券策略分析師徐沛東稱。
    
    他並認為，次新股作為此前龍頭板塊，經過連漲後已處於高位，短期上漲勢頭減弱，市場集中資金去拉抬部分前期滯漲板塊。另外，近期國企改革提速超市場預期，同時洪災對大宗商品價格形成支撐，市場對供給側改革造成的供給收縮預期逐漸加強，刺激煤炭、鋼鐵等周期股價格出現回升。
    
    國家主席習近平近日指出，要以推進供給側結構性改革為主線，有力、有度、有效落實好“三去一降一補”重點任務；引導好發展預期，用穩定的宏觀經濟政策穩定社會預期，用重大改革舉措落地增強發展信心。[nB9T18H05U]    
    
    美的集團<000333.SZ>、葵花藥業<002737.SZ>、新光藥業<300519.SZ>漲停報收，青島海爾<600690.SS>收漲9.29%。
    
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>收報3,273.18點，漲2.18%,；滬深300指數期貨主力7月合約<CIFN6>收盤報3,262點，漲2.05%，成交15,305手。130億元額度的滬股通<.NQUOTA.SH>凈買入18.2億元。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, July 12 - The Shanghai Composite rose 1.80% on Tuesday, hitting a nearly three-month high. Analysts pointed out that today's broader market recovered slightly after a slight rebound in early trading, the shock went high in the afternoon and the market style was clearly switched. Second-tier blue chips became the main force driving the broad market strength. Chinese medicine and home appliances sectors led the gains. Under the weight plate, Also picked up. Recently, the Shanghai Composite Index is facing 3,100 chip-intensive areas near the long and short sides or in this position for contention.
    
    Shanghai Composite Index <SSE> closed at 3,049.38 points, up 54.46 points or 1.82%, after closing at 3,078.12 points on Apr.15. Shanghai A-share traded at 288.22 billion yuan today, compared with 2,679 billion the previous day.
    
   "The market wants to make efforts to keep the market going, and then do some style switching," said Xu Peidong, a strategist at Everbright Securities.
    
    He also believes that the sub-new shares as the leading plate, after rising even after it has been at a high level, the short-term upward momentum weakened, the market concentrated funds to lift part of the previous stagflation plate. In addition, the recent reform of state-owned enterprises is expected to speed up the super market, meanwhile, floods support commodity prices. The market is expected to gradually reduce the supply contraction caused by the supply-side reform and stimulate the prices of cyclical stocks such as coal and steel to rebound.
    
    President Xi Jinping recently pointed out that it is necessary to vigorously, effectively and effectively implement the key tasks of "reducing the burden of going three by one by one" in order to promote supply-side structural reforms. We should guide our development expectations and stabilize the society with stable macroeconomic policies It is expected that the development of confidence will be enhanced with the implementation of major reform initiatives. [nB9T18H05U]
    
     Midea Group Co.,Ltd. <000333.SZ>, Sunflower Pharmaceutical <002737.SZ>, Shin Kong Pharmaceutical <300519.SZ> daily limit close, Qingdao Haier <600690.SS> closed up 9.29%.
    
    The CSI 300 Index closed at 3,273.18 points, up 2.18%. The main contract for July CSI300 Index closed at 3,262 points, up 2.05% and traded 15,305 lots. A total of RMB1.82 billion was bought by the Shanghai Stock Exchange of RMB13.0 billion. <NQUOTA.SH> (Finish)

Title: 中國股市：滬綜指收升1.8%創近三個月新高，市場風格轉向二線藍籌股

Content:
路透香港7月12日 - 中國水泥及房地產商--北京金隅股份有限公司<2009.HK><601992.SS>周二稱，預計公司上半年度淨利同比將增加60-80%，主要因房地產板塊結算收入增加令盈利上升。
    
    這與此前一些在港上市的水泥生產商預期上半年淨利將倒退甚至虧損的情況迥異。[nL4T19U2VD]
    
    北京金隅的聲明稱，期內水泥熟料綜合銷量約2,060萬噸，同比增加20.5%；混凝土銷量約590萬立方米，同比升13.7%；房地產結轉面積約72.7萬平方米，同比增加82.7%。
    
    該公司，去年上半年的淨利為10.48億元人民幣。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布于香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0712/LTN20160712647_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 林高麗)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 12 - Cement and real estate developer - Beijing BBMG Corporation Ltd. <2009.HK> <601992.SS> said on Tuesday that it expects the company's first half net profit will increase 60-80% YoY, mainly due to the real estate sector Earnings rise due to higher settlement income.
    
    This is not the case with some cement producers listed in Hong Kong before the first half of this year is expected to reverse or even loss of profit. [nL4T19U2VD]
    
    Beijing Jinyu statement said the cement clinker sales during the period of about 20.6 million tons, an increase of 20.5%; concrete sales of about 5.9 million cubic meters, up 13.7%; real estate carry-over area of ​​about 727,000 square meters, an increase of 82.7 %.
    
    The company's net profit for the first half of last year was 1.048 billion yuan. (Finish)

Title: 中港個股：北京金隅料上半年淨利同比增60-80%，受房地產結算收入增加帶動

Content:
路透香港7月13日 - 香港政府周三宣布，一幅位於新界大埔白石角的住宅土地，由信和置業<0083.HK>以16.22億港元的出價中標，略高於市場預期。
    
    該幅土地位於白石角科研路（大埔市地段第228號），最高可建樓面面積約41.25萬平方尺，此前四家測量師行對該土地估值介乎14-15.3億港元，最後由信和置業以最高出價，擊敗其餘16個財團奪得。以中標價計，相當於每平方尺樓面地價3,932港元。
    
    此外，地政總署宣布，同於上周五（8日）截標的位於新界葵涌大連排道商業用地，由第一房屋發展有限公司以7.59億港元中標，高於市場預期。該土地最高可建樓面面積約12.35萬平方尺。此前四家測量師行對該土地估值介乎5.56-6.79億港元，截標當日共接獲14份標書。以中標價計，相當於每平方尺樓面地價6,145港元。（完）

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 林高麗)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Hong Kong, July 13 - The Hong Kong government announced on Wednesday that a residential land at Pak Shek Kok, Tai Po, New Territories, was won by Sino Land <0083.HK> for a bid of HK $ 1,622 million, slightly above market expectations.
    
    The site is located at Research Road, Pak Shek Kok (Tai Po Town Lot No. 228) with a maximum gross floor area of ​​about 41.25 million square feet. Previously, the four surveyors valued the site at HK $ 1,415.3 billion. Finally, By letter and home buyers with the highest bid to beat the remaining 16 consortia won. At the winning price, it is equivalent to HK $ 3,932 per sq. Ft.
    
    In addition, the Lands Department announced that its commercial property located in Dalian Passage of Kwai Chung, Kwai Chung, New Territories, which was closed on Friday (August 8), was successfully bumped by First Hong Kong Development Company Limited (HKTB) for a total consideration of HK $ 759 million from the market expectation. The land can be built up to a maximum floor area of ​​about 123,500 square feet. Four surveyors previously assessed the land from HK $ 556 million to HK $ 679 million and received a total of 14 bids on the tender closing date. At the winning price, it is equivalent to HK $ 6,145 per sq. Ft. (Finish)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revising Lin Korea)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港房地產：信和置業以16.22億港元中標大埔白石角住宅土地，略超市場預期

Content:
路透北京7月15日 - 中國證監會周五公布的2016年證券公司分類結果顯示，今年大部分證券公司級別為B類，且沒有證券公司獲得AAA的最高級別，僅方正證券<601901.SS>一家級別為C。中國最大券商--中信證券股份有限公司<600030.SS><6030.HK>級別為BBB。
    
    刊登在證監會網站的新聞稿稱，證券公司分為A（AAA、AA、A）、B（BBB、BB、B）、C（CCC、CC、C）、D、E等5大類11個級別。A、B、C三大類中各級別公司均為正常經營公司，其類別、級別的劃分僅反映公司在行業內風險管理能力的相對水平。D類、E類公司分別為潛在風險可能超過公司可承受範圍及被依法採取風險處置措施的公司。 
    
    新聞稿並稱，證券公司分類結果不是對證券公司資信狀況及等級的評價，而是證券監管部門根據審慎監管的需要，以證券公司風險管理能力為基礎，結合公司市場競爭力和合規管理水平，對證券公司進行的綜合性評價，主要體現的是證券公司合規管理和風險控制的整體狀況。
    
    新聞稿還表示，證監會根據證券公司分類結果對不同類別的證券公司在行政許可、監管資源分配、現場檢查和非現場檢查頻率等方面實施區別對待的監管政策。分類結果主要供證券監管部門使用，證券公司不得將分類結果用於廣告、宣傳、營銷等商業目的。今年125家公司中，有30家公司按規定與其母公司合併評價。    
    
    欲瀏覽全部結果，點選證監會網站 http://www.csrc.gov.cn/pub/newsite/zjhxwfb/xwdd/201607/t20160715_300788.html（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 林高麗)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING July 15 - According to the classification results of the securities companies in 2016 released by the CSRC on Friday, most of the securities companies this year are classified as Class B without the highest level of access to AAA by securities companies, with only Founder Securities <601901.SS> One level is C. China's largest brokerage - CITIC Securities Co.,Ltd. <600030.SS> <6030.HK> BBB level.
    
    The press release published on the website of the CSRC said that the securities companies are divided into 11 levels of 5 categories: A (AAA, AA, A), B (BBB, BB, B), C (CCC, CC, C) . A, B, C three categories of companies in all categories are normal operating companies, the classification of the level of division of the company only reflects the relative level of risk management capabilities in the industry. Class D and Class E companies are those companies whose potential risks may exceed the Company's acceptable range and are respectively subject to risk disposal measures.
    
    The press release also said that the classification result of securities companies is not an assessment of the credit status and rating of securities companies. Instead, securities regulatory authorities, based on the needs of prudential supervision and based on the risk management capabilities of securities companies, combined with the market competitiveness and compliance management of the Company The comprehensive evaluation of securities companies mainly reflects the overall status of compliance management and risk control of securities companies.
    
    The press release also said that according to the classification results of securities companies, the CSRC conducts differentiated supervision policies on different types of securities companies in respect of administrative licensing, regulatory resource allocation, on-site inspection and off-site inspection frequency. Classification results are mainly used by securities regulatory authorities, and securities companies shall not use the classification results for commercial purposes such as advertising, publicity and marketing. Of the 125 companies this year, 30 are evaluated in accordance with the regulations of their parent company.
    
    To view the full results, click on the SFC website at http://www.csrc.gov.cn/pub/newsite/zjhxwfb/xwdd/201607/t20160715_300788.html

 (Posted Zhang Xiaogu; revising Lin Korea)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國證券：證監會公布2016年證券公司分類結果，僅方正證券一家級別為C

Content:
路透奧斯陸7月15日 - 挪威歐普拉軟件(Opera Software)<OPERA.OL>周五表示，公司將在周一早間說明是否達到了中國財團提出的12.4億美元收購要約的所有條件。
    
    當周二歐普拉表示交易尚未獲得監管部門批準時，這筆交易是否能推進招致懷疑。收購要約的最後期限周五(7月15日)。
    
    “我仍無法提供任何細節，但我可以說，要約的截止期限是今天奧斯陸股市收盤時間，我們一定會在市場周一開盤前發出聲明，”歐普拉的投資者關係主管Petter Lade對路透表示。
    
    提出收購要約的財團成員包括奇虎360科技有限公司<QIHU.N>、北京昆侖萬維科技股份有限公司<300418.SZ>。該要約已在5月獲得歐普拉股東的同意，目前在等待中國和美國監管當局的批準。
    
    尚不清楚目前中美監管當局的審批情況。美國外資審議委員會(CFIUS)的審批截止日是周五。
    
    歐普拉股價周五收低1.64%，奧斯陸股市指標股指<.OSEBX>為上漲0.21%。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL8N1A12BY]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 白雲; 審校 王興亞)
 ((yun.bai@thomsonreuters.com; 86-010-66271012; Reuters
Messaging: yun.bai.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Oslo July 15 - Norway's Opera Software <OPERA.OL> said on Friday that it will state Monday morning whether it has met all the conditions for a $ 1.24 billion tender offer by the Chinese consortium.
    
    When Oprah said Tuesday the deal has not been approved by regulators, the deal is pushing for any doubt. The tender offer deadline Friday (July 15).
    
    "I still can not give any details, but I can say that the deadline for the offer is today's Oslo closing, and we will certainly make a statement before the market opens on Monday," Petter Lade, head of investor relations at Oprah, told Reuters.
    
    Consortium members that made the takeover offer include Qihoo 360 Technology Co.,Ltd.,Beijing Kunlun Wanwei Technology Co.,Ltd. <300418.SZ>. The offer, which was approved by Oprah shareholders in May, is awaiting the approval of China and the U.S. regulatory authorities.
    
    It is unclear what the current regulatory authorities in China and the United States are approving. The approval deadline for the U.S. foreign affairs review committee (CFIUS) is Friday.
    
    Oprah shares closed down 1.64% on Friday, while the Oslo index rose 0.21%. (Finish)

    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nL8N1A12BY] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Baiyun; revising Wang Xingya)
 ((yun.bai@thomsonreuters.com; 86-010-66271012; Reuters
Messaging: yun.bai.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 企業併購：挪威歐普拉軟件周一將說明中國財團提出的收購能否繼續

Content:
路透香港7月18日 - 中國互聯網巨頭騰訊控股在考慮尋求35億美元貸款用於收購，這將再次考驗銀行業對於科技產業的風險偏好。最近幾個月，已經有多筆數十億美元的融資案。
    
    騰訊這次尋求聯貸是為了收購芬蘭手機遊戲公司Supercell Oy。該公司只有190名員工，但開發的四款遊戲每款都有上億玩家。
    
    騰訊將出資86億美元，收購84.3%的股權，其中包括日本軟銀集團轉讓的72.2%股權。這將創下全球最大的遊戲產業併購案之一，也是騰訊迄今最大的一筆收購。
    
    之前亞洲銀行業已經對中國的科技、媒體和電訊產業建立大量曝險。去年12月以來，中國電商巨頭阿里巴巴、搜索公司百度和騰訊總共從離岸市場獲得了128.9億美元的五年期到期一次性償還貸款。
    
    其中僅騰訊一家就獲得了68.9億美元貸款。
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 18 - Tencent, a Chinese Internet giant, is considering seeking a $ 3.5 billion loan for the acquisition, which will again test the banking industry's risk appetite for the technology industry. In recent months there have been billions of dollars in financing.
    
    Tencent this time looking for a loan to buy Finnish mobile game company Supercell Oy. The company has only 190 employees, but each of the four titles developed has hundreds of millions of players.
    
    Tencent will invest 8.6 billion U.S. dollars to acquire 84.3% of the shares, including 72.2% of the shares transferred by Japan's Softbank Group. This will set the world's largest game industry mergers and acquisitions one of the largest acquisition so far is Tencent.
    
    Prior to that, Asian banking has set a massive exposure to China's technology, media and telecommunications industries. Since December last year, China's e-commerce giant Alibaba, search companies Baidu and Tencent have received a total of 128.9 billion five-year one-off repayments from the offshore market.
    
    Only Tencent alone won a loan of 6.89 billion U.S. dollars.
Title: 《路透基點特寫》騰訊尋求35億美元貸款，收購芬蘭手游公司Supercell

Content:
路透香港7月18日 - 國際對沖基金Elliott Capital周一稱，已對東亞銀行<0023.HK>及其若干董事提起有關不公平損害行為的訴訟，因後者在公司治理方面有嚴重缺陷。
    
    Elliott在其網站的聲明指出，作為東亞銀行股東，已經根據《公司條例》（第622章）第724條，在香港針對東亞銀行以及東亞銀行的多數董事，其中包括東亞銀行行政總裁兼主席李國寶，提起有關不公平損害的訴訟。
    
    Elliott持有東亞銀行7%的股份，為第四大股東。該基金此前促請東亞以溢價賣盤的方式為股東創造合理價值，惟遭到東亞董事會拒絕。東亞銀行為香港五間本地系統重要性銀行之一。（完）
    

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 18 - International hedge fund Elliott Capital said on Monday that it had filed a lawsuit against Bank of East Asia <0023.HK> and several of its directors about unfair prejudice, which has serious flaws in corporate governance.
    
    Elliott's statement on its website states that as a shareholder of BEA, most directors in Hong Kong against BEA and BEA already under section 724 of the Companies Ordinance (Cap. 622), including Li Guo Bao, Chief Executive and Chairman of The Bank of East Asia , Filed a lawsuit about unfair damages.
    
    Elliott holds a 7% stake in Bank of East Asia as the fourth largest shareholder. The fund had previously urged East Asia to create reasonable value for its shareholders by selling at a premium, but was rejected by the board of directors in East Asia. The Bank of East Asia is one of five local systemically important banks in Hong Kong. (Finish)
    

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：對沖基金ELLIOTT向東亞銀行及若干董事提起不公平損害訴訟

Content:
路透香港7月20日 - 香港交易及結算所（港交所）<0388.HK>行政總裁李小加周三稱，倫港通的實施需要香港、倫敦與歐盟三地市場的監管機構討論，英國脫歐後港交所如何與歐盟監管機構跟進出現了新的不確定性。
    
    李小加在其網誌中表示，“我們目前正在等待政策進一步明朗，再做下一步推進。”
    
    港交所去年開始籌備的倫港通，更直接連接LME（倫敦金屬交易所）與香港期貨交易所，計劃初步將集中於買賣及結算LME產品，為內地合格境內個人投資者（QDII2）參與LME市場提供便利。
    
    英國公投的結果給全球金融市場都帶來了不小的震動，未來英國如何脫歐、何時脫歐目前還存在很大的不確定性。
    
    李小加指出，英國離開歐盟，對港交所旗下LME的影響比較有限，因為LME的金屬交易是全球性的，且交易基本以美元計價，因此有信心維持LME系統和市場的正常運作。
    
    此外，英國脫歐亦不會影響港交所實施其他的商品戰略。
    
    “我們目前正積極爭取在內地設立LME認證的交割庫，以降低內地實體企業參與國際金屬交易的成本，服務實體經濟，”他說，“也正在積極推進前海大宗商品現貨交易平台的建設，促進內地大宗商品市場的實體化。”（完）
    
    參看相關細節，可點選網址(http://www.hkex.com.hk/chi/newsconsul/blog/160720blog_c.htm)

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 20 - Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEx) <0388.HK> Chief Executive Officer Lee Siu-kay said on Wednesday that the implementation of Lun Kong would require discussions from regulators in Hong Kong, London and the EU markets, After the departure of Europe, how the HKEx followed up with the EU regulatory authorities, there was a new uncertainty.
    
    In his blog, Li Xiaojia said: "We are currently waiting for the policy to be further clarified and the next step forward."
    
    Hong Kong Stock Connect, which was started by SEHK last year, has a direct connection with LME (London Metal Exchange) and Hong Kong Futures Exchange. The initial plan will be to buy and sell LME products and to settle LMEs for eligible domestic individual investors (QDII2) Market to facilitate.
    
    The result of the British referendum has brought no small shock to the global financial markets. In the future, Britain will withdraw from Europe and there is still great uncertainty about when to go there.
    
    Li Xiaojia pointed out that the departure of the UK from the European Union will have a more limited impact on the LME under the HKEx because LME metal trading is global and the transaction is basically denominated in U.S. dollars so it is confident that the normal operation of the LME system and the market will be maintained.
    
    In addition, the Brexit from Britain will not affect the implementation of other commodity strategies by the Exchange.
    
    "We are now actively seeking to establish a LME-certified delivery warehouse in the Mainland to reduce the costs of physical enterprises in the Mainland in participating in international metal trading and to serve the real economy," he said. "We are also actively promoting the construction of the Qianhai Commodity Commodity Trading Platform, Promoting the Substantial Transformation of the Commodity Market in the Mainland. "(End)
    
    See the relevant details, you can click on the URL (http://www.hkex.com.hk/eng/newsconsul/blog/160720blog_c.htm)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：倫港通需要與歐盟討論，英國脫歐帶來不確定性--港交所CEO

Content:
路透上海7月21日 - 中國大型房企萬科<000002.SZ><2202.HK>周四公告稱，將由公司及合作方共同組成的有限合夥制基金的子公司收購黑石集團<BX.N>及其他獨立第三方所持有的特定商業地產公司的股權。本次交易不涉及萬科的任何證券發行，也未就本次交易進行任何有關發行或收購本公司股份的談判。
    
    公告稱，近日，有限合夥制基金組成的聯合收購平台與相關方簽訂了上述交易的最終交易文件，交易完成後，聯合收購平台將持有目標公司96.55%股權，萬科擬投向聯合收購平台合計投資額約為38.89億元人民幣。
    
    萬科表示，此次交易將可以快速提升本公司在商業物業經營管理方面的能力，並已獲公司董事會審議通過。 
        
    萬科的控制權之爭一波三折，寶能系強勢收購併成為第一大股東、萬科管理層引入深圳地鐵自救、原第一大股東華潤和寶能系對重組方案堅決反對。寶能系還提出議案罷免萬科現有董事和監事。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽公告詳情， 請點擊 http://disclosure.szse.cn/finalpage/2016-07-21/1202496314.PDF 

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 楊淑禎)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai, July 21 - China Vanke <000002.SZ> <2202.HK> According to the announcement on Thursday, a subsidiary of the limited partnership fund, jointly formed by the Company and its partners, will acquire Blackstone Group <BX.N > And other independent third parties held by specific commercial real estate company's equity. The transaction does not involve any issue of securities by Vanke or any negotiation on the issue or acquisition of shares in the Company.
    
    The announcement said that recently, limited partnership fund mergers and acquisitions platform and the parties signed the transaction the final transaction documents, the transaction is completed, the joint acquisition platform will hold 96.55% stake in the target company, Vanke intends to join the joint acquisition platform The investment is about 3.889 billion yuan.
    
    Vanke said the transaction will rapidly enhance the Company's ability in the business management of commercial properties and has been approved by the board of directors of the Company for approval.
        
    Vanke dispute over the control of the twists and turns, Baona Department of a strong acquisition and become the largest shareholder, Vanke management introduced Shenzhen Metro self-help, formerly the largest shareholder of China Resources and Bao-energy department of the restructuring plan firmly opposed. Department of Bowen also proposed a motion to remove Vanke existing directors and supervisors. (Finish)
    
    For more information, please click http://disclosure.szse.cn/finalpage/2016-07-21/1202496314.PDF

Title: 中港個股：萬科擬投39億元收購黑石部分商業地產，不涉證券發行

Content:
* 新交所及港交所採取措施，限制自身的監管權力
    * 給交易所提供營收和股東派息的公司，同時又受交易所監管
    * 新加坡缺少獨立的市場監管機構

    路透香港7月21日 - 香港和新加坡均在採取措施，限制當地交易所的監管權力，以消除外界認為的利益衝突，並改善上市公司質量。
    
    在香港和新加坡，交易所都是一線監管機構，就是說給交易所提供營收和股東派息的公司，同時又受到交易所的監管。
    
    角色上的衝突導致新加坡交易所<SGXL.SI>和港交所<0388.HK> (HKEX)對一些公司的上市敞開大門，而後來這些公司捲入數起會計醜聞。
    
    為了解決這些問題，新加坡交易所和港交所已經進行了徹底的調整。
    
    本周新加坡交易所宣布，將剝離監管職能，由一家獨立管理的子公司承擔。港交所上月提議，首席執行官(CEO)不能參與上市決策的過程，將更多權力交給當地證券監管機構。
Content_EN:
* SGX and HKEx take measures to limit their own regulatory powers
    * Companies offering revenue and shareholder payouts to the exchange, while regulated by the exchange
    * Singapore lacks independent market regulator

    Reuters Hong Kong July 21 - Both Hong Kong and Singapore are taking steps to limit the regulatory power of local exchanges in an effort to eliminate conflicts of interest and increase the quality of listed companies.
    
    In both Hong Kong and Singapore, the exchanges are front-line regulators, meaning companies that provide exchanges with payouts and shareholders' dividends, while being regulated by exchanges.
    
    The role of the conflict led to the Singapore Exchange <SGXL.SI> and HKEx <0388.HK> (HKEX) opened the door for a number of companies, and later these companies involved in a number of accounting scandals.
    
    In order to solve these problems, SGX and HKEx have made thorough adjustments.
    
    This week, the Singapore Exchange announced that it will divest the regulatory function from an independently run subsidiary. Last month, the HKEx proposed that the chief executive (CNOOC LIMITED) could not participate in the process of listing decision and give more power to the local securities regulatory authority.

Title: 台灣貨幣市場：7月22日及本提存期資金預期變化一覽表

Content:
(更新有關交易恢復的消息)
    路透墨爾本7月22日 - 倫敦金屬交易所(LME)電子平台的交易周五因技術問題推遲近四個小時，接近0400GMT才重新開始。
    
    “此次推遲是會員連接市場的相關技術問題所致，”LME所屬的香港交易所<0388.HK>一位發言人稱。
    
    0404GMT，LME期銅下跌0.5%至每噸4,959美元，成交量仍相對較低，約為100口。
    
    交易員稱，此次故障抑制了金屬市場的整體交投興趣。上海期銅<SCFcv1>小跌0.4%。
    
    “今日上午的人民幣匯率中間價有較大變動，所以本來可能有更多的詢價，”香港一家券商的交易員稱。
    
    “我們陸續收到一些詢價，但大家都保持克制，還是希望能在屏幕上看到價格後再說。”(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導,請點選[nL4N1A81FJ]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 汪紅英；審校 鄭茵)
 ((Hongying.Wang@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271274; Reuters
Messaging: Hongying.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
(Update on transaction recovery news)
    MELBOURNE, July 22 (Reuters) - Trading on the London Metal Exchange (LME) electronic platform was delayed by nearly four hours on Friday due to technical issues, starting near 0400 GMT.
    
    "This postponement is a result of the technical issues associated with affiliate connections," said a spokesman for LME-affiliated Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited <0388.HK.
    
    At 0404 GMT, LME copper fell 0.5% to US $ 4,959 per tonne, while volume remained relatively low at around 100 points.
    
    Traders said the failure curbed the overall metal market interest in trading. Shanghai Copper <SCFcv1> edged down 0.4%.
    
    "There was a big change in the middle price of the RMB exchange rate this morning, so there might have been more inquiries," said a trader at a Hong Kong brokerage.
    
    "We have received some inquiries, but we are all restrained, or hope to see the price on the screen after that." (End)

Title: 台灣股市：盤中走軟，電子和金融類股均下跌

Content:
路透7月26日 - 中國樂視控股<300104.SZ>周二稱，將以20億美元收購美國消費電子公司Vizio Inc <VZIO.O>。
    
    Vizio生產經濟型平板電視、條形音箱和液晶顯示器。該公司成立於2002年，目前是美國最大的電視生產商之一。
    
    Vizio去年進行首次公開招股(IPO)。根據招股說明書，該公司2015年前六個月實現銷售13億美元。
    
    樂視稱，Vizio的硬件和軟件業務將作為樂視的全資子公司運營，該公司的Inscape TV收視數據業務將被分拆為獨立公司。
    
    在本次交易中，美銀美林是Vizio的顧問，Latham & Watkins LLP是法律顧問。預計這項交易將在第四季完成。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL4N1AC4TB]即可擷取瀏覽****  

 (編譯 侯雪蘋；審校)
 ((hou.xueping@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271246; Reuters
Messaging: hou.xueping.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, July 26 - China LeTV Holdings <300104.SZ> said on Tuesday it will acquire US consumer electronics company Vizio Inc <VZIO.O> for $ 2 billion.
    
    Vizio produces economy flat-screen TVs, bar sound boxes and LCD monitors. The company was founded in 2002 and is currently one of the largest television producers in the United States.
    
    Vizio made its initial public offering (IPO) last year. According to the prospectus, the company achieved sales of 1.3 billion U.S. dollars in the first six months of 2015.
    
    LeTV said Vizio's hardware and software businesses will operate as a wholly-owned subsidiary of LeTV, which will spin off its Inscape TV viewing data business into separate companies.
    
    In this transaction, BofA Merrill Lynch is a consultant to Vizio and Latham & Watkins LLP is a legal advisor. The transaction is expected to be completed in the fourth quarter. (Finish)

 (Compiled Houxue Ping; review)
 ((hou.xueping@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271246; Reuters
Messaging: hou.xueping.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 企業併購：中國樂視將以20億美元收購美國電視生產商Vizio

Title: 《港股在美國上市的主要ADR股價表現》--7月27日

Content:
路透香港7月27日 - 中國水泥生產商--華潤水泥<1313.HK>周三稱，將短期融資券發行規模縮減一半至45億元人民幣，中期票據發行總額最多90億元則維持不變。
    
    華潤水泥在聯交所的聲明稱，經謹慎檢閱其融資需要，原本最多90億元的短期融資券發行總額將調低至不超過45億元，首批發行規模5億元維持不變。
    
    至於中期票據發行總額不超過90億元及首批發行規模30億元則維持不變。
    
    華潤水泥表示，首批中期票據及首批短期融資券募集到的資金計劃用於償還該集團銀行借款及補充營運資金。
    
    該公司此前發出盈利預警，預計今年上半年淨利將按年顯著減少，主要原因是國內水泥產品售價同比下降。其於2015年度中期淨利為15.3億港元。
    
    華潤水泥周三早盤收跌2.11%，報2.78港元。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0727/LTN20160727146_C.pdf)

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 27 - Chinese cement producer - China Resources Cement <1313.HK> said on Wednesday that the issue of short-term financing bonds will be reduced by half to RMB4.5 billion while the total medium-term notes issued will reach a maximum of RMB9 billion.
    
    CR Cement's statement on the Stock Exchange said that after cautiously reviewing its financing needs, the total amount of short-term financing bonds up to a maximum of 9 billion yuan will be reduced to no more than 4.5 billion yuan while the initial issue size of 500 million yuan will remain unchanged.
    
    As for the issuance of medium-term notes not exceeding 9 billion yuan and the initial issuance of 3 billion yuan, they remained unchanged.
    
    China Resources Cement said that the funds raised from the first batch of medium-term notes and the first batch of short-term financing bills were used to repay the bank borrowings and replenish working capital.
    
    Earlier, the company issued a profit warning. It is estimated that the net profit of the first half of this year will decrease significantly on a year-to-year basis mainly due to the year-on-year price drop of domestic cement products. Its 2015 net profit was HK $ 1.53 billion.
    
    China Resources Cement closed down 2.11% in early trading on Wednesday, at HK $ 2.78. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0727/LTN20160727146_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：華潤水泥短期融資券發行規模縮減一半，中期票據則維持不變

Content:
路透台北7月28日 - 台灣股市周四盤中下跌，追隨亞洲其他一些股市跌勢，儘管美國聯邦儲備理事會(美聯儲/FED)對美國經濟作出正面評估，推升風險偏好。
    
    中國股市滬綜指<.SSEC>跌0.5%，日本股市日經指數<.N225>跌0.7%。
    
    但亞股微升，MSCI明晟亞太地區(除日本)指數<.MIAPJ0000PUS>漲0.2%，此前一度升至2015年8月以來最高水平。
    
    美聯儲周三維持利率不變，但表示美國經濟前景面臨的短期風險減弱。
    
    0302GMT，台灣加權股價指數<.TWII>跌0.1%至9,059.19點，上日收於9,063.39點。
    
    周四盤初在窄幅區間交投。
    
    電子類指數<.TELI>跌0.1%，金融保險類指數<.TFNI>漲0.3%。
    
    交投最為活躍的個股中，台積電<2330.TW>小漲0.3%。
    
    友達光電<2409.TW>漲2%。(完)

Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei July 28 - Taiwanese stocks fell on Thursday, following losses in other Asian markets despite a positive assessment of the U.S. economy by the Federal Reserve (Federal Reserve) to boost risk appetite.
    
    Chinese stock market Shanghai Composite <SSE> fell 0.5%, Japan's Nikkei <.N225> fell 0.7%.
    
    However, sub-shares edged higher and MSCI's Asia Pacific (except Japan) index <.MIAPJ0000PUS> rose 0.2% after hitting the highest level since August 2015.
    
    The Fed on Wednesday kept interest rates unchanged, but said short-term risks facing the U.S. economy have weakened.
    
    0302GMT, Taiwan's Weighted Share Index <.TWII> fell 0.1% to 9,059.19 points to close at 9,063.39 points the previous day.
    
    Trading early Thursday in a narrow range trading.
    
    The electronic index <.TELI> fell 0.1%, while the financial and insurance index <.TFNI> gained 0.3%.
    
    Among the most actively traded stocks, TSMC <2330.TW> edged up 0.3%.
    
    AU Optronics <2409.TW> up 2%. (Finish)

Title: 台灣股市：盤中下跌，台積電微漲

Content:
路透香港7月28日 - 香港富商李嘉誠旗下公用事業分支--電能實業<0006.HK>周四公布，今年上半年淨利按年增長7.4%，惟英國業務受英鎊匯率下調影響，利潤減少4%。
    
    該公司于聯交所的聲明顯示，2016年1-6月淨利34.76億港元，上年同期32.37億港元；期內每股盈利1.63港元，上年同期1.52港元。董事會建議派發中期股息每股0.7港元。
    
    電能實業主席霍建寧稱，由於各個市場的通脹和國內生產總值等宏觀經濟指標表現穩定，集團期內錄得良好營運業績；英國作為集團最大市場於期內貢獻溢利22.34億港元，低於去年同期的23.34億港元，主要由於英鎊匯率下調。
    
    “上半年來自英國之溢利貢獻以英鎊計算上升2%，但以港幣計算則下降4%。”他說。
    
    他並稱，由於集團在英國的投資多為能源相關基建和受規管業務，所以不論英國脫歐與否，相信不會對集團基礎業務有任何實質影響，只是當財務結果由英鎊轉化為港幣時，會因不穩定匯率影響總收益。
    
    以淨利計，英國業務的占比為64%，是電能實業最大盈利來源；而澳洲與港燈<2638.HK>的占比分別為16%及11%，中國內地占4%。
    
    霍建寧重申，縱使全球各地經濟前景不明朗，但集團保持穩健現金水平，從而能夠靈活掌握任何合適發展機會。
    
    “集團目前在數個潛在大型投資項目進展良好。”他說。
    
    電能實業董事局此前決定不派發特別中期股息，以保留財務能力應付收購。於6月末，該公司之凈現金水平為568.82億港元，去年末則為587.44億港元。
    
    該股周四早盤收跌0.33%，報75.05港元。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0728/LTN20160728133_C.pdf)

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 28 - Hong Kong-based businessman Li Ka Shing's utility division, Power Industries <0006.HK> reported on Thursday that net profit rose 7.4% in the first half of this year but its profit was down 4% .
    
    The company's statement on the Stock Exchange showed net profit of HK $ 3,476 million for the first six months of 2016, up from HK $ 3,237 million for the same period last year; earnings per share for the period was HK $ 1.63, compared with HK $ 1.52 in the same period of last year. The Board recommends the payment of an interim dividend of HK $ 0.7 per share.
    
    Huo Jianning, Chairman of Electricity Industry Co.,said the Group recorded good operating results during the period as a result of stable macroeconomic indicators such as inflation and GDP in the respective markets. As the largest market for the Group, the UK contributed a profit of HK $ 2,234 million for the period, down from the previous year The same period of 23.34 million Hong Kong dollars, mainly due to the pound exchange rate cut.
    
    "Profits from the UK in the first half rose 2% in sterling terms, but fell 4% in Hong Kong dollars," he said.
    
    He also said that as the Group's investment in the UK is mostly energy-related infrastructure and regulated business, it is believed that there will be no material impact on the Group's basic business regardless of whether or not the United Kingdom takes off from the EU, only when the financial result is converted from GBP to Hong Kong Dollar , The total return will be affected by the unstable exchange rate.
    
    In terms of net profit, the UK business accounted for 64%, which is the largest source of profit for Power Energy. The share of Australia & HEC <1638.HK> was 16% and 11% respectively, while that of Mainland China was 4%.
    
    Huo Jianing reiterated that despite uncertain economic prospects around the world, the Group maintained a steady cash level and was able to flexibly grasp any suitable development opportunities.
    
    "The Group is making good progress in a number of potential large-scale investment projects," he said.
    
    Prior to this, Powerpower's board of directors decided not to distribute a special interim dividend in order to preserve the financial capability to deal with the acquisition. At the end of June, the company's net cash position was HK $ 56.882 billion compared with HK $ 58.744 billion at the end of last year.
    
    The stock closed down 0.33% in early trading on Thursday, at 75.05 Hong Kong dollars. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0728/LTN20160728133_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 港股業績：電能實業中期淨利增長7.4%，英鎊跌令英國業務利潤減少4%

Title: 台灣貨幣市場：7月29日及本提存期資金預期變化一覽表

Content:
路透香港7月29日 - 中國三大電訊商之一--中國聯通<0762.HK>周五發出盈利預警，預期上半年淨利將同比下降約80%，受累期內銷售費用明顯上升，以及鐵塔使用費用增加及其他成本上升。
    
    聯通表示，比較去年下半年公司凈虧約33.6億元人民幣（不包括鐵塔出售的收益），上半年業績已有明顯改善。公司未來將深化落實聚焦戰略，創新合作發展，全力推進業績逐步反轉。

    去年上半年，聯通的淨利為69.9億元。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布于香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0729/LTN20160729231_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 喬艷紅)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, July 29 - China Unicom (0762.HK), one of China's top telecom operators, issued a profit warning on Friday. It expects net profit in the first half of the year to decline by about 80% on a year-on-year basis, resulting in a significant increase in selling expenses during the period involved, Increases in usage fees and other costs.
    
    Unicom said the net loss of the company in the second half of last year was about Rmb3.36bn (excluding the revenue from the sale of the tower), and the performance in the first half of the year has been significantly improved. In the future, the Company will deepen the implementation of its focus strategy, innovate and develop in cooperation and make every effort to promote the gradual reversal of its performance.

    In the first half of last year, Unicom's net profit was 6.99 billion yuan. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement of listed companies on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0729/LTN20160729231_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revising Qiao Yanhong)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：中國聯通料上半年淨利同比跌約八成，受累費用及成本上升

Content:
路透墨西哥城7月29日 - 墨西哥政府周五稱，做為反傾銷調查的一部分，墨西哥已針對進口自中國大陸和台灣的鍍層鋼板徵收臨時關稅。這是該國為保護本國鋼鐵行業採取的最新舉措。
    
    墨西哥經濟部在政府公報中稱，對進口自台灣的鍍層鋼板將每公斤徵收0.563美元的關稅。
    
    對進口自中國大陸部分企業的鍍層鋼板徵收不同的關稅：唐山鋼鐵的關稅為每公斤0.4385美元，寶鋼股份為每公斤0.1926美元，首鋼股份為每公斤為0.3468美元，首鋼京唐為每公斤0.4188美元，對其他出口商徵收每公斤0.4385美元的關稅。
    
    墨西哥最近數月已採取多項措施保護本國陷入困境的鋼鐵行業，包括實施新的進口關稅、實施反傾銷配額以及增強海關管制以執行配額。
    
    墨西哥政府說，上述反傾銷調查是應鋼鐵公司Ternium <TX.N>墨西哥子公司的要求進行的。(完)
