Title: 《香港報摘》--其他報紙重要消息9月9日

Content:
路透香港9月9日 - 中國資產規模最大的金融資產管理公司--中國華融<2799.HK>周五稱，擬發行5億美元非次級擔保永續證券，息率2.875%。
    
    這是華融根據此前訂立110億美元中期票據計劃項下發行。據公告，預計本次發行所得款項淨額約4.97億美元，擬用作集團營運資金及一般公司用途。
    
    證券發行人為華融全資附屬公司Huarong Finance II Co., Ltd.，發行價為本金額的100%，每半年分派一次。
    
    預期證券評級可達穆迪Baa1級及惠譽A-級。
    
    本次發行的聯席牽頭經辦人為香港上海匯豐銀行、華融國際證券、農銀國際融資、澳新銀行、中國銀行、中銀國際亞洲、建銀國際、中信里昂、民生銀行香港分行、德國商業銀行、瑞信、高盛、摩根士丹利、渣打銀行以及永隆銀行。
    
    華融周四收報3.06港元，過去一個月累計跌近1%。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0909/LTN20160909078_C.pdf)
    

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 林高麗)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, September 9 - China Huarong Corporation (2799.HK), the largest asset management company with the largest assets in China, said on Friday it planned to issue a non-subordinated guaranteed non-subordinated securities at a rate of 2.875%.
    
    This is Huarong issued under the 11 billion U.S. dollars medium-term notes issued under the program. According to the announcement, the net proceeds of this offering are estimated to be approximately $ 497 million, which is intended for the Group's working capital and general corporate purposes.
    
    The securities issuer is Huarong Asset Management Co.,Ltd. Finance II Co.,Ltd.,a wholly owned subsidiary of Huarong. The issue price is 100% of the principal amount and is distributed semi-annually.
    
    The securities are expected to reach Moody's Baa Level 1 and Fitch A-Level.
    
    The joint lead managers of this offering are the Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited, Huarong International Securities, ABC Financial, ANZ Bank, Bank of China, BOC International Asia, CCB International, CITIC Lyon, Minsheng Bank Hong Kong Branch, Commerzbank Credit Suisse, Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley, Standard Chartered Bank and Wing Lung Bank.
    
    Huarong closed at 3.06 Hong Kong dollars on Thursday, the past month or nearly 1%. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0909/LTN20160909078_E.pdf)
    

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; revising Lin Korea)
 (alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：中國華融擬發行5億美元非次級擔保永續證券，息率2.875%

Content:
路透香港/北京9月8日 - 全球最大的電子代工廠商鴻海富士康科技集團周四稱，旗下子公司已向中國叫車服務公司滴滴出行投資1.199億美元，該投資或將使滴滴出行估值達到337億美元。
    
    隨著富士康的加入，滴滴出行投資者名錄上的全球科技巨頭越來越多，其中包括美國消費電子公司蘋果<AAPL.O>、優步(Uber)[UBER.UL]、中國騰訊控股<0700.HK>、阿里巴巴集團<BABA.N>以及百度<BIDU.O>。
    
    鴻海精密<2317.TW>在給證交所的文件中公開了此項交易，鴻海精密是富士康上市股票的名稱。富士康在聲明中稱，旗下子公司Foxteq Holdings將擁有滴滴出行0.355%的股份。滴滴出行是中國估值最高的初創企業。
    
    據路透估算，該交易將令滴滴出行估值達到337億美元。
    
    滴滴出行發言人在電郵中稱，兩家公司現“正在探索可能性，但目前尚無具體計劃”。(完)
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL3N1BK3UN]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 王琛；審校 白雲)
 ((chen.wang@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271255; Reuters
Messaging: chen.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong / Beijing, Sept. 8 - Hon Hai Foxconn Technology Group, the world's largest electronics foundry, said on Thursday that its subsidiary has invested $ 119.9 million in a drip travel service from China's taxi service company, Valuation reached 33.7 billion US dollars.
    
    With the addition of Foxconn, more and more global tech giants are on the list of Investors in Driven Travel, including the U.S. consumer electronics companies Apple Inc.,Uber Inc.,China Tencent Holdings Inc.,0700.HK>, Alibaba Group <BABA.N> and Baidu <BIDU.O>.
    
    Hon Hai Precision <2317.TW> disclosed the transaction in a document to the Exchange, which is the name of Foxconn's listed stock. Foxconn said in a statement that its subsidiary Foxteq Holdings will have a 0.355% stake in Drip Drop. Drip trip is China's highest valuation of start-ups.
    
    According to Reuters estimates, the deal will make drip travel valuation reached 33.7 billion US dollars.
    
    In an e-mail, a spokesman for Drip Drift said the two companies are "exploring possibilities now but there is no specific plan at this moment." (Finish)
    
    **** For reference, please click [nL3N1BK3UN] to capture browse ****

 (Compile Wang Chen; Review Baiyun)
 ((chen.wang@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271255; Reuters
Messaging: chen.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國企業：鴻海富士康旗下子公司向滴滴出行投資1.199億美元

Content:
路透首爾9月9日 - 韓國企業SK創新(SK Innovation)<096770.KS>周五稱，正尋求與中國石油化工股份有限公司<600028.SS>合作，進軍煉油和潤滑油領域。韓國最大的煉油企業SK能源(SK Energy)隸屬SK Innovation。
    
    SK創新在聲明中稱，母公司SK集團主席崔泰源(Chey Tae-won)，與中國石化董事長王玉普周四在北京會面，討論了加強雙方戰略合作夥伴關係的方式。
    
    通過2013年與中國石化共同成立的合資企業，SK創新下屬公司SK綜合化學(SK Global Chemical)向中國石化武漢乙烯合資項目投資共3.3萬億韓元(30億美元)，中國石化與SK綜合化學的股比為65:35。
    
    聲明稱，SK創新還計劃通過建立合資企業或併購中國的化工企業擴大其在中國的業務。(完)
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL3N1BL0G6]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 王琛；審校 李春喜)
 ((chen.wang@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271255; Reuters
Messaging: chen.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Seoul Sept. 9 - South Korean company SK Innovation <096770.KS> said on Friday it is seeking cooperation with China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation <600028.SS> to enter the field of oil refining and lubricants. SK Energy, South Korea's largest oil refinery, is part of SK Innovation.
    
    In a statement, SK Innovation said Chey Tae-won, chairman of parent SK Group, met with Sinopec Chairman Wang Yupu in Beijing on Thursday to discuss ways to strengthen the strategic partnership between the two sides.
    
    Through a joint venture with Sinopec Corp. in 2013, SK Global Chemical, a subsidiary of SK Innovation, invested a total of 3.3 trillion won (US $ 3 billion) in Sinopec's Wuhan Ethylene Joint Venture Project. Sinopec Corp. and SK Chemicals Share ratio is 65:35.
    
    The statement said SK Innovation also plans to expand its operations in China by establishing joint ventures or acquiring Chinese chemical companies. (Finish)
    
    **** To refer to the original report, please click [nL3N1BL0G6] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Wang Chen; proofreader Li Chunxi)
 ((chen.wang@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271255; Reuters
Messaging: chen.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 韓國個股：SK創新尋求擴大與中石化的業務合作

Content:
路透台北9月12日 - 台灣股市周一盤中跌至近兩周低點，因美國股市下滑連續第二日打擊市場人氣，台積電<2330.TW>等權重股領跌。
    
    截至0237GMT，台股加權股價指數<.TWII>下滑1%至8,965.01點，創9月初來最低。
    
    台股周六獨家開盤，收於一周低點。[nL3T1BM04L]
    
    電子類指數<.TELI>下滑1%，金融保險類指數<.TFNI>跌0.7%。
    
    全球晶圓代工龍頭、蘋果<AAPL.O>供應商台積電下滑多達1.7%。(完)

Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei September 12 - Taiwan stocks fell to a nearly two-week low Monday as heavyweights such as Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSC) led the plunge as the US stock market slumped for the second day in a row to combat market sentiment.
    
    As of 0237GMT, the Taiwan-based Weighted-Share Price Index <.TWII> slipped 1% to 8,965.01 points, the lowest in early September.
    
    Taiwan stocks opened exclusively on Saturday, closing at a one-week low. [nL3T1BM04L]
    
    Electronic index <.TELI> fell 1%, financial and insurance index <.TFNI> fell 0.7%.
    
    TSMC, the global foundry leader, dropped as much as 1.7%. (Finish)

Title: 台灣股市：盤中下跌1%至近兩周低位，台積電領跌

Content:
路透北京9月12日 - 中國股市滬綜指周一早盤收低逾2%，成交量小幅放大。分析師指出，受上周五美國三大股指暴跌影響，今日早盤股指大幅低開，盤中個股普跌，資源類板塊跌幅居前。滬綜指此前多次上突3,100點未果，短期將考驗3,000點整數關口支撐，而中秋節小長假臨近，投資者觀望心態趨濃。
            
    滬綜指<.SSEC>早盤收報3,015.13點，跌63.72點或2.07%，上證A股今日早盤成交1,192.41億元人民幣，上日全日成交量為1,818億元。
    
   “今天市場開盤之後就出現大跌，主要的誘發因素還是在於上周五全球市場跌幅比較大。”方正證券策略分析師陳敏表示。
    
    他認為，市場調整的深層次原因來自於美聯儲上周五釋放的鷹派信號，美聯儲加息近期的概率可能高於市場預期。當前全球將逐漸結束寬鬆貨幣政策，貨幣政策轉向對大宗商品價格影響較大。
    
    美國股市周五大幅收低，標普500指數錄得6月以來最差單日表現，朝鮮進行核試驗、美國聯邦儲備理事會(FED/美聯儲)官員發表暗示升息言論後，投資者感到緊張不安。標普500指數收盤點位低於50日移動均線切入位，也為約兩個月內首見，顯示後市可能進一步走軟。[nL3T1BL4V3]
    
    美國聯邦儲備理事會(FED/美聯儲)將於本月稍後舉行政策會議，周五多位決策者對是否在短期內升息表達了不同意見，從一些擁有永久投票權的委員的講話中可以看出，他們對支持近期升息仍有保留。一系列鷹派言論發表後，金融市場押注9月升息可能性增加。[nL3T1BL4MJ]
    
    廣晟有色<600259.SS>早盤收跌6.44%，廈門鎢業<600549.SS>收跌6.73%。
                
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>早盤收報3,247.97點，跌2.11%；滬深300指數期貨主力9月合約<CIFU6>早盤報3,230.0點，跌2.57%，成交10,038手。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Beijing, Sept. 12 - The Shanghai Composite Index ended the day lower by more than 2% in Shanghai on Monday, trading volume slightly enlarged. Analysts pointed out that last Friday the collapse of the three major US stock indexes, stock index opened sharply lower in early trading today, intraday stocks Pudie, resources sector decline in the top. Shanghai Composite Index has repeatedly surged 3,100 points unsuccessfully, short-term test 3,000 integer mark support, and Mid-Autumn Festival is approaching a small holiday, investors wait and see attitude tends to thick.
            
    Shanghai Composite Index <.SSEC> closed at 3,015.13 points, down 63.72 points or 2.07% in early trading. Shanghai A-Shares traded RMB1,192.41 billion in early trading today. The total volume of the day was 1,818 billion.
    
   "Today's market crash occurred after the opening bell, the main predisposing factor is that on Friday the global market decline is relatively large." Chen Min, Founder Securities strategist said.
    
    He believes that the underlying reason for the market adjustment comes from the hawkish signals released by the Federal Reserve on Friday. The chance of the Federal Reserve raising interest rates in the near future may be higher than market expectations. At present, the world will gradually end the loose monetary policy and the shift of monetary policy will have a greater impact on the prices of bulk commodities.
    
    US stock markets closed sharply lower on Friday, investors were nervous after the S & P 500 recorded its worst single-day performance since June, North Korea conducted nuclear tests and officials of the Federal Reserve Board (Fed / Federal Reserve) announced an implication of raising interest rates disturbed. S & P 500 index closing point below the 50-day moving average cut into bits, but also for the first time in about two months, indicating the market outlook may further weaken. [nL3T1BL4V3]
    
    The Federal Reserve Board (FED / Fed) will hold a policy meeting later this month. Many policymakers expressed their disagreement on whether to raise interest rates in the short term on Friday. From a number of members with permanent voting rights, It is clear that they still have reservations about supporting recent rate hikes. After a series of hawkish comments were published, the possibility of a rate hike in the financial markets betting in September has increased. [nL3T1BL4MJ]
    
    Rising 600.49% of morning glory rose 600%, while Xiamen Tungsten 600549.SS ended 6.73%.
                
    The Shanghai and Shenzhen 300 Index <.SI3> closed at 3,247.97 points in morning session, down 2.11%. The main contract of September CSI300 Index futures closed at 2.532% at 3,230.0 points in early trade and traded 10,038 contracts. (Finish)

 (Posted Zhang Xiaoguang; review Zeng Xiang Jin)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國股市：滬綜指早盤收低逾2%，外盤大跌拖累資源類板塊領跌

Content:
* 第四季度中國汽油和柴油使用量將出現2009年以來首降
    * 國有煉油廠只能出口過剩的成品油，除此之外沒什麼選擇

    路透北京9月12日 - 中國國有煉油廠未來幾個月準備出口更多汽油和柴油。第四季度一般來說是中國的成品油消費旺季，而這次的黯淡前景卻使本來就飽和的全球市場不寒而栗。
    
    儘管馬上就會有冬季取暖需求，10月國慶節黃金周也將有更多汽車上路，但有十多個中國煉油業者、交易員和分析師表示，第四季度將以供應過剩為主，本地需求遲滯。中國是全球第二大石油消費國。
    
    今年需求放緩，再加上中國小型獨立煉油廠產量激增，導致本地庫存急升，並刺激國有油企向海外銷售成品油。今年7月，中國成品油出口創歷史新高，成為成品油凈出口國，這是至少三年來的首次。
    
    “煉油廠銷售人員現在真的是頭疼，擔心無法達到每月銷售目標，”淄博隆眾石化網分析師李彥談到國有企業在國內市場面臨困境時表示。
    
    淄博隆眾和卓創咨詢目前表示，第四季度汽油和柴油需求總量同比將有所下降，這將是2009年全球經濟危機以來的首次。
Content_EN:
* Fourth-quarter consumption of gasoline and diesel in China will show the first drop since 2009
    * State-owned refineries can only export surplus oil products, but there is no other choice

    Reuters BEIJING, Sept. 12 - Chinese state-owned refineries plan to export more gasoline and diesel in the coming months. The fourth quarter is generally the peak season for China's refined oil consumption, and this gloomy outlook shivers the already saturated global market.
    
    In spite of the winter heating demand, there will be more cars on the National Day Golden Week in October. However, more than a dozen Chinese oil refiners, traders and analysts said the fourth quarter will be dominated by excess supply and local Hysteresis of demand. China is the second largest oil consumer in the world.
    
    The slowdown in demand this year, coupled with the surge in production of small independent refineries in China, led to a surge in local inventories and stimulated the sale of oil products by state-owned oil companies overseas. In July this year, China's refined oil exports hit a record high, becoming a net exporter of refined oil products, the first time in at least three years.
    
    "Refinery salespeople are really a headache now, fearing they will not reach their monthly sales target," Li Yan, an analyst at Zibo Longzhong Petrochemical Co.,said of state-owned enterprises facing difficulties in the domestic market.
    
    Zibo Longzhong and Zhuochuang Consulting currently said that the total demand for gasoline and diesel in the fourth quarter will decline year on year, which will be the first time since the global economic crisis in 2009.

Title: 《中國已公布新股發行上市日程表》--9月13日

Content:
路透香港9月13日 - 湯森路透旗下基點報導，根據新聞發布稿，富豪產業信託已經在周一同九家銀行簽署了55億港元(7.09億美元)五年期俱樂部貸款案。
    
    九家以牽頭行身份參與的銀行包括：恆生銀行、東亞銀行、中國建設銀行(亞洲)、工銀亞洲、華僑銀行、大華銀行、三井住友銀行、澳新銀行和東方匯理銀行。恆生銀行還擔任額度代理行和擔保品管控行。
    
    定期貸款和循環信貸的利率都較香港銀行同業拆息(Hibor)加碼115個基點。消息人士此前曾表示，貸款綜合收益介於130-140個基點。
    
    新聞稿稱，所籌資金將用於為一筆2018年到期的貸款提供再融資，並且也用於富豪產業信託進行新併購和持續升級現有地產組合的運營資金。
    
    富豪產業信託在2013年7月曾與11家貸款機構敲定一筆48億港元五年期再融資貸款。綜合收益為187個基點，利率較Hibor加碼162個基點，此外還有125個基點的費用。(完)
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP49182a]即可擷取瀏覽****
    

 (編譯 高琦 審校 孫茉莉)
 ((kelly.gao@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-6627-1011; Reuters
Messaging: kelly.gao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Sept 13 (Reuters) - Regal REIT has signed a 5.5 billion Hong Kong dollar ($ 709 million) five-year club loan with nine banks on Monday, press releases said.
    
    The nine participating banks include: Hang Seng Bank, Bank of East Asia, China Construction Bank (Asia), ICBC (Asia), OCBC Bank, UOB, Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation, ANZ Bank and Calyon Bank. Hang Seng Bank also served as a line of agency and collateral control charge.
    
    The interest rates on both term loans and revolving loans have both increased by 115 basis points over the HIBOR. Sources have said earlier that the overall loan yield ranged from 130-140 basis points.
    
    The press release said the funds raised will be used to refinance a loan that matures in 2018 and is also used by Regal REIT to fund new acquisitions and to continuously upgrade the working capital of the existing property portfolio.
    
    Regal REIT finalized a HK $ 4.8 billion five-year refinancing loan with 11 lenders in July 2013. Total revenue was 187 basis points, plus 162 basis points above Hibor and 125 basis points. (Finish)

Title: 路透基點：富豪產業信託與九家銀行簽署55億港元貸款案--TRLPC

Content:
(更正：因譯文有誤，第一段改為“獨自收購要約”，非“唯一收購要約”；第八段改為“國家電網和長江基建收購Ausgrid的50.4%控股股權的方案”，非“聯合收購”)
    * �    北美買家被告知不需要找本地夥伴--消息人士
    * �    投資銀行家稱這樣的建議“令人意外”
    * �    澳洲以國家安全擔憂為由否決中資收購

    路透悉尼9月14日 - 關於潛在金額達100億澳元(74.6億美元)的澳洲最大電網公司Ausgrid股權收購案，一名參與其中的顧問表示，北美競購者不需要有澳洲本地夥伴，就可以標購Ausgrid。此前澳洲政府否決了中資企業提出的獨自收購要約。
    
    這名消息人士告訴路透，加拿大養老金計劃投資委員會(CPPIB)及Borealis Infrastructure等加拿大基金，本月路演期間被告之，如果通過財團參與競購，不需要擁有澳洲本地夥伴。
    
    新南威爾士州政府的這名顧問要求匿名，因為未獲授權公開講話。新南威爾士州政府是上述資產的賣家。
    
    代表多個有興趣收購團體的一投資銀行家表示，他也從參與路演的同事聽說，通過財團參與競購的北美買家不必擁有澳洲夥伴。
    
     “這令人意外，”他說。由於事關客戶機密，他要求匿名。
    
    “所有人最初都以為，收購需要本地企業的參與。”
    
    儘管北美路演給出這樣的原則，但究竟澳洲能接受什麼樣的投標方案，以及該國政府是否會冒著激怒中國的風險批準多數由外國出資的投標方案，還有很大的不確定性。
    
    上月澳洲政府以國家安全擔憂為由，阻撓了中國國有企業--國家電網[STGRD.UL]和香港民企長江基建<1038.HK>(CKI)收購Ausgrid的50.4%控股股權的方案。
    
    Ausgrid是澳洲最大電網，中國國家電網和長江基建的出價據信約為130億澳元。
    
    關於新南威爾士州政府是否得到澳洲外資投資審核局(FIRB)有關哪類投標可以接受的建議，該州政府發言人拒絕置評。
    
    澳洲財長莫里森的發言人拒絕就莫里森辦公室或澳洲外資投資審核局(FIRB)是否已向州政府提供建議置評。
    
    雖然中國是澳洲最大的貿易夥伴及重要投資國，但澳洲政府在情報方面卻與加拿大和美國有著緊密合作。加拿大的資金參與了近期澳洲的基建交易，包括港口及鐵路運輸集團Asciano出售案、及輸電網絡運營商Transgrid出售案。
    
    西澳大學國際關係教授Mark Beeson表示，如果允許外資100%擁有Ausgrid的所有權，那麼澳洲就要面臨惹惱中國的風險。
    
    “中國人和其他人將理直氣壯地問道‘這是怎麼回事？’”他說。
    
    中國商務部發言人沈丹陽上月稱，澳方不支持中國企業收購Ausgrid的決定存在明顯的貿易保護主義傾向，嚴重影響中國企業到澳投資的積極性。[nB9T18H06L]
    
    但一位投資銀行家稱，允許北美競購者通過財團參與競購，或將幫助澳洲政府為拒絕中國國家電網和長江基建提供正當理由。中國國家電網和長江基建之前並未通過財團參與競購。(完)
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL3N1BD2XX]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 張濤/李春喜/王琛；審校 張明鈞/汪紅英/李婷儀)
 ((chen.wang@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271255; Reuters
Messaging: chen.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
(Correct: The first paragraph was changed to "solo bid" instead of "the only tender offer"; the eighth paragraph was changed to "Proposal of State Grid and CKI Acquiring 50.4% of Controlling Share of Ausgrid" Joint acquisition ")
    *   North American buyers are told they do not need to find a local partner - source
    *   Investment bankers call such a proposal "surprising"
    *   Australia vetoed Chinese acquisitions on the grounds of national security concerns

    Reuters SYDNEY, Sept. 14 - Concerning the Ausgrid acquisition of Australia's largest power grid company with a potential amount of A $ 10 billion (7.46 billion U.S. dollars), one of the consultants said North American bidders do not need to have local partners in Australia Standard Ausgrid Earlier, the Australian government vetoed the solo offer by Chinese companies.
    
    The source told Reuters that Canadian funds such as the Canadian Pension Plan Investment Committee (CPPIB) and Borealis Infrastructure were told during the roadshow this month that they would not need to own a local Australian partner if they bid through the consortium.
    
    The consultant to the New South Wales government requested anonymity because he was not authorized to speak publicly. The NSW government is the seller of the above assets.
    
    An investment banker representing several interested acquirers said he also learned from colleagues participating in road shows that North American buyers bidding through consortia do not have to own an Australian partner.
    
     "It's amazing," he said. As a matter of customer secrecy, he requested anonymity.
    
    "Everyone initially thought the acquisition required the involvement of local businesses."
    
    Although North American roadshows give such a principle, there is great uncertainty as to what kind of bidding scheme Australia can accept and whether the government will run the risk of provoking China to approve most foreign-funded bidding schemes.
    
    Last month, the Australian government obstructed the acquisition of a 50.4% controlling stake in Ausgrid by Chinese state-owned enterprise STG.UL and Hong Kong private equity firm CHEUNG KONG INFRASTRUCTURE HOLDINGS LIMITED on the grounds of national security concerns Program.
    
    Ausgrid is Australia's largest power grid, and China State Grid and the Yangtze River Infrastructure are believed to be about A $ 13 billion.
    
    A state government spokesman declined to comment on whether the NSW government received FIRB advice on which bids were acceptable.
    
    A spokesman for Australian Treasury Secretary Morrison declined to comment on whether Morrison's office or the FIRB has provided advice to the state government.
    
    Although China is Australia's largest trading partner and a major investor, the Australian government has closely cooperated with Canada and the United States in intelligence matters. Canadian funds have been involved in recent infrastructure deals in Australia, including the Asciano sale of the port and rail transport group, and the sale of transmission grid operator Transgrid.
    
    Mark Beeson, a professor of international relations at the University of Western Australia, said that if 100% foreign ownership of Ausgrid is allowed, then Australia faces the risk of annoying China.
    
    "Others at RENHE COMMERCIAL HOLDINGS COMPANY LIMITED in China will confidently ask, 'What's going on?'" He said.
    
    Last month, Chinese Ministry of Commerce spokesman Shen Danyang said there is a clear tendency toward trade protectionism in the decision not to support Ausgrid's acquisition of Ausgrid by Chinese officials and seriously affect the enthusiasm of Chinese enterprises to invest in Australia. [nB9T18H06L]
    
    But one investment banker said North American bidders are allowed to bid through consortia or to help the Australian government justify refusing China State Grid and the Yangtze River infrastructure. China State Grid and the Yangtze River Infrastructure before the consortium did not participate in bidding. (Finish)
    
    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nL3N1BD2XX] to capture browse ****

 (Compilation Zhang Tao / Li Chunxi / Wang Chen; revisers Zhang Mingjun / Wang Hongying / Li Tingyi)
 ((chen.wang@thomsonreuters.com; 8610-66271255; Reuters
Messaging: chen.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 更正-《焦點》澳洲拒絕中資企業收購Ausgrid，青睞北美買家--消息人士

Content:
路透台北9月14日 - 台灣財政部長周三稱，財政部會對台灣大型公股金控--兆豐金<2886.TW>旗下紐約分行被重罰一案中，有行政責任的人求償。
    
    財政部長許虞哲首度針對此案，提出會對負有行政責任的人提出求償。他在記者會中表示，財政部遲至8月中才獲知兆豐被重罰一事。這個案子中，包括行政責任、刑事責任的部分要追查。
    
    〞針對有行政責任的人會向他們求償，...有責任的不會放過去，〞許虞哲說。
    
    財政部次長蘇建榮表示，財政部對兆豐金的董事長和總經理是委任關係，近期財政部已針對此事約談所有的董事，後續情況會再向行政院報告。
    
    兆豐銀紐約分行因涉嫌洗錢遭美國重罰1.8億美元，引起軒然大波，並導致金融高層人事動盪。兆豐金前董事長徐光曦上任甫半個月即閃辭，由第一金控<2892.TW>前董事長張兆順接掌兆豐集團董事長職務。[nL3T1BE3GC](完)

 (記者 高潔如; 審校)
 ((jeanny.kao@thomsonreuters.com; 8862-25008441; Reuters Messaging:
jeanny.kao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei 14 Sept - Taiwan's finance ministers said on Wednesday that the Ministry of Finance will have the administrative responsibility to impose a heavy fines on New York branch of Taiwan's major public company Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. - Mega Financial Inc. <2886.TW> People claim.
    
    For the first time, Xu Yuzhe, the minister of finance, proposed to seek compensation from those with administrative responsibilities. He said at a press conference that the Ministry of Finance was informed that MegaFun was severely punished as late as mid August. In this case, including administrative responsibility, part of criminal responsibility should be traced.
    
    "Those who have administrative responsibilities will seek compensation from them and ... they will not let themselves go down with responsibility," said Xu Yuzhe.
    
    Su Jianrong, the deputy head of the Ministry of Finance, said that the MOF appointed the chairman and general manager of MegaFinancial. Recently, the MOF has interviewed all the directors for the matter and subsequent reports will be reported to the Executive Yuan.
    
    Mega Banking Corp.'s New York branch was heavily punished for U.S. $ 180 million on suspicion of money laundering, causing a great uproar and causing turmoil in top financial personnel. Mega Forward Former Chairman Xu Guangxi took office just two weeks after the resignation, the first Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. <2892.TW> former chairman Zhang Zhaoshun took over the trustee chairman position. [nL3T1BE3GC] (End)

 (Reporter Gao Jie, review)
 ((jeanny.kao@thomsonreuters.com; 8862-25008441; Reuters Messaging:
jeanny.kao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 台灣個股：財政部將對兆豐銀紐約分行遭重罰案有行政責任的人求償

Content:
路透台北9月8日 - 台灣金管會周三公布，核處兆豐銀行1,000萬台幣罰緩，並暫停兆豐銀行申設海外分支機構，直到該行內控缺失完成改善為止。
    
    金管會此前初步約詢兆豐銀相關人員，初步發現六大缺失：其紐約分行對於防制洗錢作業無完整內部作業手冊，對於防制洗錢法令未充分了解，致無法落實執行；兆豐銀行知悉紐約分行極有可能遭NYDFS採取監理行動後，未及時派員赴美督導及溝通，錯失協助良機等。
    
    兆豐金控<2886.TW>於8月19日表示，旗下子公司兆豐銀行美國紐約分行被紐約州罰款10天內繳交1.8億美元罰金，因其無法滿足相關反恐/反洗錢法令規定。[nL3T1B306R](完)

 (記者 詹靜宜； 審校 喬艷紅)
 ((Emily.Chan@thomsonreuters.com; +886-2-25008440; Reuters
Messaging: Emily.Chan.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Taipei, Sept. 8 - The Taiwan Financial Management Administration announced on Wednesday that it will remit 10 million Taiwanese bankruptcies to Siu Fung Bank and suspend Mega Bank's overseas affiliates until the lack of internal control is completed.
    
    The HKMA initially made an initial inquiry on relevant personnel of Mega Bank and initially found six major deficiencies: the New York branch did not have a complete internal operation manual on anti-money laundering operations and did not fully understand the anti-money-laundering laws and regulations and was unable to implement the plan. Mega Bank was aware New York Branch is most likely to be supervised by NYDFS. After failing to provide timely supervision and communication to the United States, the New York branch missed the opportunity to assist.
    
    Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. <2886.TW> said on August 19 that its subsidiary, Mega Bank New York Branch in the United States, was fined New York State within 10 days for a fine of 180 million U.S. dollars for failing to meet the relevant counter-terrorism / Anti-money laundering regulations. [nL3T1B306R] (End)

 (Reporter Zhan Jingyi; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((Emily.Chan@thomsonreuters.com; + 886-2-25008440; Reuters
Messaging: Emily.Chan.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 台灣金融：金管會處兆豐銀1,000萬台幣罰鍰，暫停申設海外分支機構

Content:
(新增金管會副主委桂先農談話)
    路透台北9月14日 - 針對台灣兆豐金控<2886.TW>旗下紐約分行遭美重罰1.8億美元，金管會周三宣布核處兆豐銀行1,000萬台幣罰鍰，並暫停該行申請增設海外分支機構，直到該行內控缺失完成改善為止。
    
    金管會副主委桂先農在一場臨時記者會作出以上表述。他並宣布解除兆豐金控前董事長蔡友才派任兆豐銀行董事職務，並命令該行解除總經理吳漢卿、紐約分行經理、梁美琪副總、總稽核、法遵長等五人職務。
    
    “在金融界這麼久，第一次看到同時解除五個人職務，”他並表示，專案金檢紐約分行及巴拿馬分行人員將於近日回來，若有發現新事證將進一步處分，絕不寬待。
    
    另金管會也指出，兆豐銀行前總經理徐光曦的責任將交由兆豐銀行檢討，合併其他失職人員責任，將懲處情形函報金管會。
    
    金管會積極研議強化監理具體作法，包括修正金控公司及銀行業內部控制及稽核制度實施辦法，如將國外主管機關調降評等或處分列為銀行應立即向金管會通報事項，或將銀行業重大偶發通報的規定納入辦法。
    
    金管會將於下周邀集相關機關、學者專家及銀行業者會商，徵詢各界意見，並于行政院指示期限內提出具體的監理改進方法。
    
    金管會此前初步約詢兆豐銀相關人員，初步發現六大缺失：其紐約分行對於防制洗錢作業無完整內部作業手冊，對於防制洗錢法令未充分了解，致無法落實執行；兆豐銀行知悉紐約分行極有可能遭NYDFS採取監理行動後，未及時派員赴美督導及溝通，錯失協助良機等。
    
    兆豐金控於8月19日表示，旗下子公司兆豐銀行美國紐約分行被紐約州罰款10天內繳交1.8億美元罰金，因其無法滿足相關反恐/反洗錢法令規定。[nL3T1B306R](完)

 (記者 詹靜宜； 審校 喬艷紅)
 ((Emily.Chan@thomsonreuters.com; +886-2-25008440; Reuters
Messaging: Emily.Chan.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
(Added a new talk to Gui Xiannong, vice chairman of FSC)
    Reuters Taipei September 14 - Taiwan Branch Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. <2886.TW> was fined 180 million U.S. dollars in fine. The Hong Kong Monetary Authority announced a 10-million-yuan Penalties for Mega Bank on Wednesday and was suspended The bank applied for the establishment of overseas branches until the lack of internal control of the bank to complete improvement.
    
    Gui Xiannong, vice chairman of the FSC, made the above statement at a special press conference. He also announced that Cai Youcai, the former chairman of Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd.,had been appointed as a director of Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. and ordered the bank to lift Wu Hanqing, general manager of New York Branch, Vice President Liang Meixi, general inspector and legal compliance officer.
    
    "For the first time in the financial industry, I saw the simultaneous lifting of five positions at the same time." He also said that the New York branch of the project and the staff of the Panama branch will come back in the near future. If it finds that the new incident card will be further punished, it will not be lenient .
    
    The other will also pointed out that the responsibility of the former general manager of Mega Bank Xu Guangxi will be reviewed by the Mega Bank to consolidate the responsibilities of other persons in charge of dereliction of duty, letter of punishment will be reported to the FSC.
    
    The FSC actively explored specific measures to strengthen supervision, including amendments to the Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. and the implementation of the internal control and auditing system of the banking industry. Any changes in the ratings or penalties of foreign regulatory authorities as a bank should be immediately addressed to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange Notification of matters, or the banking sector will be a major incidental notification requirements into the approach.
    
    The FSC will invite relevant authorities, scholars, experts and bankers to consult next week and solicit opinions from all walks of life and propose concrete measures for improvement of supervision within the deadline set by the Executive Yuan.
    
    The HKMA initially made an initial inquiry on relevant personnel of Mega Bank and initially found six major deficiencies: the New York branch did not have a complete internal operation manual on anti-money laundering operations and did not fully understand the anti-money-laundering laws and regulations and was unable to implement the plan. Mega Bank was aware New York Branch is most likely to be supervised by NYDFS. After failing to provide timely supervision and communication to the United States, the New York branch missed the opportunity to assist.
    
    Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. of Mega Financial said on August 19 that its New York branch of Mega Bank America, Inc. was fined New York State within 10 days for a fine of 180 million U.S. dollars because of its inability to satisfy the relevant anti-terrorism / anti-money laundering laws and regulations. [nL3T1B306R] (End)

 (Reporter Zhan Jingyi; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((Emily.Chan@thomsonreuters.com; + 886-2-25008440; Reuters
Messaging: Emily.Chan.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 更新版 1-台灣金融：金管會處兆豐銀1,000萬台幣罰鍰，暫停申設海外分支機構

Content:
(更正標題，應為“北亞”店面，非“北美”店面)
    路透香港9月15日 - 消息人士告訴路透，快餐巨頭麥當勞<MCD.N>已收到至少三大財團對其在中國及香港店面的最終收購要約。全球私募股權公司凱雷集團<CG.O>和TPG Capital已與中國合作夥伴聯手，爭相購買麥當勞這些價值至多30億美元的資產。
    
    據不願具名的消息人士稱，凱雷已與中信集團聯手，而TPG [TPG.UL]與小型超市運營商物美商業集團合作發出各自要約。
    
    房地產公司三胞集團也已對麥當勞這些資產發出要約。三胞之前曾表示，將與北京首旅集團合作。
    
    TPG和凱雷拒絕就他們的最終投標置評。而由於中國正值中秋節假期，中信、物美和三胞均未回復置評請求。
    
    麥當勞重申之前的說法，稱在為這些資產尋找長期合作夥伴方面取得進展。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL3N1BR15S]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 劉秀紅；審校 高琦)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
(Correct the title, should be "North Asia" store, non "North America" ​​storefront)
    Reuters Hong Kong, Sept. 15 - Sources told Reuters that fast food giant McDonald's <MCD.N> has received final offers from at least three consortia for its stores in China and Hong Kong. Global private equity firm Carlyle Group and TPG Capital have teamed up with Chinese partners to buy McDonald's worth up to 3 billion U.S. dollars worth of assets.
    
    According to unnamed sources, Carlyle has teamed up with CITIC Group, and TPG [TPG.UL] has made its own offer in cooperation with the small supermarket operator Wumart.
    
    The real estate company Sanpower also has an offer of these assets to McDonald's. Sanban said it would cooperate with Beijing Capital Tourism Group before.
    
    TPG and Carlyle declined to comment on their final bid. However, as China was hit by the Mid-Autumn Festival holidays, CITIC, Wumart and Sanban did not respond to the request for comment.
    
    McDonald's reiterated earlier statements that it is making progress in finding long-term partners for these assets. (Finish)

    **** For reference, please click [nL3N1BR15S] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Liu Xiuhong; Gao Qi high school)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 更正-美國個股：麥當勞接獲至少三項針對其北亞店面的最終收購要約--消息

Content:
路透上海9月19日 - 中國昆吾九鼎投資控股股份有限公司<600053.SS>日前公告，擬將定向增發募資規模從不超過120億元人民幣，調整為至多15億元。資金用途也由用於基金份額出資等，轉為投向南昌紫金城房地產項目。
    
    九鼎投資表示，自本次非公開發行公告以來，市場環境發生了較大變化，因此對募集資
金投資項目及定價方式進行了重大調整。
    
    本次非公開發行的認購對象拉薩昆吾為九鼎集團全資子公司，以現金方式認購。股份數量不超過4,677萬股，發行價格32.07元/股。
    
    拉薩昆吾是九鼎集團的全資子公司、對外投資及基金份額持有平台，經營範圍為產業投資。投資了公募基金、互聯網金融，同時作為有限合夥人投資參與了多支人民幣基金。
    
    因審議非公開發行事宜，九鼎投資股票9月14日停牌一天，停牌前收報35.28元，最近三個月累計上漲9.12%。(完)

 (發稿 李宏薇; 審校 林高麗)
 ((hongwei.li@thomsonreuters.com; 路透中文新聞部: +86-21-61041782； 傳真 86-21-61041728;
Reuters Messaging: hongwei.li.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai, September 19 - China Kun Wu Jiuding Investment Holdings Co.,Ltd. <600053.SS> announced a few days ago that it plans to increase the scale of private placement from no more than 12 billion yuan to a maximum of 1.5 billion yuan. Funds are also used for fund share capital, etc.,turned into investment in Nanchang Zijin real estate projects.
    
    Jiuding Investment said that since the announcement of this non-public offering, the market environment has undergone major changes, so raise funds
Gold investment projects and pricing methods have undergone major adjustments.
    
    The non-public offering subscription Lhasa Kunwu for the Jiuding Group, a wholly owned subsidiary, subscribe by cash. The number of shares does not exceed 46,677 shares, the issue price of 32.07 yuan / share.
    
    Lhasa Kun Wu is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Jiuding Group, a platform for foreign investment and fund shares, the business scope of investment in the industry. Invested in raised funds, internet finance, and participated in a number of RMB funds as a limited partner.
    
    Due to the review of non-public issuance issues, Jiuding Investment shares suspended on September 14 for one day, before closing at 35.28 yuan, the cumulative increase in the past three months 9.12%. (Finish)

 (Posted Li Hongwei; revising Lin Korea)
 (hongwei.li@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters Department of Chinese Information: + 86-21-61041782; fax 86-21-61041728;
Reuters Messaging: hongwei.li.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國個股：九鼎投資定增募資規模由120億減至15億，用途轉為房地產項目

Content:
路透北京9月20日 - 中國股市滬綜指周二收市微跌。分析師指出，今日大盤開盤後小幅下探，後全日在低位維持弱勢震盪，成交量繼續萎縮，觀望氛圍較濃。盤中熱點切換依然較快，昨天熱門板塊今天悉數回落。國慶節長假臨近，中秋節前離場資金入場意願不強。
            
    滬綜指<.SSEC>收報3,023.00點，跌3.05點或0.1%，上證A股今日成交1,395億元人民幣，上日成交量為1,330億元。
    
   “兩個假連上了，整個市場在10.1長假前就觀望。”新時代證券策略分析師孫衛黨表示。
    
    他認為，近期美聯儲會議疊加11月美國大選結果，令市場不確定性因素較多，投資者態度偏謹慎。同時股指在中秋節前形成技術性破位，破位後大盤可能會有一個修復過程，目前修復過程將會偏慢，所以國慶節前股指弱勢震盪概率較大。
        
    在美國經濟產出、生產率以及通脹上升速度要比過去數十年緩慢的情形下，美國聯邦儲備理事會(FED/美聯儲)決策官員本周料將再度調降對未來利率走向的預估。[nL3T1BV3S8]
    
    松發股份<603268.SS>收跌8.47%，實達集團<600734.SS>收跌5.27%。
                    
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>收報3,257.40點，跌0.18%；滬深300指數期貨主力10月合約<CIFV6>收盤報3,214.4點，漲0.06%，成交7,777手。130億元額度的滬股通<.NQUOTA.SH>凈賣出6.59億元。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 林高麗)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, Sept. 20 - The Shanghai Composite closed slightly lower on Tuesday. Analysts pointed out that today's market opened slightly lower after the opening bell, after the day in the low to maintain the weak turmoil, trading volume continued to shrink, wait and see atmosphere thicker. Hot plate switch is still fast, yesterday, the hot sector down in full. National Day holiday approaching, prior to the Mid-Autumn Festival leave the admission of funds is not strong.
            
    Shanghai Composite <SSE> closed down 3.05 points or 0.1% at 3,023.00. Shanghai A-shares traded 1,395 billion today, up from 133.0 billion the previous day.
    
   "Two fake company, the entire market before the holiday on the sidelines." Sun Wei, a new era of securities strategist, said.
    
    He believes that the recent Federal Reserve meeting in November superimposed the U.S. presidential election results, making the market more uncertainties, investors cautious. At the same time the stock index before the Mid-Autumn Festival to form a technical Powei, Powei after the broader market may have a repair process, the current repair process will be slow, so the National Day preempted shocks greater vulnerability to the stock index.
        
    With U.S. economic output, productivity and inflation slowing more slowly than in the past decades, policymakers at the Federal Reserve (FED / Fed) are expected to once again lower their estimate of future interest rates this week. [nL3T1BV3S8]
    
    Songfa shares <603268.SS> fell 8.47%, Shida Group <600734.SS> closed down 5.27%.
                    
    The CSI 300 Index closed at 3,257.40 points, down 0.18%. The major contract for October CSI300 futures closed at 3,214.4 points, up 0.06% at 7,277 contracts. A total of 65.9 billion yuan was sold on the Shanghai Stock Exchange with a value of 13.0 billion yuan. <NQUOTA.SH> (Finish)

 (Posted Zhang Xiaogu; revising Lin Korea)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))

Title: 惠譽確認台新集團評等；展望穩定 <2887.TW>

Content:
路透北京9月21日 - 新華社周三報導，上海市政府與中國移動通信集團今日簽署共同推進“互聯網＋”戰略合作框架協議，計劃2018年在國內率先開展5G試點，光纖接入覆蓋900萬戶家庭和8,300幢重點商業樓宇。
    
    報導稱，“十三五”期間，中國移動通信集團公司計劃在上海投入260億元人民幣，構建新一代網絡與信息基礎設施，雙方還將圍繞城市管理、產業升級、文化創意、民生服務、創新創業、網絡安全六大領域，共同打造“互聯網＋”發展新優勢。
    
    此外，上海移動將建成全國領先的4G＋精品網絡，在上海臨港率先建成中國移動國際海光纜登陸局，建成具備5億元規模“物”連接能力的、覆蓋上海市的新型物聯專網，在臨港地區推進20萬平方米綠色雲數據中心建設。    

    工信部此前發布“互聯網＋”指導意見的行動計劃（2015－2018年），目標是到2018年互聯網與製造業融合進一步深化；基本建成寬帶、融合、泛在、安全的下一代國家信息基礎設施；初步形成自主可控的新一代信息技術產業體系。[nL3T1441GD]（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, September 21 - Xinhua News Agency reported on Wednesday that the Shanghai municipal government and China Mobile Communications Corporation signed today a joint framework agreement on "Internet +" strategic cooperation. It plans to pilot a 5G pilot project in China by 2018 and cover 9 million households with fiber access And 8,300 key commercial buildings.
    
    According to reports, during the 13th FYP period, China Mobile Communications Corporation plans to invest 26 billion yuan in Shanghai to build a new generation of network and information infrastructure. Both parties will also focus on urban management, industrial upgrading, cultural creativity, livelihood services and innovation Entrepreneurship and network security in six major areas to jointly create "Internet +" new development advantages.
    
    In addition, Shanghai Mobile will build a leading 4G + boutique network in Shanghai Lingang took the lead to build China Mobile International Lan Cable Landing Board, built with 500 million yuan scale "thing" connectivity, covering Shanghai's new IOT network, at Lingang promote 200,000 square meters of green cloud data center construction.

    The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT) previously released the action plan (2015-2018) guiding the "Internet +" with the goal of further deepening the integration of the Internet and manufacturing industries by 2018; basically building the next generation of national information infrastructure in broadband, convergence, ubiquity and security; Initially formed a new generation of independent controllable information technology industrial system. [nL3T1441GD] (End)

 (Posting Zhang Xiaoguang; proofreading)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 電信產業：上海計劃在2018年率先開展5G試點，光纖覆蓋900萬戶家庭--新華

Content:
路透德國漢諾威9月21日 - 大眾汽車(福斯汽車, Volkswagen)<VOWG_p.DE>重型卡車業務主管表示，公司正在研究如何擴大亞洲卡車業務。該公司正尋求建立一個全球化業務，挑戰競爭對手戴姆勒<DAIGn.DE>和沃爾沃<VOLVb.ST>。
    
    大眾汽車在身陷柴油車“排放門”醜聞一年之後力推戰略改革。該公司本月稍早表示，將入股美國卡車製造商Navistar<NAV.N>，這是其與後者在技術和採購方面結盟的部分舉措。
    
    雖然大眾卡車部門先要將旗下MAN和Scania品牌更緊密地協調起來，以進一步節約成本，但海外擴張仍在日程之上，儘管集團的“排放門”醜聞成本不斷上升。
    
    “我們的首要目標當然是還處於空白狀態的北美市場，”大眾卡車部門主管chief Andreas表示，與Navistar的交易將使大眾打入利潤豐厚的美國卡車市場。“我們也在關注印度。”
    
    “可以想象，我們也會對亞洲有些想法。”Renschler在漢諾威卡車展上對記者表示，但並未具體說明。
    
    這位戴姆勒卡車部門的前主管稱，大眾卡車部門正在考慮如何進一步擴大中國業務。大眾旗下的MAN<MANG.DE>持有中國重汽車(香港)有限公司<3808.HK>的股權。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL8N1BX427]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 王穎；審校 龔芳)
 ((ying.wang1@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271244; Reuters
Messaging: ying.wang1.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Hanover, Germany, Sept. 21 - Volkswagen Volkswagen <VOWG_p.DE> The head of heavy truck business said the company is looking into ways to expand its truck business in Asia. The company is seeking to establish a global business that will challenge rivals Daimler AG and Volvo <VOLVB.ST>.
    
    Volkswagen pushed for strategic reforms a year after it was caught in a "dumping door" scandal of diesel vehicles. Earlier this month, the company said it would buy U.S. truck maker Navistar <NAV.N> as part of its alliance with the latter in technology and sourcing.
    
    While Volkswagen's truck division first wants to bring its MAN and Scania brands closer together to further reduce costs, overseas expansion is still on the agenda, despite rising costs for the Group's "exit door" scandal.
    
    "Our primary goal is of course the North American market, which is still in its infancy," chief Andreas, head of Volkswagen Trucks, said the deal with Navistar will push the public into the lucrative US truck market. "We are also looking at India."
    
    "It is conceivable that we also have some ideas for Asia," Renschler told reporters at the Hanover Truck Show but did not specify.
    
    The former head of Daimler Trucks said the Volkswagen truck division is considering how to further expand its operations in China. MAN <MANG.DE> owned by Volkswagen owns a stake in China National Heavy Duty Truck (Hong Kong) Limited <3808.HK>. (Finish)

    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nL8N1BX427] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Wang Ying; proofreading Gong Fang)
 ((ying.wang1@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271244; Reuters
Messaging: ying.wang1.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 歐洲個股：大眾卡車部門主管有意擴大亞洲業務，特別提及印度

Content:
路透上海9月23日 - 中國山東高速股份有限公司<600350.SS>周五公告，擬向安邦資產管理公司和華融國際信託定向增發不超過7.08億股股份，募資約40億元人民幣，其中安邦資產認購九成。
    
    山東高速本次定增募資將投向濟南至青島高速公路改擴建工程項目，發行價格為5.65元/股。
    
    安邦資產是安邦保險集團旗下專業資產管理公司，註冊資本6億元。以受托管理保險資金為主業，投資範圍涵蓋固定收益類資產、權益類資產、不動產類資產等。同時提供受托保險資金投資管理，定向或集合保險資產管理產品，以及基礎設施債權投資計劃、不動產投資計劃、項目資產支持計劃等創新金融產品等。
    
    因籌劃非公開發行股票事項，山東高速股票自9月7日起停牌，停牌前收報6.68元。今日公告後開市起復牌。(完)    
    
    參看詳情，可點選上海證券交易所網站 http://www.sse.com.cn/disclosure/listedinfo/announcement/c/2016-09-23/600350_20160923_4.pdf
    http://www.sse.com.cn/disclosure/listedinfo/announcement/c/2016-09-23/600350_20160923_1.pdf

 (發稿 李宏薇 審校 喬艷紅)
 ((hongwei.li@thomsonreuters.com; 路透中文新聞部: +86-21-61041782； 傳真 86-21-61041728;
Reuters Messaging: hongwei.li.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai, Sept. 23 - China Shandong Expressway Co.,Ltd. (600350.SS) announced on Friday it planned to issue no more than 708 million shares to Ampang Asset Management Co. and Huarong International Trust with a total fund raising of about RMB4 billion , Of which Ampang Asset Subscription Jiucheng.
    
    Shandong Expressway will increase investment to invest in Jinan to Qingdao Expressway expansion project, the issue price of 5.65 yuan / share.
    
    Ampang Asset is Anbang Insurance Group's professional asset management company with a registered capital of 600 million yuan. Fiduciary management of insurance funds based industry, investment scope covers fixed income assets, equity assets, real estate assets. At the same time, it will provide entrusted insurance fund investment management, directional or collective insurance asset management products, as well as innovative financial products such as infrastructure debt investment plan, real estate investment plan and project asset support plan.
    
    Due to planning non-public offering of stock matters, Shandong Expressway shares suspended since September 7, before closing at 6.68 yuan. After the announcement today opened the market resume trading. (Finish)    
    
    For details, please click on the website of Shanghai Stock Exchange http://www.sse.com.cn/disclosure/listedinfo/announcement/c/2016-09-23/600350_20160923_4.pdf
    http://www.sse.com.cn/disclosure/listedinfo/announcement/c/2016-09-23/600350_20160923_1.pdf

 (Posted by Hongwei Li Revised Qiao Yanhong)
 (hongwei.li@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters Department of Chinese Information: + 86-21-61041782; fax 86-21-61041728;
Reuters Messaging: hongwei.li.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國個股：山東高速擬定增募資約40億，安邦資產將認購九成

Content:
路透上海9月26日 - 中國大型券商--國泰君安證券<601211.SS>周日晚公告稱，擬發行不超過10.4億股H股（超額配售權行使前），募集資金將全部用於增加資本金，補充營運資金，用於境內外證券相關業務發展及投資。
    
    公告稱，為進一步提高資本實力和綜合競爭力，深入推進國際化戰略，成為本土全面領先、具有國際競爭力的綜合金融服務商，該公司決定發行H股並在香港聯交所主板上市。公司還將授予國際承銷商不超過上述發行H股規模15%的超額配售選擇權。
    
    在充分考慮公司現有股東利益、投資者接受能力以及發行風險等情況下，國泰君安董事會將按照國際慣例，通過訂單需求和簿記建檔，根據發行時國內外資本市場情況、參照可比公司在國內外市場的估值水平確定本次H股的發行價格。
    
    而據湯森路透旗下IFR本月中報導，國泰君安計劃2017年上半年于香港上市，集資至少20億美元。報導並稱，國泰君安最近邀請投行參加遴選，以角逐承銷商席位。[nL3T1BO1U6]
    
    2015年6月，國泰君安首次公開發行（IPO）A股15.25億股，每股發行價19.71元，籌資300.58億元人民幣，成為當年國內最大規模的IPO。
    
    國內大型券商近年來紛紛在港上市，打通國際融資平台，例如中信證券<600030.SS><6030.HK>、海通證券<600837.SS><6837.HK>、廣發證券<000776.SZ><1776.HK>等。
    
    國泰君安上周五收報18.03元，過去一個月累計微跌0.2%。（完）

 (發稿 林琦; 審校 張喜良)
 ((路透中文新聞部:+86-21-61041787;傳真 86-21-61041728 ;qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai, Sept. 26 - The announcement by China's major brokerage, Guotai Junan Securities <601211.SS>, on Sunday night said it plans to issue no more than 1.04 billion H shares (before the exercise of the over-allotment option), and the raised funds will all be used to increase capital Gold, replenish working capital for domestic and overseas securities related business development and investment.
    
    The announcement said that in order to further enhance its capital strength and overall competitiveness, it will further promote its internationalization strategy and become an integrated financial service provider with comprehensive domestic and international competitiveness. The company decided to issue H shares and list on the main board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. The Company will also grant the International Underwriters an option of over-allotment of not more than 15% of the above-mentioned issue of H Shares.
    
    Taking into account the interests of the existing shareholders, the acceptability of investors and the risk of issuance, the Guotai Junan Board of Directors will, in accordance with international practice, through order requirements and bookkeeping, according to the domestic and foreign capital markets at the time of issuance, with reference to comparable companies in domestic and overseas markets The valuation level to determine the issue price of H shares.
    
    According to Thomson Reuters IFR this month, Guotai Junan plans to be listed in Hong Kong in the first half of 2017, raising at least 2 billion US dollars. The report also said Guotai Junan recently invited investment banks to participate in the selection to compete for the underwriter seats. [nL3T1BO1U6]
    
    In June 2015, Guotai Junan IPO 1,525,000,000 shares, issue price of 19.71 yuan per share, raising 30,058,000,000 yuan, becoming the largest IPO in the country.
    
    Major domestic brokerages have listed in Hong Kong in recent years, opening up international financing platforms, such as CITIC Securities <600030.SS> <6030.HK>, Haitong Securities <600837.SS> <6837.HK> GF Securities <000776.SZ> < 1776.HK> and so on.
    
    Guotai Junan closed at 18.03 yuan last Friday, a slight decrease of 0.2% over the past month. (Finish)

 (Press Lin Qi; review Zhang Xi Liang)
 (Reuters Department of Public Information: + 86-21-61041787; Fax 86-21-61041728; qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國個股：國泰君安擬赴港發行不超過10.4億股H股，以增加資本金

Content:
路透香港9月26日 - 據消息人士稱，東亞銀行<0023.HK>擬出售旗下卓佳(Tricor)一事，已獲得約五份最終出價，競購者包括Vistra Group和收購公司Permira。卓佳主要經營股份過戶登記業務，估值約為8億美元。東亞銀行正面臨來自維權投資者Elliott Management的壓力。
    
    消息人士說，對卓佳提交最終出價的競購方還有中國平安<601318.SS>和澳洲Link Market Services。
    
    該交易若能成功，將是東亞銀行進行的首次重大業務出售交易。東亞銀行已有近100年歷史。因市況惡化，香港多家家族所有銀行已脫手易主，但東亞銀行仍以獨立銀行之姿，在匯豐控股<HSBA.L>和渣打銀行<STAN.L>占據主導的香港市場存活下來。
    
    出售卓佳或許還能幫助東亞銀行的管理層安撫部分股東，並讓股東支持公司與Elliott的較量。Elliott要求東亞銀行將自身出售。
    
    和其他金融機構一樣，東亞銀行也因監管方面壓力和中港經濟放緩而受到打擊。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導,請點選[nL3N1C2248]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 汪紅英；審校 蔡美珍)
 ((Hongying.Wang@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271274; Reuters
Messaging: Hongying.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters HONG KONG, Sept 26 (Reuters) - Bank of East Asia (0023.HK) has secured about five final bids for the sale of its Tricor subsidiary, which includes the Vistra Group and acquisition company Permira, according to sources. Tricor mainly engaged in the transfer of shares registered business, valued at about 800 million US dollars. BEA is under pressure from activist investor Elliott Management.
    
    Sources said the final bid for the Tricor bidding are Ping An <601318.SS> and Link Real Estate Investment Trust Market Services Australia.
    
    If successful, the transaction will be the first major business sale by BEA. Bank of East Asia has nearly 100 years of history. As a result of the deteriorating market conditions, many family-owned banks in Hong Kong have turned their heads. However, Bank of East Asia will still survive as an independent bank in the Hong Kong market dominated by HSBC Holdings <HSBC.L> and Standard Chartered <STAN.L>.
    
    The sale of Tricor may also help management in the Bank of East Asia appease some shareholders and allow shareholders to support the company's battle with Elliott. Elliott asked The Bank of East Asia to sell itself.
    
    Like other financial institutions, Bank of East Asia was also hit by regulatory pressure and the economic slowdown in Hong Kong and Mainland. (Finish)

    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nL3N1C2248] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Wang Hongying; Cai Mei-proof revision)
 ((Hongying.Wang@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271274; Reuters
Messaging: Hongying.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：東亞銀行出售旗下卓佳，Vistra和Permira等參與最終出價

Content:
路透聖地亞哥9月26日 - 中國天齊鋰業<002466.SZ>周一稱，已同意收購全球鋰業巨頭智利化工礦業公司(SQM，Sociedad Quimica Y Minera)<SQMa.SN><SQM_pb.SN><SQM.N>略高於2%的股權。
    
    天齊鋰業和SQM是兩家全球最大的鋰生產商。鋰是可充電電池的關鍵成分之一。近月來，受電動汽車有望繁榮的憧憬帶動，各方對該礦物的興趣變得濃厚。
    
    不過，SQM的業務在南美的“鋰三角”，天齊鋰業生產電池並在中國和加拿大擁有資源資產。
    
    根據天齊鋰業提交給深圳證券交易所的公告，天齊鋰業將以每股38美元收購550萬股SQM的B類股，交易總金額約為2.1億美元，並保留收購更多股權的權利。
    
    SQM在聖地亞哥上市的B類股和在納斯達克上市的股票周一跳漲近4%至26美元左右。
Content_EN:
Reuters SAN DIEGO, Sept 26 (Reuters) - China Tianqi Lithium Co.,Ltd. (002466.SZ) said on Monday that it had agreed to acquire the global lithium giant SQM (Sociedad Quimica Y Minera) <SQMa.SN> <SQM_pb.SN> SQM.N> slightly higher than 2% stake.
    
    Tian Qi Lithium Industry and SQM are two of the world's largest lithium producer. Lithium is one of the key components of rechargeable batteries. In recent months, driven by the vision of prosperity for electric vehicles, all parties have become more interested in this mineral.
    
    However, SQM's business is in South America's "lithium TRIANGLE TIRE CO.,LTD", which produces batteries and has resource assets in China and Canada.
    
    According to Tian Qi Lithium Industry submitted to the Shenzhen Stock Exchange announcement, Tian Qi Lithium industry will be 38 dollars per share acquisition of 5.5 million shares of SQM B class, the total amount of approximately 210 million US dollars, and retain the acquisition of more equity right.
    
    SQM's San Diego-listed B shares and Nasdaq-listed shares jumped nearly 4% on Monday to around US $ 26.
Title: 企業併購：中國天齊鋰業將以約2.1億美元收購智利SQM略高於2%的股權

Content:
路透香港9月27日 - 湯森路透旗下基點報導，消息人士稱，華通電腦（惠州）有限公司正在尋求3.5億元人民幣（5,300萬美元）五年期貸款。
    
    玉山商業銀行是本案的初始牽頭行兼簿記行，預計貸款包括A部分1.5億元人民幣和B部分2.5億元人民幣。A和B兩部分加在一起不能超過3.5億美元。
    
    在台灣上市的母公司--華通電腦股份有限公司預計將提供擔保。
    
    所籌資金將用於資本支出和運營資本。
    
    貸款人上次涉足貸款市場是在2014年3月，獲得3,800萬美元五年期定期貸款。遠東國際銀行當時牽頭該案，利率較Libor加碼125個基點。如果台北金融業拆款定盤利率(TAIBOR)和Libor的利差超過35個基點，則貸款人支付超出部分。
    
    華通電腦（惠州）有限公司成立於1996年，是台灣華通電腦的全資子公司，製造電腦、電信和網絡用的印刷電路板。（完）
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP49643a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 高琦 審校 白雲)
 ((kelly.gao@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-6627-1011; Reuters
Messaging: kelly.gao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong Sept. 27 - Thomson Reuters' Qidan reported that Huatong Computer (Huizhou) Co.,Ltd. is seeking a 350 million yuan (53 million U.S. dollars) five-year loan.
    
    Yushan Commercial Bank is the initial lead and bookrunner of the case. It is estimated that the loans include RMB150 million for Part A and RMB250 million for Part B. A and B together can not exceed 350 million US dollars.
    
    Wah Tung Computer Co.,Ltd.,the parent company listed in Taiwan, is expected to provide a guarantee.
    
    The funds raised will be used for capital expenditures and working capital.
    
    The last time lenders were involved in the loan market was $ 38 million in five-year term loans in March 2014. Far East International Bank led the case at that time, with a margin of 125 basis points over Libor. If the interest rate differential between TAIBOR and Libor exceeds 35 basis points, the lender pays the excess.
    
    Founded in 1996, Huatong Computer (Huizhou) Co.,Ltd. is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Taiwan Huatong Computer, a manufacturer of printed circuit boards for computers, telecom and internet. (Finish)
    
    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nRLP49643a] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Gao Qi review Baiyun)
 ((kelly.gao@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-6627-1011; Reuters
Messaging: kelly.gao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 路透基點：華通電腦子公司尋求3.5億元人民幣貸款--TRLPC

Content:
路透香港9月27日 - 湯森路透旗下基點報導，消息人士稱，澳門博彩控股有限公司250億港元等值(32億美元)的項目融資額度分配情況出爐，在一般銀團階段吸引到19家銀行參與。
    
    中國工商銀行澳門分行是本案的牽頭行兼簿記行。該貸款包括六年定期貸以及四年期循環貸，綜合平均年限為五年，綜合利率為加碼約200個基點。
    
    兩筆貸款利率都基於槓桿比率。最初六個月的利率為加碼135個基點。在此之後，如果槓桿比率不超過1.5倍，那麼利率可能提高到加碼150個基點；槓桿比率在1.5-3倍，那麼利率加碼175個基點；槓桿比率為3-4倍，利率加碼200個基點；槓桿比率超過4倍，則利率加碼225個基點。
    
    所籌資金將用於澳門路�城的“上葡京”項目建設。該項目的預算建築成本約為300億港元，預計在2017年第四季完工。
    
    “上葡京”項目包括3家酒店，共計提供約2,000間酒店客房，還有購物、餐飲及娛樂休閑設施。項目將設700張賭桌和1,000部角子機，相關許可正在申請中。（完）
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP49649a]即可擷取瀏覽****
    

 (編譯 高琦 審校 于春紅)
 ((kelly.gao@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-6627-1011; Reuters
Messaging: kelly.gao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Sept. 27 - Thomson Reuters' QM basis reported that sources said that the MOP 25 billion equivalent of MOP $ 2 billion ($ 3.2 billion) in the financing quota allocation of MOP Holdings was released and attracted 19 banks in the general syndication phase. participate.
    
    ICBC Macau Branch is the lead agency and bookkeeper in this case. The loan includes a six-year term loan and a four-year revolving loan with a combined average life of five years and an aggregate interest rate of about 200 basis points plus.
    
    Both loan rates are based on the leverage ratio. The interest rate for the first six months is 135 basis points plus. After that, if the leverage ratio does not exceed 1.5 times, the interest rate may increase to 150bps plus; the leverage ratio will be 1.5-3 times, then the interest rate will increase by 175 basis points; the leverage ratio will be 3-4 times and the interest rate will increase by 200 basis points ; Leverage ratio of more than 4 times, the rate plus 225 basis points.
    
    The funds raised will be used for the construction of the "Lisboa" project in Lucheng, Macao. The estimated construction cost of the project is about HK $ 30 billion and is expected to be completed in the fourth quarter of 2017.
    
    The Lisboa project includes 3 hotels, providing a total of about 2,000 hotel rooms, as well as shopping, dining and entertainment facilities. The project will have 700 table games and 1,000 slot machines, and the relevant licenses are being applied. (Finish)

 (Compiled Gao Qi review in spring red)
 ((kelly.gao@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-6627-1011; Reuters

Title: 路透基點：澳博控股250億港元貸款案的額度分配出爐--TRLPC

Content:
路透香港9月29日 - 湯森路透旗下基點援引消息人士稱，中國互聯網巨頭騰訊的35億美元無追索權貸款已經獲得逾10家銀行承諾貸款超過15億美元。這筆貸款用於支持騰訊收購芬蘭手機遊戲開發商Supercell的多數股權。
    
    消息人士稱，一般銀團階段已經結束。但牽頭行仍在等待一些大額認貸加入。澳新銀行、美銀美林、中國銀行、中國招商銀行、德意志銀行、匯豐和上海浦東發展銀行為這筆融資案的牽頭行兼簿記行(MLAB)以及承銷商，貸款期限五年，分為30億美元定期貸款和5億美元循環貸款。七家MLAB已經給出不等額包銷承諾，貸款的最高綜合收益為235.1個基點，利率較倫敦銀行間拆放款利率(Libor)加碼212個基點，貸款平均年限為4.314年。借款人為Inari SARL。[nL3T1BR1UQ](完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP49739a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 李婷儀 審校 孫茉莉)
 ((tina.li1@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-25022095; Reuters
Messaging: tina.li1.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, September 29 (Reuters) - Thomson Reuters' quoting a source close to Thomson Reuters sources said that China's Internet giant Tencent's non-recourse loan of $ 3.5 billion has secured more than 10 bank loans of more than $ 1.5 billion. The loan is to support Tencent's acquisition of a majority stake in Finnish mobile game developer Supercell.
    
    According to sources, the general syndicate phase has ended. However, the lead bank is still waiting for some large loans to join. ANZ Bank, Bank of America Merrill Lynch, Bank of China, China Merchants Bank, Deutsche Bank, HSBC and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank lead the book and MLB (underwriters) and underwriters for the financing, with a five-year loan term divided into 3 billion U.S. dollars of fixed-term loans and 500 million U.S. dollars of revolving loans. The seven MLABs have given unequally underwritten commitments with a maximum syndicated return of 235.1 basis points and a 212 basis point margin increase over the London Libor rate with an average loan life of 4. 314 years. The borrower is Inari SARL. [nL3T1BR1UQ] (End)

 ((tina.li1@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-25022095; Reuters

Title: 路透基點：騰訊35億美元融資案已獲得承諾貸款逾15億美元--TRLPC

Content:
路透上海9月29日 - 據湯森路透最新統計數據，今年來中國企業在全球股權資本市場的募資總額達1,099億美元，較上年同期（1,153億美元）下降4.6%，其中三季度募資總額環比增長164.2%達463億美元。
    
    股權資本市場一般包括首次公開發行（IPO）、再融資和可轉換產品。截止周二（27日），中國企業今年來在境內外的IPO募資總額為288億美元，同比下降31.6%，金融業和工業的企業IPO的市場份額占據前兩位，分別占據逾五成和一成的市場份額。
    
    中國郵儲銀行<1658.HK>74億美元的IPO成為今年來最大一筆股權發行交易。該交易也是自阿里巴巴集團<BABA.N>於2014年在紐約證券交易所創造250億美元IPO記錄以來，全球最大的IPO交易。
    
    2016年前三季度A股市場IPO募集資金規模達132億美元，比2015年前三季度（234億美元）減少43.5%，這亦是2014年以來的最低紀錄。2014年的低迷是因為中國本土IPO市場暫停了四個月，使得中國企業將目光投向海外市場，今年則是因為缺乏大型IPO項目。
    
    今年以來，中國企業全球股權增發的募資額達676億美元，同比增長4.5%；其中A股增發募資607億美元，同比增加46.3%.

    日本軟銀集團<9984.T>發行的66億美元強制性可交換信託（包括綠鞋期權），作為減持阿里巴巴集團股份計劃的一部分，是今年以來規模最大的亞太換股發行和全球最大的可轉換發行交易。這筆交易亦屬該地區首筆此類結構交易，推動中國股權相關發行或者可轉換債發行達到135億美元，募集額增長59.4%。
    
　　今年迄今，中國股權資本市場發行承銷商排名中，摩根士丹利<MS.N>保持首位，以93億美元的承銷總額占據8.5%的市場份額。中信證券<600030.SS><6030.HK>位居第二，市場占比為8.4%；德意志銀行<DBKGn.DE>在5.0%的市場份額排名第三。摩根士丹利和德銀是軟銀66億美元強制可轉換信託的聯席賬簿管理人。 （完）  

 (發稿 林琦; 審校 曾祥進)
 ((路透中文新聞部:+86-21-61041787;傳真 86-21-61041728 ;qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai, September 29 - According to the latest statistics from Thomson Reuters, Chinese companies raised a total of 109.9 billion U.S. dollars in global equity capital markets this year, down 4.6% over the same period of previous year (115.3 billion U.S. dollars), of which the third quarter Total investment increased 164.2% sequentially to 46.3 billion U.S. dollars.
    
    Equity capital markets generally include initial public offerings (IPO), refinancing and convertible products. As of Tuesday (January 27), Chinese companies raised a total of US $ 28.8bn in domestic and overseas IPO funds this year, down 31.6% from the same period of last year. The market shares of financial and industrial IPOs accounted for the top two, accounting for over 50% Into a market share.
    
    China Postal Savings Bank <1658.HK> The $ 7.4 billion IPO became the largest equity issue this year. The deal is also the world's largest IPO since Alibaba Group <BABA.N> created a $ 25 billion IPO record on the New York Stock Exchange in 2014.
    
    In the first three quarters of 2016, the IPO funds raised in the A-share market reached 13.2 billion U.S. dollars, a decrease of 43.5% over the first three quarters of 2015 (23.4 billion U.S. dollars), the lowest level since 2014. The downturn in 2014 was due to a four-month moratorium on the domestic IPO market in China, causing Chinese companies to focus on overseas markets this year due to the lack of large-scale IPO projects.
    
    Since the beginning of this year, the total amount of global equity investment raised by Chinese companies has reached 67.6 billion U.S. dollars, up 4.5% over the same period of last year. Among which, the A-share issuance increased by 46.3% to 60.7 billion U.S. dollars.

    Japan's Softbank Group's $ 6.6 billion mandatory exchangeable trust (including green shoe options) issued by Softbank Group <9984.T>, as part of a plan to reduce Alibaba Group shares, is the largest Asia-Pacific share issuance and largest in the world Convertible issue transaction. The deal was also the first of its kind in the region, raising US $ 13.5bn in equity-related or convertible debt issuance in China, raising 59.4%.
    
So far this year, Morgan Stanley <MS.N> has topped China's issuer list of equity capital markets, taking 8.5% of the market with a total underwriting of 9.3 billion. CITIC Securities ranked second in the market with a market share of 8.4% and Deutsche Bank DBKGn.DE ranked third with 5.0% market share. Morgan Stanley and Deutsche Bank are the joint bookrunners of the mandatory convertible trust of SoftBank $ 6.6 billion. (Finish)  

 (Press Lin Qi; Review Zeng Xiang)
 (Reuters Department of Public Information: + 86-21-61041787; Fax 86-21-61041728; qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國企業：今年來在全球股權融資達1,099億美元，同比減4.6%--湯森路透

Content:
路透香港9月29日 - 中國大型建築機械公司--中聯重科<1157.HK><000157.SZ>周四宣布，擬與內地夥伴合作設立一支規模32.1億元人民幣的產業併購基金，主要投資於產業併購升級、國資國企改革等領域。
    
    公司的聲明稱，其他出資方包括綠地金融投資控股集團、安徽省鐵路發展基金、新揚子造船、上海鈺恩環保科技、上海長泰投資和上海合德永鑫。基金名稱暫定為�上海綠聯君和產業併購股權投資基金合夥企業（有限合夥）�，基金期限七年，其中投資期四年，退出期三年。
    
    基金有限合夥人在基金中合計出資32億元，其中中聯重科旗下中聯資本、鐵路基金、新揚子造船、上海鈺恩、長泰投資、合德永鑫各擬出資5億元人民幣，綠地金控擬出資2億元。此外，基金管理公司在基金中出資1,000萬元。
    
    中聯重科表示，金融業務是公司未來重點培育發展的業務板塊，與業內領先的產業集團、專業投資機構和管理團隊加強合作，可以更穩健、規範的參與金融投資運作。

    公司續稱，這本次合作設立的產業併購基金，擬抓住中國經濟轉型升級的機會，依托各出資方的產業資源和基金管理團隊的專業能力，投資於產業鏈相關細分領域內的領先企業，同時把握國資國企改革投資機會。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布于香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0929/LTN20160929294_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 曾祥進)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Sept 29 - Zoomlion <1157.HK> <000157.SZ>, a large construction machinery company in China, announced on Thursday that it plans to co-operate with Mainland partners in setting up a M & A fund of 3.21 billion RMB, Major investment in industrial mergers and acquisitions, state-owned reform of state-owned enterprises and other fields.
    
    The company's statement said other financiers include Greenland Financial Investment Holding Group, Anhui Provincial Railway Development Fund, New Yangtze Shipbuilding, Shanghai Yuen Environmental Science and Technology, Shanghai Changtai Investment and Shanghai Hede Yongxin. The fund is tentatively scheduled to be   Shanghai Green Alliance Jun and M & A Equity Investment Fund Partnership (Limited Partnership)   with a term of seven years, of which the investment period is four years and the exit period is three years.
    
    The fund's limited partners invested a total of 3.2 billion yuan in the fund, of which Zoomlion's Zoomlion capital, railway fund, the new Yangtze Shipbuilding, Shanghai Yuen, Changtai Investment, Hop Tak Yongxin each intends to invest 500 million yuan, Greenland Gold Control invested 200 million yuan. In addition, the fund management company invested 10 million yuan in the fund.
    
    Zoomlion said that the financial business is the company's future focus on nurturing the development of the business sector, and industry-leading industry groups, professional investment institutions and management teams to strengthen cooperation, more robust and standardized financial investment operations.

    The Company continued to say that the M & A fund set up by the cooperation intends to seize the opportunity of China's economic restructuring and upgrading and relies on its industrial resources and fund management team's professional capabilities to invest in leading enterprises in the relevant segments of the industrial chain At the same time, we should take the chance to reform the state-owned enterprises in the country. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement of a listed company on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/0929/LTN20160929294_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revisers Zeng Xiang)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中港個股：中聯重科組產業併購基金，把握國資國企改革投資機會

Content:
路透香港9月29日 - 港交所<0388.HK>子公司香港中央結算有限公司周四宣布，委任中國工商銀行（亞洲）有限公司為交收銀行，自10月3日起生效。
    
    中央結算公司的交收銀行支援港交所證券結算業務的款項交收。
    
    港交所結算主管戴志堅說，“工銀亞洲是中國最大商業銀行--中國工商銀行<1398.HK><601398.SS>的海外業務旗艦，結算參與者與我們進行日常交收時將有更多選。”
    
    除了工銀亞洲外，現時共有四間交收銀行，分別是香港上海匯豐銀行有限公司、渣打銀行（香港）有限公司、華僑永亨銀行有限公司及中國銀行（香港）有限公司。（完）

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 曾祥進)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Sep. 29 - HKEX <0388.HK> A subsidiary of the Company, Hong Kong Securities Clearing Company Limited announced on Thursday that it has appointed Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) Limited as the settlement bank with effect from October 3.
    
    The settlement bank of CCDC supports the settlement of the settlement of the securities of the HKEx.
    
    Dai Zhijian, Settlement Supervisor of HKEx, said: "ICBC (Asia) is the flagship overseas business of China's largest commercial bank, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China <1398.HK> <601398.SS>, settlement participants will have more to do with their daily settlement Multiple choice. "
    
    Apart from ICBC (Asia), there are currently four settlement banks, namely The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited, Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited, Overseas Chinese Wing Hang Bank Limited and Bank of China (Hong Kong) Limited. (Finish)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Zeng Xiang)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港證券：中央結算公司委任工銀亞洲為交收銀行，自10月3日起生效

Content:
路透華盛頓9月29日 - 美國國際貿易委員會周四聽證會上，出現罕見的中國產業團體官員身影。針對中國過剩鋁產能威脅到美國及全球鋁生產商及加工商的指責，中國鋁行業團體提出反駁。
    
    與會團體官員辯稱，中國鋁行業一直是全球經濟的一個重要貢獻力量。
    
    “我們相信，通過對話和合作，我們能夠有效處理全球鋁行業面臨的挑戰，”中國有色金屬工業協會官員在陳詞中表示。
    
    此次聽證會是美國眾議院籌款委員會所要求一項調查的一部分，美國、加拿大、歐洲和俄羅斯團體企業參與聽證，範圍涵蓋冶煉、擠制和回收再生等領域。他們指稱中國過剩的產能是由政府政策主導，已導致全球範圍內鋁材降價。
    
    中國鋁行業團體官員稱，中國鋁材行業發展是由預計成長的中國內需推動。他們並稱，中國政府已經淘汰了一部分落後產能，並且還在減少對該行業的投資。
    
    在此之前，美國一些行業企業已敦促華盛頓對部分中國鋁材生產商徵收反補貼和反傾銷稅。
    
    美國商務部正在調查中國忠旺<1333.HK>。此前美國鋁擠壓材協會(Aluminum Extruders Council)指控忠旺逃避美國針對鋁擠壓產品的進口關稅。[nL3T12Q1AG](完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL2N1C600X]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 劉秀紅；審校 蔡美珍)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Washington, September 29 - US International Trade Commission hearing on Thursday, there is a rare figure of Chinese industrial officials. In response to accusations that China's surplus aluminum production threatens the aluminum producers and processors in the United States and the world, the aluminum industry group in China has put forward a counter-argument.
    
    Officials at the participating groups argued that the aluminum industry in China has always been an important contributor to the global economy.
    
    "We believe that through dialogue and cooperation, we can effectively handle the challenges facing the global aluminum industry," said an official of China Nonferrous Metal Industry Association.
    
    The hearing was part of a poll called for by the U.S. House of Representatives Ways and Means Committee. The U.S.,Canadian, European and Russian corporations participated in the hearing, ranging from smelting, extrusion and recycling. They allege that excess capacity in China is dominated by government policies that have led to a price cut for aluminum on a global scale.
    
    According to officials from China's aluminum industry group, the development of China's aluminum industry is driven by the expected growth of domestic demand in China. They also said that the Chinese government has already eliminated some of its backward production capacity and is still reducing its investment in the industry.
    
    Prior to this, some U.S. industry players had urged Washington to impose anti-subsidy and anti-dumping duties on some Chinese aluminum producers.
    
    US Department of Commerce is investigating China Zhongwang <1333.HK>. Earlier, the Aluminum Extruders Council accused Zhongwang of escaping U.S. import duties on aluminum extrusion products. [nL3T12Q1AG] (End)

    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nL2N1C600X] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Liu Xiuhong; Cai Mei-zhen review)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中美貿易：中國鋁行業高管出席美國貿易聽證會，敦促對話與合作

Content:
路透台北9月30日 - 台灣貨幣市場10月提存期資金預期變化因素摘要如下：
        
    寬鬆因素：
    --央行存單到期<TWNCDTB1>4兆(萬億)5,964.8億台幣。

Title: 台灣貨幣市場：10月提存期資金預期變化一覽表

Content:
(新增集團回應及背景)
    路透香港9月30日 - 香港主要地產商--新世界發展<0017.HK>周五發布聲明稱，公司創辦人鄭裕彤昨晚因病辭世，終年91歲，其長子兼新世界發展主席鄭家純表示，父親的離世對集團運作不會有影響。
    
    鄭氏家族發出的新聞稿稱，鄭裕彤昨晚因病安詳辭世，臨終前家人一直陪伴身邊。有關葬禮安排將於稍後公布。
    
    鄭家純在新世界總部樓下對等候的記者表示，父親去世不會對集團有影響。
    
    �他已四年在病床，給不了新世界什麼。�他說。
    
    鄭裕彤是周大福集團及新世界發展的創辦人，在2012年辭任新世界發展主席職務，他當時接受媒體採訪時表示，工作了六、七十年，希望�享一下清福�，因此決定退休。然而，同年9月卻傳出他中風入院的消息，其後亦沒有再在公開場合露面。
    
    由鄭裕彤創立的周大福集團，持有多家上市公司，包括房地產旗艦--新世界發展、新創建<0659.HK>、新世界百貨<0825.HK>、周大福珠寶<1929.HK>等。（完）

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 曾祥進)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
(Add Group Response and Background)
    Reuters, Hong Kong, Sept 30 - Hong Kong major developer - New World Development <0017.HK> said in a statement on Friday that the founder of the company, Cheng Yu Tung, died at the age of 91 last night. The eldest son and chairman of New World Development, Said his father's death will not affect the operation of the group.
    
    The news release issued by the Zheng family said that Cheng Yu-tung died last night due to illness and died before his family members have been with him. The funeral arrangements will be announced later.
    
    Zheng told reporters waiting downstairs at the New World Headquarters that his father's death will not affect the group.
    
       He has been in bed for four years, can not give anything new world.   he said.
    
    Cheng Yu Tung, founder of CHOW TAI FOOK JEWELERY GROUP LIMITED and New World Development, resigned as chairman of New World Development in 2012. In an interview with the media at that time, Cheng Yu Tung said that after working for six or seventy years, he hopes to enjoy the happiness , So decided to retire. However, in September the same year, it was reported that his stroke was admitted to hospital. No public appearances were made thereafter.
    
    CHOW TAI FOOK JEWELERY GROUP LIMITED, a company founded by Cheng Yu Tung, holds a number of public companies including Real Estate Flagship - NWDS, NWS <0659.HK>, New World Department Store <0825.HK>, CHOW TAI FOOK JEWELERY GROUP LIMITED Jewelry <1929.HK> and so on. (Finish)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revisers Zeng Xiang)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 更新版 1-香港個股：新世界發展創辦人鄭裕彤昨晚因病辭世，終年91歲

Content:
路透香港10月3日 - 中國大型房地產商恆大集團<3333.HK>周一宣布，與深圳經濟特區房地產(深深房)<000029.SZ><200029.SZ>訂立合作協議，後者將通過向恆大境內附屬公司發行A股及/或現金方式購買恆大地產100%股權，從而使恆大間接成為深深房控股股東。
    
    恆大午盤開市前暫停交易，公司在港股收盤後發出公告稱，是項建議重組交易的條款將以正式交易協議為準，不構成目標資產的正式轉讓，具體重組方案及相關交易條款以交易各方正式簽署的重大資產重組協議為準。各方同意自合作協議簽署之日起七個月內進行排他性洽談。
    
    此外，深深房及其控股股東深圳市投資控股有限公司(深投控)同意，在正式協議簽署之前，恆大地產可引入總金額約300億元人民幣的戰略投資者。
    
    聲明未有透露交易作價，深深房以向恆大境內附屬公司--凱隆置業發行股份作為對價，發行價將不低於市場參考價的90%，市場參考價為審議建議重組交易的深深房董事會決議公告日前20個交易日、60個交易日或120個交易日的深深房A股股票交易均價之一，具體發行價格由交易各方協商確定。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布于香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1003/LTN201610031040_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 屈桂娟)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters
Messaging: joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 3 - CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP, a large Chinese real estate developer <3333.HK>, announced on Monday that it has entered into a cooperation agreement with Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Real Estate (深 深 房) <000029.SZ> <200029.SZ>, which will adopt To CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP subsidiaries in the domestic issue of A shares and / or cash purchase CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP real estate 100% stake, so that CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP indirectly become a deep room controlling shareholder.
    
     CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP suspended trading hours before the market opened, the company issued a notice after the close of Hong Kong stocks, said the proposed restructuring of the transaction terms will be based on the official transaction agreement does not constitute a formal transfer of the target assets, the specific reorganization program and the terms of the transaction The parties to the transaction signed a major asset restructuring agreement shall prevail. Each party agrees to conduct exclusive negotiation within seven months from the date of signing the cooperation agreement.
    
    In addition, Shenfangfang and its controlling shareholder Shenzhen Investment Holdings Co.,Ltd. (Shenzhen Investment Holdings Limited) agreed that before the formal agreement was signed, CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP real estate could introduce strategic investors with a total amount of approximately RMB30bn.
    
    The statement did not disclose the transaction price, the deep room to the CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP - Kelon Properties, the domestic issue of shares as the consideration, the issue price will not be less than 90% of the market reference price, the market reference price for the proposed restructuring of the transaction Shenzhen Arsenal Board of Directors resolution announcement 20 trading days before, 60 trading days or 120 trading days of deep room A stock trading average price, the specific issue price negotiated by the parties to the transaction. (Finish)

Title: 企業併購：恆大擬與A股深深房重組成後者控股股東，並私募引資300億元人民幣

Content:
路透香港10月5日 - 湯森路透旗下基點援引消息人士報導，華通電腦(惠州)有限公司已邀請六家銀行參與3.5億元人民幣(5,300萬美元)五年期聯貸案。
    
    銀行業者需承諾貸款7,000萬元人民幣或以上，方可取得牽頭行兼簿記行(MLAB)的頭銜；初始MLAB為玉山商業銀行，該行亦身兼貸款代理行。
    
    參貸邀請於上周送出。到目前為止，台灣銀行及華南商業銀行均已加入，其他銀行則正進行核批的程序。
    
    這項貸款包括A部分1.5億元人民幣和B部分2.5億元人民幣，資金用途分別為資本支出及營運資本。A和B部份合計不得超過3.5億元人民幣。
    
    台灣上市母公司--華通電腦股份有限公司將提供擔保。

    這筆貸款在簽約12個月之後，將以每半年不等額的方式償還。貸款利率為中國人民銀行基準利率的95%。
    
    借款人上次涉足貸款市場是在2014年3月，獲得3,800萬美元五年期定期貸款。遠東國際銀行為初始MLAB兼貸款代理行。有六家銀行加入MLAB，一家銀行為一般參貸行。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP50300a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 龔芳; 審校 徐文焰)
 ((marisa.kung@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-2502-2095; Reuters
Messaging: marisa.kung.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters, Hong Kong, Oct 5 - Thomson Reuters' Qidu Quotes quoted sources as saying that Huatong Computer (Huizhou) Co.,Ltd. has invited six banks to participate in a 350 million yuan (53 million U.S. dollars) five-year loan.
    
    The banker is required to undertake a loan of 70 million yuan or more to acquire the title of MLAB. The initial MLAB is Yushan Commercial Bank, which is also a loan agency.
    
    Participation loan invitation sent last week. So far, Taiwan Bank and South China Commercial Bank have joined, while other banks are undergoing approval procedures.
    
    The loan includes RMB 150 million in Part A and RMB 250 million in Part B, with capital expenditures being capital expenditures and working capital respectively. A and B together can not exceed 350 million yuan.
    
    Taiwan-listed parent - China Computer Co.,Ltd. will provide security.

    After the loan is signed for 12 months, the loan will be repaid in unequal terms every six months. The loan interest rate is 95% of the benchmark interest rate of the People's Bank of China.
    
    The last time the borrower entered the loan market was a $ 38 million five-year term loan in March 2014. Far Eastern International Bank for the initial MLAB loan agency. Six banks joined MLAB and one bank was a general reference bank. (Finish)

 (Compiling Gong Fang; Xu Wenyan review)
 ((marisa.kung@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-2502-2095; Reuters

路透東京10月6日 - 日本股市日經指數<.N225>周四連續第四個交易日上漲，日圓貶值提振投資人風險偏好。富士通股價勁升，因有報導稱聯想集團擬收購其電腦業務。
    
    日經指數<.N225>收漲0.5%，至16,899.10點。
    
    富士通<6702.T>大漲5.7%，稍早路透引述消息人士稱，中國聯想集團<0992.HK>正洽談收購富士通個人電腦業務。[nL3T1CC10Z]
    
    東證股價指數<.TOPX>上漲0.5%，至1,353.93，JPX日經400指數 <.JPXNK400>漲0.5%，至12,123.26。(完)

Tokyo, Oct 6 (Reuters) - Japanese equities Nikkei <.N225> rose for the fourth consecutive day on Thursday, a weaker yen, boosting investor risk appetite. Fujitsu shares soared as there were reports that Lenovo wanted to acquire its computer business.
    
    The Nikkei <.N225> closed up 0.5% at 16,899.10.
    
    Fujitsu <6702.T> soared 5.7% after Reuters quoted sources as saying that Lenovo China <0992.HK> is in talks to acquire Fujitsu's personal computer business. [nL3T1CC10Z]
    
    The Shanghai Stock Exchange <.TOPX> rose 0.5% to 1,353.93 and the JPX Nikkei 400 rose 0.5% to 12,123.26. (Finish)
