Title: 日本股市：日圓貶值激勵日經指數收高四連漲，富士通跳升

Content:
路透台北10月6日 - 台灣第七大銀行--華南銀行副總經理高榮成周四指出，因應未來歐美等選舉及升息不確定因素，已陸續處分手中台幣計價債券(含公債和公司債)及外幣計價債券，至9月底止實現獲利達12億台幣。
    
    他並稱，10月將再處分台幣和外幣債券，初估包含前述已實現的12億台幣獲利，10月估將再實現獲利約8億台幣，合計共20億台幣。
        
    〞未來有幾個重大事件，包括美國選舉、FED升息等和歐洲義大利選舉，到時(債券價格)一定會回頭，既然現在賺就先實現啊。〞他說。
    
    華南金控<2880.TW>董事長吳當傑亦稱，全球關注美國聯準會(FED)今年底會不會升息，〞美國經濟數據如果更好，相信年底升息的機率將升高〞，使得全球債券殖利率會有波動；因此，華銀在債券操作上，會做一些必要的調整。
    
    〞我們的確有一些必要的調整，包括出售和重新布局。〞吳當傑說。
    
    高榮成指出，今年1-9月已處分台幣計價債券(含公債和公司債)共150億台幣，本月將再出脫250億台幣；合計共將出脫400億台幣，約占該行持有債券部位的近一半。
    
    另在外幣計價債券方面，他表示，前9月已處分3億美元外幣債，近期將再處分(包含到期3億美元)，合計達6億美元。
    
    〞10月預估再實現獲利8億台幣；所以，整個專案下來，總共將實現獲利20億台幣，而且，這20億台幣只是資本利得，不含利息收入，如果包含利息收入會更多。〞他說。(完)

 (記者 羅兩莎 ；審校 董永年)
 ((Liang-Sa.Loh@thomsonreuters.com;  886-2-25004895; Reuters Messaging:
Liang-Sa.Loh.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei Oct. 6 - Gao Rongcheng, deputy general manager of Taiwan's seventh largest bank, South China Bank, pointed out on Thursday that it has successively taken away NT $ denominated bonds (including bonds and corporate bonds) in response to the uncertainties of the upcoming elections in Europe and the United States and rate hikes. ) And foreign currency denominated bonds. As of the end of September, it achieved a profit of NT $ 1.2 billion.
    
    He also said that in October the Taiwan dollar and foreign currency bonds will be re-imposed. The initial estimate includes the aforesaid realized profit of 1.2 billion Taiwan dollars. In October, it is estimated that there will be an additional profit of about 800 million NT dollars, totaling 2.0 billion Taiwan dollars.
        
    "There are a few major events in the future, including the U.S. elections, the FED rate hike and the European elections in Europe, and by that time (bond prices) will surely go back, now that the earning is realized first," he said.
    
    South China Mega Financial Holding Company Ltd. <2880.TW> Chairman Wu Dangjie also said that the global concern will be raised by the Federal Reserve by the end of this year. "If the U.S. economic data is better, I believe the rate hike by the end of the year Chances are higher "that global volatility in bond yields will fluctuate; therefore, Huayin will make some necessary adjustments in its bond operations.
    
    "We did have some necessary adjustments, including sales and rearrangement," said Wu Dangjie.
    
    Gao Rongcheng pointed out that from January to September this year, NT $ 15 billion NT dollar denominated bonds (including bonds and corporate bonds) have been disposed of and this year will be set aside another 25 billion Taiwan dollars. Totaling 40 billion NT dollars, Nearly half of the bond area.
    
    In foreign currency-denominated bonds, he said that the first September has disposed of 300 million U.S. dollars of foreign currency debt and will be punished in the near future (including the expiration of 300 million U.S. dollars due for a total amount of 600 million U.S. dollars).
    
    "In October, a further profit of 800 million NT dollars will be realized again. Therefore, a total profit of 2.0 billion NT dollars will be realized for the entire project. Moreover, these NT $ 2 billion will be capital gains only, excluding interest income and more if interest income is included ."He said. (Finish)

 (Reporter Luosha Sha; Dong Yongnian review)
 ((Liang-Sa.Loh@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-25004895; Reuters Messaging:
Liang-Sa.Loh.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 台灣金融：華南銀大舉處分台、外幣債，估將獲利20億台幣--副總經理

Content:
路透香港10月6日 - 中國大型券商招商證券<6099.HK>H股周五首日掛牌，開盤價較招股價高1%。
    
    該股開盤報12.12港元，招股價為12港元，大市恆生指數<.HSI>則開低0.01%。
    
    招商證券<600999.SS>香港IPO（首次公開發售）以低於招股價區間中位值定價，初步發售約8.91億股H股，集資107億港元（13.8億美元），是繼中國郵政儲蓄銀行<1658.HK>之後另一隻較大型新股上市。
    
    是次招股獲得騰訊控股<0700.HK>主席馬化騰、中國人保集團<1339.HK>旗下壽險分支等11名基石投資者捧場，合佔IPO比重61%，金額約65.6億港元。
    
    招股反應尚算理想，面向散戶的公開發售部分錄得4.23倍超額認購，面向機構投資者的國際配售部分亦獲適度超額認購。
    
    招商證券是繼中信證券<6030.HK><600030.SS>、海通證券<6837.HK><600837.SS>、廣發證券<1776.HK><000776.SZ>、華泰證券<6886.HK><601688.SS>、光大證券<6178.HK><601788.SS>及東方證券<3958.HK><600958.SS>之後，第七隻A+H券商股。（完）
        

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 楊淑禎)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Oct 6 - China's major brokerage China Merchants Securities <6099.HK> H shares listed on the first day on Friday, opening price 1% higher than the IPO price.
    
    The stock opened at 12.12 Hong Kong dollars, the offer price of 12 Hong Kong dollars, the market Hang Seng Index <HSI> opened lower 0.01%.
    
    China Merchants Securities <600999.SS> Hong Kong IPO (Initial Public Offer) Pricing Initial placement of about 891 million H shares and raising HK $ 10.7 billion (US $ 1.38 billion) at a price lower than the median IPO price range. Following the opening of the China Postal Savings Bank <1658.HK> after listing of a larger IPO.
    
    IPO of Tencent Holding <0700.HK> Chairman Ma Huateng, 11 cornerstone investors such as Life Insurance Branch of China's PEOPLE'S INSURANCE COMPANY (GROUP) OF CHINA LIMITED (1339.HK), took up 61% of IPO share, About HK $ 6.56 billion.
    
    The IPO response was still quite satisfactory with a 4.23x over-subscription portion for the public offering of retail investors and a moderate over-subscription of the international placement for institutional investors.
    
    China Merchants Securities is following the CITIC Securities <6030.HK> <600030.SS>, Haitong Securities <6837.HK> <600837.SS>, GF Securities <1776.HK> <000776.SZ>, Huatai Securities <6886.HK> <601688.SS>, Everbright Securities <6178.HK> <601788.SS> and Orient Securities <3958.HK> <600958.SS>, the seventh A + H brokerage unit. (Finish)
        

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Yang Shuzhen)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港新股：招商證券H股首日掛牌，開盤價較招股價高1%

Content:
路透10月7日 - 湯森路透旗下基點援引消息人士報導，牽頭行兼簿記行(MLAB)渣打銀行為瑞安房地產公司發起3億美元三年期聯貸案。

    貸款金額可以美元或港元提撥，利率為較倫敦銀行間拆放款利率(Libor)或香港銀行同業拆息(Hibor)加碼381個基點，平均年限為2.625年。
    
    銀行受邀按以下四個級別參貸：
    承貸7,500萬美元及以上者，獲牽頭行兼簿記行頭銜，綜合收益460個基點，前端費207個基點；
    承貸5,000-7,400萬美元者，獲牽頭行頭銜，綜合收益450個基點，前端費181個基點；
    承貸3,000-4,900萬美元者，獲主辦行頭銜，綜合收益440個基點，前端費154個基點； 
    承貸1,500-2,900萬美元者，獲安排行頭銜，綜合收益430個基點，前端費128個基點；       
    
    預訂10月18日在香港舉辦銀行說明會，銀行回覆截止期限為11月4日。
    
    借款人為Shui On Development，擔保人為瑞安房地產公司。
    
    貸款用途為作為再融資及營運資本之用。
    
    瑞安房地產於2014年11月籌得2.5億美元兩年期定期貸款。最高綜合收益為550個基點，利率為Libor加碼418個基點，平均期限為1.375年。借款人為Globaland Ltd，擔保人為瑞安房地產公司。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導,請點選[nRLP50383a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 龔芳; 審校 張荻)
 ((marisa.kung@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-2502-2095; Reuters
Messaging: marisa.kung.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters October 7 - Thomson Reuters' Qidongwei quoted sources as leading the booker and bookrunner (MLAB) Standard Chartered Bank launched a $ 300 million three-year loan case for Shui On Land.

    The loan amount can be paid in U.S. dollars or Hong Kong dollars at an interest rate of 381 basis points above Libor or Hibor, with an average life span of 2.625 years.
    
    Banks are invited to participate in the following four levels:
    With a loan of 75 million U.S. dollars and above, it won the title of lead agency and bookkeeper with a consolidated income of 460 basis points and a front-end fee of 207 basis points.
    Loans of USD 5,000-7,400,000 were awarded the title of lead agency with a combined income of 450 basis points and a front-end fee of 181 basis points.
    With a loan of $ 34.0 to $ 49 million, it won the title of host bank with a consolidated income of 440 basis points and a front-end fee of 154 basis points.
    Those who borrowed USD15-299 million from the bank were entitled to hold a job listing with a consolidated income of 430 basis points and a front-end fee of 128 basis points.
    
    Book a bank note in Hong Kong on October 18, the bank reply deadline is November 4.
    
    The borrower is Shui On Development and the guarantor is Shui On Land Company.
    
    Loans are for refinancing and working capital purposes.
    
    Shui On Land raised US $ 250 million two-year term loan in November 2014. The highest comprehensive income of 550 basis points, the rate of Libor plus 418 basis points, the average duration of 1. 375 years. The borrower is Globaland Ltd and the guarantor is Shui On Land. (Finish)

    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nRLP50383a] to capture browse ****

 (Compilation Gong Fang; Zhang Di school review)
 ((marisa.kung@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-2502-2095; Reuters
Messaging: marisa.kung.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 路透基點：瑞安房地產啟動3億美元三年期聯貸案

Content:
路透倫敦/米蘭/法蘭克福10月6日 - 知情人士對路透表示，包括上海電氣<601727.SS>在內的中資企業已與菲亞特克萊斯勒汽車(FCA)<FCHA.MI>接洽，有意收購其Comau機器人業務。
    
    尋求國際化規模的中資企業發起了一連串對歐洲企業的收購交易。此項交易若能達成，將幫助FCA償還債務，並為其昂貴的投資計劃提供資金。
    
    其中一名知情人士稱，國機汽車股份<600335.SS>和上海機電設計研究院有限公司(Simee)也與FCA就可能收購Comau的事宜進行了接觸，希望說服FCA執行長馬爾基翁內(Sergio Marchionne)出售這家總部位於都靈的機器人焊接專業公司。 
    
    但FCA目前正集中精力與韓國三星電子<005930.KS>談判，商議出售旗下汽車零部件製造公司瑪涅蒂瑪瑞利(Magneti Marelli)，或與後者結盟，因此還不急於考慮關於Comau的選項。消息人士還稱，Comau是一個盈利不錯的子公司，營收略低於20億歐元(23億美元)。
    
    FCA拒絕置評。由於中國仍在國慶節假期期間，記者也未立即聯繫到上海電氣、國機汽車和上海機電設計研究院人士置評。
Content_EN:
REUTER LONDON / MILANO / FRANKFURT Oct 6 - Informed sources told Reuters that Chinese companies, including Shanghai Electric <601727.SS>, have contacted Fiat Chrysler (FCA) <FCHA.MI> to acquire its Comau Robot business.
    
    Chinese-funded enterprises seeking international scale have launched a series of acquisitions of European companies. The deal, if completed, will help FCA repay its debt and fund its expensive investment plan.
    
    One person familiar with the situation said that SAIC Motor shares <600335.SS> and Simee also contacted FCA about the possible acquisition of Comau in the hope of persuading FCA chief executive Marquillon Sergio Marchionne) sells this robot welding specialist based in Turin.
    
    But FCA is currently focusing on negotiating with South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co.,Ltd. (005930.KS) to negotiate with Magneti Marelli, its auto parts manufacturing company, or alliance with the latter and is in no hurry to consider options for Comau . The source also said that Comau is a profitable subsidiary, slightly less than 2 billion euros revenue (2.3 billion).
    
    FCA declined to comment. As China is still during the National Day holiday, the reporter did not immediately contact Shanghai Electric, SINOMACH and Shanghai Mechanical and Electrical Design and Research Institute to comment.
Title: 企業併購：上海電氣等中資企業有意收購菲亞特旗下的Comau--消息

Content:
路透香港10月7日 - 湯森路透旗下基點援引消息人士報導，巨騰國際控股有限公司已於周三簽署五年期定期貸款，規模擴增至3億美元，吸引到12家銀行承貸。
    
    中國銀行(香港)、星展銀行、凱基銀行、兆豐國際商業銀行，和台北富邦商業銀行擔任牽頭行兼簿記行(MLAB)。台北富邦銀行擔任額度代理行。
    
    這筆貸款初始發起規模為2.5億美元，資金將作為再融資及營運資本之用，利率為較倫敦銀行間拆放款利率(Libor)加碼150個基點。若台北銀行間美元拆放款利率(TAIFX)和Libor的利差超過35個基點，借款方將支付所有超過的利率部分。一般聯貸的最高前端費用為25個基點。
    
    在18個月寬限期過後，貸款將分八期每半年等額償還。

    借款人為巨騰子公司Dynamic Apex Macao
 Commercial Offshore Ltd，擔保人為巨騰國際。
    
    巨騰國際在香港上市，生產筆記本電腦外殼。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP50449a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 龔芳; 審校 孫茉莉)
 ((marisa.kung@thomsonreuters.com; 886-2-2502-2095; Reuters
Messaging: marisa.kung.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Oct 7 - The base of Thomson Reuters quoted sources as saying that Ju Teng International Holdings Limited has signed a five-year term loan on Wednesday to expand to 300 million U.S. dollars, attracting 12 bank lending.
    
    Bank of China (Hong Kong), DBS Bank, KGI Bank, Mega International Commercial Bank, and Fubon Commercial Bank in Taipei act as lead agency and bookkeeper (MLAB). Taipei Fubon Bank as a line of agency.
    
    The loan initially raised $ 250 million and will be used for refinancing and working capital at 150 basis points plus Libor. If the interest rate differential between TAIFX and Libor in Taipei Bank exceeds 35 basis points, the borrower will pay all the excess interest rates. The maximum front end fee for a general loan is 25 basis points.
    
    After the 18-month grace period, loans will be repaid in equal installments on a quarterly basis in eight installments.

    The borrower is JuTaizi Dynamic Apex Macao
 Commercial Offshore Ltd, guarantor for Ju Teng International.
    
    Ju Teng International listed in Hong Kong, the production of laptop shell. (Finish)

Title: 路透基點：巨騰國際簽訂3億美元五年期定期貸款--TRLPC

Content:

，年增39%、月減4.9%。累計1-9月營收6,857.1億台幣，年增7.1%。

jeanny.kao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei Oct. 7 - Global Foundry Leader - Taiwan's TSMC <2330.TW> <TSM.N> announced on Friday that its consolidated revenue in September was 89.7 billion Taiwanese dollars
, An increase of 39%, 4.9% reduction month. January-September cumulative revenue 6,857.1 billion Taiwan dollars, an increase of 7.1%.

Title: 台股業績：台積電9月合併營收897億台幣，年增39%

Content:
路透香港10月7日 - 投行匯豐最新研究報告顯示，該行設定2017年恆生指數<.HSI>為25,000點，國企指數<.HSCE>目標11,000點，較現水平分別約有5%及11%潛在升幅。
    
    匯豐中國股票策略主管孫瑜在其報告中指出，仍然偏好H股多於A股，因預期深港通帶動國內資金流入香港，而且流入的規模可能會增加，受北京冷卻房地產市場措施影響。
    
    他認為，H股的盈利能力將會改善，受助于需求補給以及PPI和國企改革的負面因素減退，並預料在深港通開通後，市場投資風格將從大市值股份輪動至中小型股份。
    
    “H股估值依然吸引，而外國投資者對H股持倉仍然大幅偏低。”他說。
    
    他對A股仍持中性看法，並設定2017年滬綜指<.SSEC>目標3,200點，滬深300<.CSI300>目標3,500點，較現水平分別約有6%及8%上升空間。
    
    投資策略方面，該行仍然認為新經濟股份將跑贏大市，又繼續看好資訊科技和醫療護理，看淡電訊。
    
    不過，該行調整其12只權重均等的中港模擬組合（即理想股票組合），將騰訊控股<0700.HK>、IMAX中國<1970.HK>、58.com<WUBA.N>、合景泰富<1813.HK>以及中國銀河證券<6881.HK>剔除，並換入百度<BIDU.O>、華能新能源<0958.HK>、龍湖地產<0960.HK>、網宿科技<300017.SZ>以及杭州海康威視<002415.SZ>。
    
    七隻留在模擬組合的股票分別是阿里巴巴<BABA.N>、中航科工<2357.HK>、國航<0753.HK>、中國銀行<3988.HK>、上海醫藥<2607.HK>、中南傳媒<601098.SS>以及長江電力<600900.SS>。
    
    匯豐的中港模擬組合自今年7月6日以來累計升10%，然跑輸MSCI中國<.MSCICN>5個百分點，主要受累于中航科工、國航和中南傳媒的疲弱表現。（完）

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 畢曉雯)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 7 - Investment banking HSBC latest research report shows that the bank set the 2017 Hang Seng Index <.HSI> 25,000 points, the HSCEI target of 11,000 points, compared with the current level of about 5% and 11 % Potential increase.
    
    Sun Yu, head of HSBC China equity strategy, pointed out in his report that H-shares still prefer H shares to A-shares because Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect is expected to drive domestic funds into Hong Kong and the inflow may increase due to Beijing cooling the real estate market.
    
    He believes that the profitability of H shares will be improved, helped by the demand replenishment and the negative factors of the reform of PPI and state-owned enterprises. It is expected that after Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect is opened, the market investment style will shift from large-cap stocks to small and medium-sized stocks .
    
    "H-share valuations are still attractive, while foreign investors are still holding positions for H-shares substantially lower," he said.
    
    He also held a neutral view on A-shares and set a target of 3,200 points for Shanghai Composite Index <SSE> in 2017 and a target of 3,500 points for CSI300 <~ CSI300>, representing about 6% and 8% upside levels respectively.
    
    In terms of investment strategy, the bank still believes the new economy shares will outperform the broader market and continue to be optimistic about IT and healthcare and bearish on telecommunications.
    
    However, the bank adjusted its 12 weighted portfolio of Hong Kong-China (ie ideal stock portfolios) with equal weights and placed Tencent Holdings <0700.HK>, IMAX China <1970.HK>, 58.com <WUBA.N> <1813.HK> and China Galaxy Securities <6881.HK> were removed and replaced by Baidu <BIDU.O>, Huaneng Renewable Energy <0958.HK>, Lake Real Estate <0960.HK>, Netcom Technology <300017. SZ> and Hangzhou Hikvision <002415.SZ>.
    
    The seven stocks remaining in the portfolio were Alibaba, AviChina Industry & Technology Company Limited <2357.HK>, Air China <0753.HK>, Bank of China <3988.HK> and Shanghai Pharmaceuticals <2607. HK Zhongnan Construction Group Co.,Ltd. <601098.SS> and Yangtze Power <600900.SS>.
    
    HSBC's China-Hong Kong analog portfolio has risen 10% since July 6 this year. However, HSBC's 5-point losing streak over MSCI China <.MSCICN> was mainly affected by AviChina Industry & Technology Company Limited, Air China and Jiangsu Zhongnan Construction Group Co.,Ltd The weak performance of the media. (Finish)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Bi Xiaowen)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 投行觀點：匯豐設定明年恆指和國指目標，較現水平約有5%及11%潛在升幅

Content:
*工商時報：   
    --人民幣匯率貶到6.7，使得TRF(目標可贖回遠期契約)企業戶的受災金額直線上升，TRF自救會聯盟透露，目前已知的企業受災戶中，損失金額最大的一家已經高達新台幣200億台幣，而且是一家有30多年歷史的老牌中小企業。
    --蔡政府上台後首場兩岸搭橋會議喊停！原訂于下周一(17日)在北京登場的兩岸通訊搭橋會議，傳出因大陸主張出席官員〞降三級〞，台灣則考量無法維持〞次長級〞對等交流之下，經濟部決定取消行程。 
    
    *經濟日報： 
    --台積電<2330.TW>受惠五大客戶下單力道持續強勁，本季淡季有望不淡。供應鏈透露，台積電本季營收季減幅度僅1%至3%，優於外資預估的季減5%至7%。
    --國安基金史上最長護盤行動買下的持股，終於全數出清，本周四國安基金將召開例行委員會議報告最新財報，這波護盤獲利10多億台幣；出清後子彈充裕，足因應美國升息等國際情勢變化。
    --陸客團來台縮減幅度擴大，今年5月開始來台人數減到每天配額5,000人的三分之一，9月下旬減幅擴大到六成，每天來台約只剩2,000人。(完)

Title: 《台灣報摘》--工商時報、經濟日報10月11日

Content:
路透北京10月11日 - 中國股市滬綜指周二連續第二日收升至一個月新高。分析師指出，今日大盤震盪盤升，以全日最高點報收，熱點輪動至銀行地產等權重板塊。10.1長假後內外部不確定性因素減弱，市場環境再次進入相對平穩階段，資金參與意願有所回升，但仍以存量資金博弈為主。
            
    滬綜指<.SSEC>收報3,065.25點，漲17.11點或0.56%，此前收盤高點為9月9日3,078.85點，上證A股今日成交1,835億元人民幣，上日為1,755億元。
    
　“進入四季度後，市場對政策面積極的因素有所期待，包括推進債轉股，對市場情緒有一定的提振作用。”首創證券策略分析師邵帥指出。
    
    他稱，節後兩日市場量能有所放大，但僅是對此前連續縮量盤整造成的謹慎情緒的恢復，存量資金博弈階段，指數將更多以緩慢的溫和上漲為主。
    
    他並認為，債轉股政策有助於改善銀行資產質量，提升銀行股估值水平，從投資角度提高銀行股作為中期資產配置的價值。但銀行股市場體量較大，拉升價格對資金消耗較大，因此短期並未出現強勢反彈的表現，走勢主要還是受制於資金和市場環境。
    
    中國新一輪債轉股方案終於出爐。國務院周一就降低企業槓桿率發布意見稱，有序開展市場化銀行債權轉股權，債轉股所需資金利用市場化方式和渠道籌集，實施機構不限於四大資產管理公司，鼓勵地方金融資產管理公司和銀行現有符合條件的所屬機構等參與。[nL4T1CG1JT]
    
    上證地產類指數<.SSEP>收漲0.30%，臥龍地產<600173.SS>、常熟銀行<601128.SS>漲停報收。
    
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>收報3,306.56點，漲0.39%；滬深300指數期貨主力10月合約<CIFV6>收盤報3,298.0點，漲0.39%，成交8,410手。130億元額度的滬股通<.NQUOTA.SH>凈買入10.45億元。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, Oct. 11 - The Shanghai Composite Index closed at a one-month high for the second consecutive day on Tuesday. Analysts pointed out that today's broader market volatility rise to the highest point of the day to close, hot wheels rotation to the bank real estate and other weight plate. 10.1 After the holiday, the internal and external uncertainties weakened, and the market environment entered a relatively stable stage again. The willingness to participate in the funds rebounded, but the stock funds game still dominated.
            
    Shanghai Composite Index <SSE> closed at 3,065.25 points, up 17.11 points or 0.56%, after closing at 3,078.85 points on Sept. 9, with the Shanghai A-shares trading at 183.5 billion yuan today and the previous day at 175.5 billion yuan.
    
"After entering the fourth quarter, the market is very optimistic about the policy factors, including the promotion of debt to equity, the market sentiment has some boost." Shao Shuai, the first securities strategist pointed out.
    
    He said the market two days after the holiday can be enlarged, but only on the previous continuous shrinkage caused by cautious recovery, the stock funds game stage, the index will be more slowly and moderately dominated.
    
    He also believes that debt-for-equity swap policy can help improve the quality of bank assets and enhance the valuation of bank stocks, and enhance the value of bank stocks as a medium-term asset allocation from an investment perspective. However, the larger stock market of banking stocks pushed up the price to consume a large amount of funds. Therefore, there was no strong rebound in the short term, and the trend was mainly dominated by capital and market environment.
    
    China's new round of debt-to-equity program was finally released. On Monday, the State Council released opinions on reducing corporate leverage. According to the statement, the orderly market-oriented bank debt-equity swap and debt-to-equity swap use market-oriented methods and channels to raise funds. The implementing agencies are not limited to the four asset management companies and encourage local financial asset management Existing companies and banks eligible to participate in the respective agencies. [nL4T1CG1JT]
    
    SSE Real Estate Index <. SSEP> closed up 0.30%, Wolong Real Estate <600173.SS>, Changshu Bank daily limit.
    
    The CSI 300 Index closed at 3,306.56 points, up 0.39%. The major contract of October CSI300 futures closed at 3,298.0 points, up 0.39% and traded at 8,410 contracts. The amount of 130 billion yuan of Shanghai Stock Connect <.NQUOTA.SH> net purchase of 1.045 billion yuan. (Finish)

 (Posted Zhang Xiaoguang; review Zeng Xiang Jin)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國股市：滬綜指連兩日收升至一個月新高，銀行地產等權重板塊走勢強勁

Content:
路透香港10月11日 - 香港交易及結算所（港交所）<0388.HK>周二稱，與深圳證券交易所及中國證券登記結算公司就建立深港通訂立協議，標誌著深港通已經進入最後準備階段。
    
    不過港交所重申，預計香港市場將於11月中下旬作好實施深港通的準備，深港通具體開通時間須待市場準備就緒、並取得中國證監會和香港證監會的批準方能落實。正式啟動日期一經批準，將會另行公布。
    
    據港交所提供的新聞稿，出席簽約儀式的深交所理事長吳利軍表示，“四方協議”的簽署，標誌著深港通的籌備工作取得新進展，這是下一步加速推進各項準備工作、早日開通深港通的重要前提和基礎。
    
    根據該協議，深交所與聯交所以及中國結算與香港中央結算將分別平均分享因深港通產生的交易及結算費用，一如現時滬港通下各方分享收入的安排。
    
    中國國務院8月中宣布已批準深港通實施方案。按照工作時間表，8月到11月各方就深港通進行制度和技術準備，包括相關交易結算規則和系統準備完成、獲得所有相關的監管批準、市場參與者充分調整其業務和技術系統、所有必需的跨境監管執法合作安排和投資者教育工作，預計深港通將於11月中下旬開通。
    
    港交所行政總裁李小加此前表示，預計11月初公布深港通開通日期。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽於香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1011/LTN20161011291_C.pdf)
       

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 楊淑禎)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Oct 11 - Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEx) said on Tuesday that it has signed an agreement with Shenzhen Stock Exchange and China Securities Depository and Clearing Corporation on the establishment of Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect. Enter the final preparation stage.
    
    However, the HKEx reiterated that the Hong Kong market is expected to be ready for the implementation of the Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect in the second half of November. The specific opening hours of the Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect will be subject to market readiness and the approval of the CSRC and Hong Kong Securities Regulatory Commission . Once the official start date is approved, it will be announced separately.
    
    According to press releases provided by the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, Wu Lijun, chairman of the Shenzhen Stock Exchange at the signing ceremony, said that the signing of the "four-party agreement" marked a new advance in the preparatory work for Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect. This is the next step to speed up the preparatory work, As soon as possible, the important preconditions and foundations for the Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect will be opened.
    
    Under the agreement, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and the Stock Exchange, as well as China Settlement and Hong Kong Securities Clearing, will respectively share in average the transaction and settlement expenses incurred by Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect, just like the current arrangements for the sharing of revenue between the parties under Shanghai-Hong Kong Stock Connect.
    
    China's State Council announced in mid-August that it has approved the implementation plan for Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect. According to the working schedule, all parties conducted the system and technical preparations for Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect between August and November, including the settlement of relevant transactions and the completion of system preparation, obtaining all relevant regulatory approvals, market participants fully adjusting their business and technical systems, All necessary cross-boundary regulatory cooperation arrangements and investor education are expected to be opened in late November.
    
    Li Xiaojia, chief executive of HKEx said earlier that it is expected to announce the opening date of the Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect in early November. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1011/LTN20161011291_E.pdf)
       

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Yang Shuzhen)
 (alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中港證券：港交所稱與深圳交易所及中國結算就建立深港通訂立協議

Content:
路透上海10月12日 - 上海證券報周三報導，中國汽車生產商比亞迪<1211.HK><002594.SZ>周二在深圳與國開行簽署600億元的《單軌軌道交通產業戰略合作協議》。在橫跨IT、汽車、新能源三大產業後，比亞迪正式進軍輕軌交通業，意在拓展城市公共交通，緩解交通擁堵及大氣污染問題。
    
    比亞迪總裁王傳福表示，輕軌交通或將成為解決二、三線城市交通擁堵的重要方案，比亞迪也將主要瞄準二、三線城市的中低運量公共交通市場。
    
    相較于地鐵，比亞迪的電動輕軌公交的成本僅為地鐵的1/6，建設周期只有地鐵的1/3，占地面積小，適應性強且運力小，適合人口相對少的二、三、四線城市。
    
    王傳福表示，比亞迪已與包括遵義、贛州、邯鄲和江陰等在內的20多個城市接洽，未來將與多個城市達成合作。
    
    除此之外，比亞迪方面認為，包括印尼和巴西在內的眾多國家也正面臨著棘手的城市交通擁堵問題，輕軌交通將成為未來比亞迪參與“一帶一路”的重要組成部分。

    比亞迪已在現有的事業部群之外，單獨成立了一個輕軌交通研究院。據了解，普通單軌軌道車為8節車廂，能同時容納1,600名站立的乘客，相當於小型地鐵。其最高時速可達80公里，平均時速30公里到45公里。(完)

 (發稿 林琦; 審校 林高麗)
 ((路透中文新聞部:+86-21-61041787;傳真 86-21-61041728 ;qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai October 12 - Shanghai Securities News reported on Wednesday that Chinese automaker BYD <1211.HK> <002594.SZ> signed a 60 billion yuan agreement on strategic cooperation in the monorail industry with Shenzhen Development Bank in Shenzhen on Tuesday. After crossing I.T LIMITED, automobile and new energy industry, BYD formally entered the light rail transportation industry with the intention of expanding urban public transport and alleviating traffic congestion and air pollution.
    
    BYD president Wang Chuanfu said that light rail transit will be an important solution to the traffic congestion in second- and third-tier cities. BYD will also mainly target medium- and low-volume public transport markets in second- and third-tier cities.
    
    Compared to the subway, BYD electric light rail transit costs only 1/6 of the subway, the construction cycle is only 1/3 of the subway, covers an area of ​​small, adaptable and capacity is small, suitable for relatively small population of two or three, Fourth-tier cities.
    
    Wang Chuanfu said BYD has approached more than 20 cities including Zunyi, Ganzhou, Handan and Jiangyin, and will reach a cooperation with several cities in the future.
    
    In addition, BYD believes that many countries, including Indonesia and Brazil, are also facing difficult traffic congestion problems. Light rail transit will become an important part of BYD's involvement in the Belt and Road initiative.

    BYD has set up a separate light rail transit research institute outside its existing business unit group. It is understood that the ordinary monorail car is 8 compartments, can accommodate 1,600 passengers standing at the same time, equivalent to a small subway. Its top speed of up to 80 km, the average speed of 30 km to 45 km. (Finish)

 (Press Lin Qi; revising Lin Korea)
 (Reuters Department of Public Information: + 86-21-61041787; Fax 86-21-61041728; qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中港個股：比亞迪與國開行簽訂600億元協議，進軍輕軌交通領域

Content:
路透香港10月12日 - 中國海外宏洋集團<0081.HK>周三宣布，將以初始代價35.16億元人民幣向控股股東中國海外發展<0688.HK>收購一批位於中國內地三線城市的住宅發展項目。
    
    公司的聲明稱，將以現金向中國海外支付收購代價。
    
    擬收購的資產主要包括位於揚州、惠州、黃山、濰坊、淄博、九江及汕頭的新興三線城市住宅物業發展項目，涉及總建築面積約951.76萬平方米。截至9月底的估值約200億元。
    
    此外，持有該等資產的項目公司目前欠負中國海外相關貸款人的貸款預期約為76.53億元，並將於交易完成後繼續償還。
    
    中國海外宏洋表示，公司的發展策略集中在中國三線城市，是次收購讓其擴展至新興三線城市及進一步拓展於現有三線城市的市場。此外，公司預期收購於未來數年推動業務增長的策略性擴張。
    
    中國海外為中國大型開發商，主要在內地一、二線城市發展房地產，其持有中國外宏洋37.98%已發行股本，公司上月中完成向中信股份<0267.HK>價值310億元人民幣的住宅物業資產收購。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布於香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1012/LTN20161012275_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 楊淑禎)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Oct. 12 - China Overseas Wang Yang Group (0081.HK) announced Wednesday it will acquire a number of residential developments in the third-tier cities in mainland China with the initial consideration of RMB3.516 billion from its controlling shareholder, China Overseas (0688.HK) project.
    
    The company's statement said it will pay the acquisition consideration in cash to China Overseas.
    
    Assets to be acquired mainly comprise residential property developments in emerging third-tier cities located in Yangzhou, Huizhou, Huangshan, Weifang, Zibo, Jiujiang and Shantou with a total gross floor area of ​​approximately 9.5176 million square meters. As of the end of September the valuation of about 20 billion yuan.
    
    In addition, the loans owed by the project companies currently holding such assets to China-related overseas lenders are currently expected to be approximately RMB7,653 million and will continue to be repayable upon the completion of the transactions.
    
    According to China Overseas Wang Yang, the company's development strategy is focused on the third-tier cities in China. The acquisition will allow it to expand into the emerging third-tier cities and further expand into the existing third-tier cities. In addition, the company expects the strategic expansion of the acquisition that will drive business growth in the coming years.
    
    As a large developer in mainland China, it is principally engaged in the development of real estate in the Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities in the Mainland. It holds 37.98% of the issued share capital of China Wangyang, and the company completed the acquisition of 31 billion RMB from CITIC Limited <0267.HK> Residential Property Assets Acquisition. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement of listed companies on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1012/LTN20161012275_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; Yang Shizhen review)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：中國海外宏洋以逾35億元人民幣向中國海外收購三線城市住宅項目

Content:
路透香港10月12日 - 香港主要航空公司--國泰航空<0293.HK>周三撤回此前對下半年業績表示樂觀的言論，並對業務進行深入檢討，以提高收益及減低成本。
    
    據公告，國泰航空于中期報告發表時預計今年下半年業績會較上半年為佳，但其後旗下航空公司的業務前景轉弱，可載貨量過剩及競爭激烈尤其對客運業務構成壓力，收益持續遜於預期，收益率承受重大壓力，在此情況下，該公司不再預計下半年業績好於上半年。
    
    公司表示，在如此嚴峻的收益情況下，對業務進行深入的檢討，希望藉此提高收益及減低成本，務求能保持穩健的財務狀況並帶來可接受的財務回報。
    
    國泰航空並稱，“是項檢討將就一切有助提高效率及生產力的方案作出考慮。”
    
    由於燃油對沖虧損部分抵銷了油價下跌的利好，國泰航空今年上半年淨利按年大跌82%，至3.53億港元。[nH9T17T019]
    
    該股周三盤中一度低探10.66港元，為自2009年7月以來低位；終場收升0.19%，報10.76港元。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1012/LTN20161012495_C.pdf)

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 12 - Hong Kong's main carrier, Cathay Pacific Airways <0293.HK>, reversed its previous comments on the second half of the year and conducted an in-depth review of the business to boost revenue and reduce costs.
    
    According to the announcement, Cathay Pacific expects the performance of the second half of this year to be better than that of the first half of this year at the publication of the interim report. However, the business prospects of its airlines subsequently weakened. Overcapacity and fierce competition, in particular, put pressure on the passenger transport business and the revenue continued Smaller than expected, the yield was under heavy pressure, in which case the company no longer expected to outperform the first half of the second half.
    
    The company said that under such severe earnings conditions, it conducted an in-depth review of its business in the hope of increasing revenue and reducing costs so as to maintain a sound financial position and bring an acceptable financial return.
    
    Cathay Pacific said that "the review will consider all options that will help increase efficiency and productivity."
    
    Cathay Pacific's net profit plunged 82% in the first half of this year to HK $ 353m due to a partially offsetting oil price decline. [nH9T17T019]
    
    The intraday low of HK $ 10.66, the intraday low, was the lowest since July 2009, ending the day 0.19% higher at HK $ 10.76. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1012/LTN20161012495_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：國泰航空撤回下半年業績樂觀言論，並對業務進行深入檢討

Content:
路透香港10月13日 - 路透周四獲得銷售文件顯示，中國領先的綜合醫藥公司--華潤醫藥集團鎖定中國人壽<2628.HK><601628.SS>、安邦等八名基石投資者，合占香港IPO（首次公開發售）一半比重。
    
    文件顯示，八名基石投資者包括廣東恆健、國壽、Fujifilm（富士膠片）<4901.T>、安邦等，認購金額合共9.161億美元，以招股價區間中位數計，占比接近五成。
    
    華潤醫藥今天開始路演，初步擬發售約15.43億股新股，招股價區間每股8.45-10.15港元，集資130-157億港元，市值約522-627億港元。
    
    該公司預計於10月21日定價，28日在聯交所掛牌上市，新股編號“3320”，每手買賣單位為500股，聯席保薦人為美銀美林<BAC.N>、建銀國際、中金香港證券以及高盛<GS.N>。
    
    華潤醫藥是中國華潤集團旗下分支，主要從事製藥、醫藥分銷以及藥品零售，其中包括知名品牌“三九”、“東阿阿膠”。按2015年收益計，該公司是中國第二大醫藥製造商、第一大非處方藥製造商以及第二大醫藥分銷商，在滋補中藥、心血管藥、感冒及流感藥、大容量靜脈輸注及緊急避孕藥方面擁有市場領先地位。
    
    是次IPO集資所得款項，接近一半將用於併購國內藥品產銷業務，約三成半資金用於建立倉儲物流設施、研發中心以及提升資訊科技系統。
    
    以下為各基石投資者認購金額（億美元）：    
 1    廣東恆健                              3.4
 2    中國人壽                              2.0
 3    Fujifilm                              1.057
 4    Nordea Investment                     0.902
 5    英國利潔時(Reckitt Benckiser)<RB.L>   0.5
 6    中國城通                              0.5
 7    安邦                                  0.5
 8    利福國際<1212.HK>主席利鑾鴻           0.302
      總計                                  9.161
  （完）    

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 張喜良)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Oct 13 - Reuters sales documents were obtained Thursday, showing that China Resources Pharmaceutical Group, the leading integrated pharmaceutical company, has locked China Life Insurance <2628.HK> <601628.SS>, Ampang and other eight cornerstone investors, Accounting for Hong Kong IPO (initial public offering) accounted for half of the weight.
    
    The documents show that eight cornerstone investors, including Guangdong Heng Jian, China Life Insurance, Fujifilm (Fujifilm) <4901.T>, Anbang, etc.,the total subscription amount of $ 961.6 million, the middle of the IPO price range, the proportion of close Fifty percent.
    
    CRC today started a roadshow, initially proposed for the sale of about 1.543 billion new shares, offering price range of 8.45-10.15 Hong Kong dollars per share, fund-raising 130-157 billion Hong Kong dollars, the market value of about 522-627 billion Hong Kong dollars.
    
    The company is expected to be priced on October 21 and will be listed on the Stock Exchange on the 28th with the IPO number "3320" and its board lot size being 500 shares. The co-sponsors are BofA Merrill Lynch <BAC.N>, CCB International, China International Capital Corporation Limited Hong Kong Securities and Goldman Sachs.
    
    China Resources Pharmaceutical is a subsidiary of China Resources Group, mainly engaged in the pharmaceutical, pharmaceutical distribution and pharmaceutical retail, including well-known brands "39", "East donkey-hide gelatin." In 2015, the Company is the second largest pharmaceutical manufacturer in China, the largest non-prescription drug manufacturer and the second largest pharmaceutical distributor in the field of nourishing traditional Chinese medicine, cardiovascular medicine, flu and flu medicine, high-volume intravenous infusion and emergency Birth control pill has a market leading position.
    
    About 50% of the IPO proceeds will be used for the acquisition of the domestic pharmaceutical production and sales business. About 30% of the funds are spent on warehousing and logistics facilities, research and development centers and information technology systems.
    
    The following for each cornerstone investor subscription amount (100 million US dollars):
 1 Guangdong Heng Jian 3.4
 2 China Life 2.0
 3 Fujifilm 1.057
 4 Nordea Investment 0.902
 5 Reckitt Benckiser <RB.L> 0.5
 6 Chinatown 0.5
 7 Ampang 0.5
 8 LIFE International <1212.HK> Lili Hong Hung Chairman 0.302
      Total 9.161
  (Finish)    

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Zhang Xi Liang)
 (alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港新股：華潤醫藥鎖定國壽等八名基石投資者，IPO占比一半--銷售文件

Content:
路透台北10月13日 - 全球晶圓代工龍頭--台積電<2330.TW>><TSM.N>周四表示，第四季合併營收預計達2,550-2,580億台幣，較上季的2,604.1億台幣下跌1至2.1%。
     
    台積電也預估第四季毛利率將在50.5-52.2%，上季為50.7%；第四季營益率約為40-42%，上季為40.8%。公司也估，2016年以台幣計價的營收預估年增11-12%。

    台積電稍早公布，第三季淨利年增28.4%至967.59億台幣，略高於市場預期。 [nT8T1CD00D]

    台積電今日收跌0.53%，報188.5台幣；大盤加權股價指數<.TWII>則收跌0.36%。(完)

    參考相關細節，可點選台積電網站,網址為(http://www.tsmc.com)
    參看台積電相關新聞，請點選[2330.TW-CMN]

 (記者 高潔如; 審校 楊淑禎/曾祥進)
 ((jeanny.kao@thomsonreuters.com; 8862-25008441; Reuters
Messaging: jeanny.kao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Taipei October 13 - the world's foundry leader - TSMC <2330.TW >> <TSM.N> said on Thursday that fourth-quarter consolidated revenue is expected to reach 2.550-2.580 billion Taiwan dollars, compared with the previous quarter's 2,604.1 NT $ down 1 to 2.1%.
     
    TSMC is also expected to gross margin in the fourth quarter will be 50.5-52.2%, compared with 50.7% in the previous quarter; fourth quarter profit margin of about 40-42%, last quarter was 40.8%. The company also estimates that 2016 revenue forecast in NT dollars will increase 11-12% annually.

    Earlier, TSMC announced third-quarter net profit rose 28.4% to 96.759 billion Taiwan dollars, slightly higher than market expectations. [nT8T1CD00D]

    TSMC closed down 0.53% today, reported 188.5 Taiwan dollars; the broader market weighted index <. TWII> closed down 0.36%. (Finish)

Title: 《中國已公布新股發行上市日程表》--10月14日

Content:
路透香港10月14日 - 湯森路透旗下基點報導，據新聞發布顯示，在香港上市的中國生物製藥有限公司已經與五家銀行簽署了3億美元高級俱樂部定期貸款。
    
    這五家牽頭行是：中銀香港、恆生銀行、台北富邦商業銀行、交銀香港和中國信託商業銀行。中銀香港亦是額度代理行，台北富邦銀行是宣傳代理。
    
    所籌資金將用於再融資，以及與其主營業務相關的併購，還有一般運營支出。
    
    中國生物製藥曾在2013年12月獲得1.65億美元高級無擔保定期貸款。那筆交易的最高綜合收益為233.3個基點，利率較Libor加碼200個基點，費率是100個基點。工銀亞洲、兆豐國際商業銀行和法國興業銀行是當時的牽頭行兼簿記行。（完）
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nRLP50781a]即可擷取瀏覽****
    

 (編譯 高琦 審校 孫茉莉)
 ((kelly.gao@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-6627-1011; Reuters
Messaging: kelly.gao.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 14 - Thomson Reuters' point-based press reports showed that China Biopharmaceutical Co.,Ltd.,listed in Hong Kong, has signed a $ 300 million senior club term loan with five banks, according to a press release.
    
    The five lead firms are: BOC Hong Kong, Hang Seng Bank, Taipei Fubon Commercial Bank, BOCHK Hong Kong and China Trust Commercial Bank. Bank of China, Hong Kong is also the line agency, Taipei Fubon Bank is an agent.
    
    The funds raised will be used for refinancing, mergers and acquisitions related to its main business, and general operating expenses.
    
    China Biopharmaceutical won a senior non-guaranteed term loan of $ 165 million in December 2013. The highest combined return for that transaction was 233.3 basis points, plus a 200 basis point margin over Libor at a rate of 100 basis points. ICBC (Asia), Mega International Commercial Bank and Société Générale were the lead and book-keeping firms of the time. (Finish)
    
    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nRLP50781a] to capture browse ****

Title: 路透基點：中國生物製藥與五家銀行簽下3億美元高級定期貸款--TRLPC

Content:
路透香港10月17日 - 中國最大社交網絡暨線上娛樂公司--騰訊控股<0700.HK>宣布，將為旗下負責進行收購芬蘭移動遊戲開發商Supercell交易的附屬公司，引入包括中航資本、中信資本、中信銀行<0998.HK>等多名�國家隊�投資者認購50%股權，總對價8.5億美元。
    
    騰訊控股今年6月宣布已達成收購Supercell大部分股權的協議，總對價預計約為86億美元。[nL4T19D3D7]而公司將透過一家為此項收購而組成的財團公司Halti S.A.進行交易。
    
    公司周日晚間發出的聲明稱，Halti在上周與中航資本旗下AVICT (HK)、中信資本旗下CITIC Capital、中信銀行<601998.SS>旗下信銀（香港）投資、宏兆企業與CT Bright Capital旗下Zheng Hong Capital Management、私募股權公司高達投資、中國信達<1359.HK>旗下Sino-Rock Investment及浦東發展銀行<600000.SZ>等共同投資者訂立認購協議，該等投資者將認購Halti的股份，總對價8.5億美元，該等投資者將持有Halti的50%股權，而騰訊的持股比例降至50%。
    
    騰訊表示，該8.5億美元將用作撥付收購Supercell的部分資金，公司預期收購Supercell的交易將於10月27日前後完成，屆時Halti將持有Supercell約76.9%間接權益。
    
    Supercell是一家在芬蘭註冊成立的私人公司及移動遊戲開發商，自2010年成立以來，Supercell已在市場推出“部落衝突”（Clash ofClans）等四款主要遊戲。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽上市公司發布于香港聯交所的公告，請點選:(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1016/LTN20161016026_C.pdf)

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 林高麗)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 17 - Tencent Holdings (0700.HK), the largest social network and online entertainment company in China, announced that it will introduce its subsidiaries, including AVIC Capital, CITIC Capital, to acquire the Finnish mobile game developer Supercell. , CITIC Bank (0998.HK) and many other national team   investors subscribe for 50% stake, with a total price of 850 million US dollars.
    
    Tencent Holdings announced in June this year it has reached a majority stake in the acquisition of Supercell agreement, the total consideration is expected to be about 8.6 billion US dollars. [nL4T19D3D7] The company will be traded through Halti S.A.,a consortium formed for the acquisition.
    
    The company issued a statement on Sunday night saying that Halti had a joint venture with AVICT (HK), CATIC Capital CITIC Limited Capital, CITIC Bank <601998.SS> CIBH (Hong Kong) Investment, AVICT and CT Bright Capital's Zheng Hong Capital Management, private equity firm Gundam Investment, Sino-Rock Investment under Cinda <1359.HK> and co-investors such as Pudong Development Bank <600000.SZ> entered into a subscription agreement to subscribe Halti Stake, with a total consideration of $ 850 million, which will hold 50% of Halti's shareholding and Tencent's shareholding to 50%.
    
    Tencent said the $ 850 million will be used to fund part of the acquisition of Supercell, and the company expects to complete the transaction to acquire Supercell on or about October 27, when Halti will hold approximately 76.9% of Supercell's indirect interest.
    
    Supercell, a privately held Finnish company and developer of mobile games, has launched four major titles, Clash of Clans, in the market since its launch in 2010. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement of a listed company on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/sehk/2016/1016/LTN20161016026_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revising Lin Korea)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港個股：騰訊控股引入投資者參與收購Supercell交易，總對價8.5億美元

Content:
路透洛杉磯10月16日 - 據直接了解計劃的一位人士透露，中國大連萬達集團計劃推出一項補貼計劃，吸引好萊塢電影製作人到其在中國青島新成立的數十億美元影視基地。
    
    萬達集團董事長王健林料將在洛杉磯周一晚間舉辦的活動上宣布這一計劃，可提供40%製作成本的補貼。
    
    這位不願具名的消息人士稱。萬達將與青島市政府分擔此項補貼。
    
    補貼將適用於影視劇。符合退款的成本包括舞台和設備租賃、搭景費用和當地住宿等。
    
    萬達發言人拒絕置評。

    青島市政府一位發言人稱，他不熟悉該計劃。(完)

    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL1N1CN04C]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 劉秀紅；審校)
 ((Xiuhong.Liu@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271050; Reuters
Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters LOS ANGELES, Oct. 16 - One person directly familiar with the plan revealed that China's Dalian Wanda Group plans to launch a subsidy scheme to attract Hollywood filmmakers to its new multi-billion-dollar film and television studio in Qingdao, China.
    
    Wanda Group Chairman Wang Jianlin expected to be held in Los Angeles on Monday night at the event announced the plan, providing 40% of the cost of production subsidies.
    
    The unnamed source said. Wanda will share this subsidy with Qingdao Municipal Government.
    
    Subsidies will apply to film and television drama. Refundable costs include stage and equipment rentals, boarding fees and local accommodation.
    
    Wanda spokesman declined to comment.

    A Qingdao municipal government spokesman said he was not familiar with the plan. (Finish)

 (Compiled Liu Xiuhong; revision)

Messaging: xiuhong.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國企業：萬達將宣布補貼40%製作成本，吸引好萊塢來華拍攝--消息

Content:
路透北京10月17日 - 中國股市滬綜指周一震盪收跌。分析師指出，今日市場早盤窄幅整蕩，14:00點後B股指數大幅跳水，盤中跌幅一度達到逾6%，拖累滬綜指擴大跌幅。儘管鋼鐵有色等資源類股走勢較為活躍，但市場仍缺乏量能支持，料後市續以整理走勢為主。
            
    滬綜指<.SSEC>收報3,041.17點，跌22.64點或0.74%，上證A股今日成交1,794億元人民幣，上日為1,636億元。
    
  “今天的下跌主要是受B股影響。”首創證券策略分析師邵帥稱。
    
    中國股市滬B指<.SSEB>周一午後跳水，收跌逾6%。交易員指出，人民幣兌美元匯率今日再度下行，投資者擔憂這種貶值趨勢將持續，將會拖累以美元計價的上海B股，午後拋盤突然增強，B指滾雪球式下跌。[nL4T1CN2DU]    
    
    他指出，近日錫業股份與建行簽署債轉股協議，成為地方國企債轉股的首單，今日錫業股份強勢拉升，並帶動了鋼鐵、有色、煤炭股等資源類股票上漲。但債轉股涉及板塊多以權重股為主，缺乏資金支持的情況下，熱點持續性和反彈力度將受到很大程度制約。
    
    在雲南錫業集團周日與中國建設銀行<601939.SS><0939.HK>簽署債轉股協議後，雲南錫業集團旗下錫業股份<000960.SZ>周日晚間公告稱，建行將入股錫業股份旗下的華聯鋅銦公司，持股不高於15%股權，推動這家礦石公司新礦山項目順利推進。[nL4T1CN0Y0]錫業股份收報漲停至14.31元。

    人民幣兌美元即期<CNY=CFXS>周一早盤與中間價均創逾六年新低，主因上周五美元指數大幅反彈。交易員稱，雖然在岸和離岸匯價持續走低，但市場並未現恐慌情緒，自營投機亦忌憚大行手段而表現相對謹慎，短期匯價料仍偏弱。[nL4T1CN1RX]
    
    凱馬B<900953.SS>、凌雲B股<900957.SS>、匯麗B<900939.SS>跌停報收。
    
    滬深300指數<.CSI300>收報3,277.88點，跌0.85%；滬深300指數期貨主力10月合約<CIFV6>收盤報3,271.0點，跌0.67%，成交10,665手。130億元額度的滬股通<.NQUOTA.SH>凈賣出1.44億元。（完）

 (發稿 張曉翀；審校 曾祥進)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters BEIJING, October 17 - The Shanghai Composite ended the concussion on Monday. Analysts pointed out that the market today, a narrow range of early morning turmoil, after 14:00 B-share index plunged sharply, the intraday decline of more than 6%, dragging Shanghai Composite Index to expand decline. Despite the more active ferrous metals and other resource stocks, the market still lacks the quantity to support the market.
            
    Shanghai Composite <SSE> closed at 3,041.17 points, down 22.64 points or 0.74%. Shanghai A-shares traded 174.9 billion yuan today, up from 163.6 billion yuan the previous day.
    
  "Today's decline is mainly affected by the B shares." Shao Shuai, the first securities strategist, said.
    
    Chinese stock market Shanghai B said <.SSEB> diving on Monday afternoon, closing down more than 6%. Traders pointed out that the renminbi against the U.S. dollar again down today, investors are worried that this devaluation trend will continue, will drag the dollar-denominated Shanghai B shares, the afternoon selling suddenly increased, B means snowballing down. [nL4T1CN2DU]
    
    He pointed out that recently the tin shares and the Construction Bank signed a debt-to-equity swap agreement, becoming the first single conversion of local state-owned corporate bonds. Today's tin stocks rose strongly, and led the steel, nonferrous metals, coal stocks and other resource stocks rose. However, the debt to equity swap involves more heavyweights in the sector. In the absence of financial support, the persistence and rebound of hotspots will be greatly constrained.
    
    After Yunnan Tin Group signed an agreement on debt-for-equity swap with China Construction Bank <601939.SS> <0939.HK> on Sunday, Yunnan Tin Group Co.,Ltd. tin industry <000960.SZ> announced on Sunday night that China Construction Bank will acquire shares Hualian Zinc Indium Corporation, a unit of Tin Industry Co.,Ltd.,holds a stake of not more than 15% and promotes the smooth progress of the new mining project of the ore company. [nL4T1CN0Y0] Tin shares closed limit up to 14.31 yuan.

    The RMB against the U.S. dollar spot rate was hit by more than six-year lows in early trading Monday and mid-day on Monday, mainly due to a sharp rebound in the U.S. dollar index last Friday. Traders said that although the onshore and offshore exchange rates continued to decline, the market did not show any cautious sentiment and self-operated speculation but also fearfulness in the broader market. However, the short-term exchange rate is still weak. [nL4T1CN1RX]
    
    Kama B <900953.SS>, Lingyun B shares <900957.SS>, Huili B <900939.SS> lower limit to close.
    
    Shanghai and Shenzhen 300 Index <.SI3> closed at 3,277.88 points, down 0.85%; the main CSI300 futures contract <CIFV6> closed at 3,271.0 points, down 0.67% and traded 10,665 contracts. The amount of 130 billion yuan of shares of Shanghai Stock Exchange net selling 144 million yuan. (Finish)

 (Posted Zhang Xiaoguang; review Zeng Xiang Jin)
 ((xiaochong.zhang@thomsonreuters.com; 0086-10-66271042; Reuters Messaging:
xiaochong.zhang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中國股市：滬綜指震盪收跌，B股指數大幅跳水拖累大盤走弱

Content:
路透香港10月17日 - 湯森路透旗下基點報導，消息人士稱，湖北榮
成再生科技有限公司原21億元人民幣定期貸款目標，現已降低至19.9億人
民幣(2.95億美元)。
    
    最初是第一商業銀行和台灣土地銀行擔任此次交易的牽頭行兼簿記行
，台灣銀行稍後加入，並給予同樣的頭銜。
    
    該筆貸款由分為兩部分，分別是A部分17億元人民幣七年期定期貸款
和B部分2.9億元人民幣五年期循環貸。貸款協議於周一簽署。
    
    在項目抵押前後的利率均為中國人民銀行基準利率的102.5%和100%。
如果借款人每年的稅前收益達到5,000萬元人民幣，則A部分的利率將進一
步降至中國人民銀行基準利率的97.5%。最高前端費為23個基點。

    所得資金將用於為湖北松滋市一家紙廠的資本支出提供融資。
    
    台灣上市母公司榮成紙業榮成紙業提供擔保。(完)

Content_EN:
Reuters, Hong Kong, October 17 - Thomson Reuters base point coverage, sources said Hubei Rong
Regeneration Technology Co.,Ltd. 21 billion yuan of fixed-term loan target, has now been reduced to 1.99 billion
RMB (295 million US dollars).
    
    Initially First Commercial Bank and Taiwan Land Bank as the lead of this transaction and bookkeeper
Taiwan Bank joins later and gives the same title.
    
    The loan is divided into two parts, part A is a 1.7 billion yuan seven-year term loan
And part B 290 million yuan five-year revolving loan. The loan agreement was signed on Monday.
    
    Interest rates before and after the project mortgage are 102.5% and 100% of the benchmark interest rates of the People's Bank of China.
If the borrower's pre-tax income reaches 50 million yuan per annum, the interest rate in Part A will go one
Step down to 97.5% of the benchmark interest rate of the People's Bank of China. The top front fee is 23 basis points.

    The proceeds will be used to finance the capital expenditures of a paper mill in Songzi City, Hubei Province.
    
    Rongcheng Paper, Rongcheng Paper, a listed parent company in Taiwan, provides guarantee. (Finish)

Title: 路透基點：湖北榮成再生科技貸款規模降至19.9億人民幣--TRLPC

Content:
路透香港10月18日 - 湯森路透旗下基點報導，消息人士稱，香港鐵
路公司今年6月簽約的250億港元貸款中，有1-2億港元(1,300-2,600萬美
元)貸款以面值在二級市場待售。
    
    250億港元貸款等額分為A部分三年期定期貸款和B部分五年期循環貸
款。A、B部分貸款利率分別較香港銀行同業拆息(Hibor)加碼54和64個基

MLAB)。在一般銀團階段吸引17家銀行參與後，貸款規模從初始150億港元
上調至250億港元。
    
    標準普爾/穆迪對香港鐵路公司的評級為AAA/Aa1。(完)

Title: 路透基點：香港鐵路公司250億港元貸款中有部分在二級市場待售--TRLPC

Content:
路透香港10月18日 - 湯森路透旗下基點援引消息人士稱，中國互聯網巨頭--騰訊發起的35億美元無追索權貸款，已獲17家銀行承諾參與。這筆貸款將用於支持騰訊收購芬蘭手機遊戲開發商Supercell的多數股權。

    澳新銀行(ANZ/澳盛銀行)、美銀美林、中國銀行、中國招商銀行、德意志銀行、匯豐和上海浦東發展銀行，為這筆融資案的牽頭行兼簿記行(MLAB)以及承銷商，貸款期限五年，分為30億美元定期貸款和5億美元循環貸款。
    
    交通銀行國際金融業務分行(OBU)，中國建設銀行(亞洲)，中國民生銀行北京和香港分行，中國工商銀行(亞洲)和永隆銀行為牽頭行。五家銀行為主辦行，六家承諾參貸的銀行為安排行。
    
    該貸款的最高綜合收益為235.1個基點，利率較倫敦銀行間拆放款利率(Libor)加碼212個基點，貸款平均年限為4.314年。借款人為Inari SARL。
    
    騰訊將透過一全資擁有的財團，以高達86億美元收購Supercell最多84.3%股權，其中包括日本軟銀集團持有的全部72.2%股權。路透在6月中報導稱，這起收購案對Supercell的估值約為102億美元，創下全球最大的遊戲產業併購案之一，也是騰訊最大的一筆收購。
    
    騰訊在香港上市，微信是該公司最為出名的手機應用。穆迪/標普/惠譽給騰訊的評級分別是A2/A/A+。(完)
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選 [nRLP51063a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 孫茉莉; 審校 劉秀紅)
 ((moli.sun@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271057; Reuters
Messaging: moli.sun.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 18 - The Thomson Reuters base point quoted sources as saying that China Internet giant Tencent launched a non-recourse loan of $ 3.5 billion and has been pledged by 17 banks. The loan will be used to support Tencent's acquisition of a majority stake in Finnish mobile game developer Supercell.

    ANZ, ANZ, Bank of America Merrill Lynch, Bank of China, China Merchants Bank, Deutsche Bank, HSBC and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank were the lead lenders and booksellers (MLABs) and underwriters , The loan period of five years, divided into 3 billion US dollars of fixed-term loans and 500 million US dollars revolving loans.
    
    Bank of Communications International Financial Services Branch (OBU), China Construction Bank (Asia), China Minsheng Bank Beijing and Hong Kong Branch, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) and Wing Lung Bank. The five banks are host banks and six banks that promise to participate in the loan arrangements.
    
    The maximum syndicated income of the loan was 235.1 basis points, an increase of 212 basis points above the London Libor rate with an average loan life of 4. 314 years. The borrower is Inari SARL.
    
    Tencent will acquire up to 84.3% of Supercell's shareholding, including a total of 72.2% of the shares held by Japan's Softbank Group, through a wholly-owned consortium for as much as $ 8.6 billion. Reuters in mid-June reported that the acquisition of Supercell's valuation of about 10.2 billion US dollars, setting the world's largest game industry mergers and acquisitions is one of Tencent's largest acquisition.
    
    Tencent listed in Hong Kong, WeChat is the company's most famous mobile application. Moody's / S & P / Fitch give Tencent's rating is A2 / A / A +. (Finish)
    
    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nRLP51063a] to capture browse ****

 (Compiled Sun Jasmine; revisers Liu Xiuhong)
 ((moli.sun@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271057; Reuters
Messaging: moli.sun.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 路透基點：騰訊35億美元貸款案吸引17家銀行參與--TRLPC

Content:
路透上海10月19日 - 在全國中小企業股份轉讓系統（新三板）掛牌的神州優車（838006）近日宣布，擬非公開增發股份融資至多100億元人民幣，投入神州買賣車項目，從而打造國內最大的的線上線下相結合的汽車電商平台。
    
    據神州優車公告稱，本次增發對象不超過35名，發行股票價格區間為50-51元，各認購方以現金認購。公司現有股東將不享有優先認購權。
    
    公司近期召開的股東大會已通過了公司資本公積轉增股本議案，以現有股本每10股轉增20股，除權除息日確定為本周四（20日）。公司預計在完成增發前將發生除權除息事項，會導致增發股份數量和發行價格做相應調整。
    
    此次增發所募的資金，將全部用於神州買賣車業務的發展，主要包括門店建設、市場營銷、員工招募及車輛採購（含新車和準新車）等方面。
    
    相比于傳統渠道和已有的電商平台，神州買賣車受益於公司本身及其關聯方神州租車<0699.HK>等已經形成的線上用戶和流量、以及線下遍布全國的供應商和網絡，從多種渠道（包括廠家、4S店和進口商等）通過大規模採購獲得車源，通過包銷和代銷的形式，將多種車型通過線下門店及網絡直接出售給通過線上導流而來的終端消費者，並全面覆蓋汽車銷售產業鏈上的汽車銷售、供應鏈、汽車後市場等各個環節。
    
    截止8月，神州買賣車已覆蓋102個城市，預計未來三年門店數量將達到300-500家，基本覆蓋全國所有地級市。
    
    在今年7月新三板掛牌前，神州優車已進行了兩輪共計融資約57億元，引入投資者包括雲鋒投資、雲嶺投資、中金公司<3908.HK>、浦發銀行<600000.SS>、上汽<600104.SS>等多家戰略投資者及財務投資者。
    
    神州優車目前主要經營網絡預約出租車業務，此前收盤價為57元。（完）

 (發稿 林琦; 審校 林高麗)
 ((路透中文新聞部:+86-21-61041787;傳真 86-21-61041728 ;qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Shanghai October 19 - UCAR (838,006), which is listed on the National Equities Exchange and Quotations (SME) Share Share (838006), announced recently that it intends to raise up to RMB 10 billion in non-public issuance of shares to invest in Shenzhou Sale and Purchase Vehicles project, The largest online and offline combined car e-commerce platform.
    
    According to Divine excellent car announcement said that this additional object does not exceed 35, the issue price range of shares of 50-51 yuan, each subscribers to subscribe in cash. The existing shareholders of the company will not enjoy the right of first refusal.
    
    The recent shareholders' general meeting of the Company passed the proposal of converting the capital reserve into share capital of the Company. The existing share capital was increased by 20 shares for every 10 shares, and the ex-dividend date was confirmed as Thursday (20th). The Company expects Ex-dividend to occur prior to the completion of the issuance, which will result in a corresponding adjustment in the number of additional shares and issue price.
    
    The funds raised by the issuance will all be used for the development of Shenzhou trading car business, mainly including store construction, marketing, staff recruitment and vehicle procurement (including new cars and quasi-new cars) and so on.
    
    Compared with the traditional channels and existing e-commerce platforms, Shenzhou Sale and Purchase Car has benefited from the online users and traffic already formed such as the company itself and its related parties Shenzhou Car Rental <0699.HK>, as well as suppliers and networks offline all over the country , Through a variety of sources (including manufacturers, 4S shops and importers, etc.) through large-scale procurement of vehicles, through underwriting and consignment form, a variety of models through the offline store and the network directly to the terminal through the on-line diversion Consumers, and comprehensive coverage of the automotive sales industry chain car sales, supply chain, automotive aftermarket and other areas.
    
    As of August, Shenzhou trading car has covered 102 cities, the number of stores is expected to reach 300-500 in the next three years, basically covering all prefecture-level cities in China.
    
    Prior to the listing of the new three-listed board in July this year, UCAR has conducted a total of approximately 5.7 billion yuan in two rounds of financing. Investors include Yunfeng Investment, Yunling Investment, China International Capital Corporation Limited <3908.HK>, Shanghai Pudong Development Bank < 600000.SS>, SAIC <600104.SS> and many other strategic investors and financial investors.
    
    Divine car currently operates a network of major taxi booking business, after the closing price of 57 yuan. (Finish)

 (Press Lin Qi; revising Lin Korea)
 (Reuters Department of Public Information: + 86-21-61041787; Fax 86-21-61041728; qi.lin@thomsonreuters.com; Reuters
Messaging: qi.lin.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))

Title: 台灣股市：觸及逾15個月高位，台積電受外資買盤所助領漲

Content:
路透香港10月20日 - 湯森路透旗下基點援引消息人士報導，華通電腦(惠州)有限公司欲尋求5,000萬美元五年期貸款，該宗貸款緊隨此前3.5億元人民幣(5,300萬美元)五年期融資案之後。
    
    台灣銀行、玉山銀行、遠東國際商業銀行、凱基銀行、台新國際商業銀行以及台北富邦商業銀行是最近一次貸款案的牽頭行兼簿記行。
    
    該筆貸款利率較三個月或六個月倫敦銀行間拆放款利率(Libor)加碼110個基點。若台北美元拆款利率(TAIFX)同Libor利差超過35個基點，則貸款人支付超出部分。
    
    受邀參貸銀行分為三個層級：承貸1,000萬美元或以上，可獲牽頭行兼簿記行頭銜，及18個基點前端費；承貸500萬-990萬美元可獲聯合安排行頭銜與12個基點費用；承貸300萬-499萬美元可獲一般參貸行頭銜，與5個基點費用。回復截止日期為10月21日。
    
    所籌資金將用於再融資和運營資本。
    
    台灣上市的母公司--華通電腦股份有限公司將提供擔保。
    
    借款人上次涉足貸款市場是在2014年3月，獲得3,800萬美元五年期定期貸款。(完)
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選 [nRLP51185a]即可擷取瀏覽****

 (編譯 孫茉莉; 審校 劉秀紅)
 ((moli.sun@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271057; Reuters
Messaging: moli.sun.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters HONG KONG, Oct 20 (Reuters) - Watson Computer (Huizhou) Co.,Ltd.,seeking a $ 50 million five-year loan, followed a threshold of 350 million yuan ($ 53 million) quoted by Thomson Reuters' Five-year financing case later.
    
    Taiwan Bank, Yushan Bank, Far East International Commercial Bank, KGI, Taishin International Commercial Bank and Taipei Fubon Commercial Bank are the lead lenders and bookkeepers of the latest loan case.
    
    The loan rate is 110 basis points above the Libor rate of three months or six months. If TAIFX spreads interest rates in Taipei more than 35 basis points with Libor, the lender pays the excess.
    
    The banks participating in the participating banks are divided into three levels: a loan of 10 million U.S. dollars or more will be awarded the title of "lead bookkeeper" and an 18-point front-end fee; a loan of 5 million to 9.9 million U.S. dollars will be awarded a joint venture title 12 basis points fee; 3 to 4,990,000 US dollars loan contract will be eligible for general credit line title, and 5 basis points fee. The reply deadline is October 21.
    
    The funds raised will be used for refinancing and working capital.
    
    Taiwan-listed parent company - China Computer Co.,Ltd. will provide security.
    
    The last time the borrower entered the loan market was a $ 38 million five-year term loan in March 2014. (Finish)
    
    **** If you want to refer to the original report, please click [nRLP51185a] to capture browsing ****

 (Compiled Sun Jasmine; revisers Liu Xiuhong)
 ((moli.sun@thomsonreuters.com; 86-10-66271057; Reuters
Messaging: moli.sun.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 路透基點：華通電腦返回市場欲尋求5,000萬美元五年期貸款--TRLPC

Content:
* 頭版頭條:
    --中國證監會副主席方星海指出，“十三五”(2016-2020年)期間，要積極支持綠色企業上市融資和再融資；建立和完善上市公司與發債企業強制性環境信息披露制度，以及繼續發展綠色債券市場等，降低綠色企業融資成本，引導機構投資者開展綠色投資。
    
    * 其他: 
    --銀監會辦公廳日前下發通知，允許省級人民政府增設一家地方資產管理公司(AMC)，同時允許地方AMC以債務重組、對外轉讓等方式處置不良資產，對外轉讓的受讓主體不受地域限制。
    --全國中小企業股份轉讓系統掛牌公司股票終止掛牌實施細則（徵求意見稿）日前發布。業內人士表示，建立常態化、市場化的摘牌機制，掛牌企業的違規成本將進一步增加，券商、會計師事務所等督導機構的責任更加重大。
    --北京產權交易所項目信息顯示，中國交建<601800.SS><1800.HK>分別掛牌轉讓佛山廣明高速、重慶四航銅合高速投資等多家高速公路類公司股權，價格合計26.55億元人民幣。(完)

  注：路透並未對以上相關報導進行核實，無法擔保其準確性。

Content_EN:
Headlines:
    - Fang Xinghai, vice chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission, pointed out that during the period of "13th Five-Year Plan" (2016-2020), it is necessary to actively support the listing and financing of green enterprises and refinancing; establish and improve the compulsory environmental information disclosure system for listed companies and issuers , And continue to develop the green bond market to reduce the financing costs of green enterprises and guide institutional investors in green investment.
    
    * Other:
    - The CBRC office recently issued a circular to allow the provincial people's government to set up a new local asset management company (AMC), while allowing local AMCs to dispose of non-performing assets through debt restructuring and external transfer. limit.
    - National SME share transfer system listed companies listed on the implementation details (draft) recently released. Insiders said that the establishment of normalization, market-oriented delisting mechanism, listed companies will further increase the cost of non-compliance, securities companies, accounting firms and other supervisory agencies more serious responsibility.
    - Beijing Equity Exchange project information shows that China Communications Construction <601800.SS> <1800.HK> respectively listed on the transfer of Foshan Guangming Expressway, Chongqing Sihe Copper Copper high-speed investment and many other highway company shares, the total price of 2.655 billion yuan Yuan Renminbi. (Finish)

Title: 《中國報摘》--中國證券報10月24日

Content:
**頭版頭條**
    --占恆生指數<.HSI>27%比重的藍籌股將公布第三季業績，投資界預期在內地經濟數據回穩下，為企業季績構成支持。
    
    **其他**
    --券商瑞信刊發報告給予郵儲銀行<1658.HK>“跑輸大市”評級，以及目標價3.5港元，較目前股價潛在25%跌幅。
    --港股今年交投轉弱，黑池（Dark pool）平台Liquidnet表示，公司今年生意較去年跌逾10%，但已優於整體市場同期交投下跌45%。
    --建滔化工<0148.HK>宣布擬斥2.71億英鎊收購位於英國倫敦的商業大廈，冀加強集團租金收入的能力。（完）
    
    注：以上的評論僅為摘要，並且不代表路透立場。

Title: 《香港報摘》--經濟日報10月24日

Content:
**頭版頭條**
    --受颱風影響而延遲開售、由麗新發展<0488.HK>與帝國集團聯合發展的將軍澳新盤藍塘傲入市氣氛仍熱烈，市場消息指全日售出逾180伙單位，占首批可售單位總數約76%。
    
    **其他**
    --消息指年底前或有近20只交易所買賣基金（ETF）申請退市，占總數約一成，增加了ETF互聯互通的難度。
    --就證監會及港交所<0388.HK>提出的上市監管及決策架構改革諮詢，業界向申訴專員公署舉報，投訴證監會高層在諮詢期內向業界施壓，屬於“濫權”，有機會迫使證監會檢討決定。
    --花旗銀行（香港）將於明年起調整多項服務收費，其中Citibanking客戶如經非網上渠道進行本地跨行轉賬，每次收費250港元，較目前180港元增加近39%；同時，該行亦取消多項收費的豁免。（完）
    
    注：以上的評論僅為摘要，並且不代表路透立場。

Content_EN:
** Headlines **
    - delayed sale due to typhoon and development by Lai Sun <0488.HK> Tseung Kwan O new developments jointly developed with the Empire Group The atmosphere of the Blue Pool is still booming. Market news indicates that more than 180 units were sold on a day-to-day basis The total number of salable units is about 76%.
    
    **other**
    - News that before the end of the year or nearly 20 exchange traded funds (ETFs) to apply for delisting, accounting for about 10% of the total, increasing the difficulty of ETF interoperability.
    - Regarding the listing supervision and decision-making structural reform consultation put forward by the SFC and HKEx <0388.HK>, the industry reported to the Office of The Ombudsman Complaints Complaints to the top of the SFC exerting pressure on the industry during the consultation period were "abuse of power" and The opportunity to force the SFC to review the decision.
    - Citibank Hong Kong will adjust a number of service charges starting next year. Citibank customers will be charged HK $ 250 for each non-online channel, an increase of nearly 39% over the current level of HK $ 180. Meanwhile, Cancel multiple exemptions. (Finish)

Title: 《香港報摘》--信報10月24日

Content:
**明報**
    --香港地產龍頭髮展商長實<1113.HK>認為，香港法制完善，豪宅對中國內地客仍具吸引力，料內地客整體入市比例維持10%至15%，但個別豪宅可逾20%。
    --理文造紙<2314.HK>首席執行官李文斌稱，早在人民幣一年前開始貶值，公司已採取應對措施，包括調整債務結構，加上用美元及歐元作海外採購，交易貨幣及資產多元化令公司對人民幣匯價的敏感度較低，故受人民幣貶值的影響也沒同行嚴重。
    
    **星島日報**
    --經營快速時裝UNIQLO的迅銷<6288.HK>大中華區行政總裁潘寧稱，公司在大中華區發展空間最大，現時一線城市有超過150間UNIQLO店，日後將加快拓展二、三線城市，期望在2020年達到1,000家店。
    --外資投行人士指出，以前大型新股由外資大行包攬，但隨著愈來愈多中資投行加入競爭且為求增加市占率不惜降價爭生意，加上大型新股數量又不多，導致投行減價的壓力有增無減。
    
    **東方日報**
    --市場消息透露，證監會近期與多個業界組織會面，就網上銷售產品的合適性規定的初步建議，收集他們的意見，並計劃在今年稍後時間發出指引或公眾諮詢文件。
    --九興控股<1836.HK>及達芙妮國際<0210.HK>第三季同店銷售仍未擺脫負增長，其中制鞋出身的九興宣布重組內地零售業務，冀減低成本改善盈利。
    
    **文匯報**
    --長和集團<0001.HK>旗下百佳超級市場南區營運總監李軒宇表示，為拓展內地中高級市場，百佳將繼續把深圳、廣州和珠海的部分門店升級為TASTE，並與多家地產開發商合作積極在華南地區開設更多新店。（完）
    
    注：以上的評論僅為摘要，並且不代表路透立場。
    
    **如欲提取相關新聞，請點擊下列代碼**

      中國報摘[PRESS-CN-CMN]
      台灣報摘[PRESS-TW-CMN]
    

 (整理 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
**Ming Pao**
    --Hong Kong's leading real estate developer, Commander Cheung Kong <1113.HK> believes that the legal system in Hong Kong is perfect and mansions are still attractive to mainland Chinese. The proportion of mainland tourists entering the market as a whole is expected to remain 10% to 15% but individual mansions may exceed 20% .
    - Li Wen Paper <2314.HK> Chief Executive Wen-Bin Lee said that as early as a year ago devaluation, the company has taken measures to deal with, including the adjustment of the debt structure, coupled with the dollar and the euro for overseas purchases, trading currencies and assets Diversification of the company's sensitivity to the RMB exchange rate is low, so the impact of the devaluation of the RMB nor serious counterparts.
    
    ** Sing Tao Daily **
    - Fast Retailing by UNIQLO <6288.HK> Greater China Chief Executive Penning said the company has the largest space for growth in Greater China. At present, there are over 150 UNIQLO stores in the first-tier cities and will be expanded in the second and third tier cities in the future , Expect to reach 1,000 stores by 2020.
    - Foreign investment bank officials pointed out that in the past large-scale foreign investment was swept by foreign investors, but as more Chinese-funded investment banks joined the competition in order to increase market share at a price to compete for business, coupled with the large number of large new shares, resulting in The pressure on investment banks to increase prices unabated.
    
    ** Oriental Daily News **
    - According to market sources, the SFC has recently met with a number of industry organizations to collect their opinions on the preliminary proposals on the suitability of online sales of products and plans to issue guidelines or public consultation documents later this year.
    --Joy Hing Holdings <1836.HK> and Daphne International <0210.HK> Same-store same-store sales in Q3 have not yet out of negative territory. Among them, the shoe-making Jiuxing Group announced the restructuring of its retail business in the Mainland in order to reduce costs and improve profitability.
    
    ** Wen Wei Po **
    --Li Xuan Yu, Chief Operating Officer of PARKnSHOP South Zone, the subsidiary of Changhe Group <0001.HK>, said that in order to expand the mid- and high-end markets in the Mainland, PARKnSHOP will continue to upgrade some stores in Shenzhen, Guangzhou and Zhuhai to TASTE and will collaborate with many Real estate developers to actively cooperate in southern China to open more new stores. (Finish)

Title: 《香港報摘》--其他報紙重要消息10月24日

Content:
路透香港10月24日 - 中國汽車生產商比亞迪<1211.HK><002594.SZ>周一稱，將與青海鹽湖<000792.SZ>成立一間合資公司，以啟動3萬噸碳酸鋰（鋰電池原材料）項目建設。
    
    據中午在聯交所的公告，比亞迪與青海鹽湖、深圳市卓域成投資擬共同投資設立新公司--青海鹽湖比亞迪資源開發有限公司進行鋰資源的開發，產品包括碳酸鋰和氫氧化鋰，三方分別占合資公司49%、49.5%及1.5%股權，投資規模為5億元人民幣。
    
    比亞迪表示，合資公司成立後，將啟動3萬噸碳酸鋰項目建設。公司並指出，與青海鹽湖的戰略合作將有助推動公司的技術、管理、銷售網絡尤其是在動力鋰電池等方面的優勢。
    
    香港時間14:06，比亞迪H股升2.33%，報52.6港元；A股升1.03%，報57.09元。（完）
    
    欲瀏覽于香港聯交所的聲明，請點選：(http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/SEHK/2016/1024/LTN20161024185_C.pdf)

 (記者 雷美珍；審校 喬艷紅)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, Oct 24 - Chinese auto maker BYD said on Monday it would set up a joint venture with Qinghai Salt Lake <000792.SZ> to launch 30,000 tons of lithium carbonate Raw materials) project construction.
    
    According to the announcement of Noon on the Stock Exchange, BYD, Qinghai Salt Lake and Shenzhen Zhuoyucheng Investment intend to jointly establish a new company, Qinghai Salt Lake BYD Resources Development Co.,Ltd.,to develop lithium resources. Products include lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide, The three parties accounted for 49%, 49.5% and 1.5% respectively of the joint venture, with a total investment of RMB500 million.
    
    BYD said that after the establishment of the joint venture, it will start the construction of 30,000 tons of lithium carbonate project. The company also pointed out that the strategic cooperation with Qinghai Salt Lake will help promote the company's technology, management, sales network, especially in power lithium batteries and other advantages.
    
    Hong Kong time 14:06, BYD H shares rose 2.33% to 52.6 Hong Kong dollars; A shares rose 1.03% to 57.09 yuan. (Finish)
    
    To view the announcement on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, please click: (http://www.hkexnews.hk/listedco/listconews/SEHK/2016/1024/LTN20161024185_E.pdf)

 (Reporter Lei Meizhen; review Qiao Yanhong)
 ((alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6552; Reuters
Messaging: alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 中港個股：比亞迪與青海鹽湖成立合資公司，啟動3萬噸碳酸鋰項目建設

Content:
路透香港10月24日 - 香港交易及結算所（港交所）<0388.HK>周一稱，擬將目前證券市場的市場波動調節機制擴大至衍生產品市場，將於11月14日實施。
    
    證券市場的市調機制已在今年8月22日實施。該機制防止因重大交易錯誤或其他異常事件而引發的極端價格波動，以維護市場的正常秩序。

    衍生產品市場的市調機制僅適用於恆生指數期貨、小型恆生指數期貨、恆生國企指數期貨、小型恆生國企指數期貨的現月及下月合約。
    
    港交所市場主管李國強表示，當相關股份出現價格大幅異常波動時，市場參與者有機會重新評估其策略及持倉情況，有助市場重新恢復正常秩序。
    
    �市調機制並非用作限制正常市況中的股價波動，而是為了避免市場因為重大交易事故而出現極端價格波動，市場參與者無需擔心市調機制會頻繁發生，惟他們買賣時應繼續小心謹慎。�他補充說。

    當市調機制涵蓋合約的即將成交價超出參考價，即5分鐘前最後一次交易價格的±5%，即觸發5分鐘冷靜期，屆時有關合約只可在指定價格範圍內交易。
        
    每張合約在每節交易時段（早市和午市）最多只會觸發一次冷靜期，冷靜期不適用於開市前議價時段（上午8時45分至9時15分及中午12時30分至下午1時）、收市後期貨交易時段（下午5時15分至11時45分）、早市及午市交易時段的首15分鐘（上午9時15分至9時30分以及下午1時至1時15分）及午市交易時段的最後15分鐘（下午4時15分至4時30分），以免妨礙價格發現。

    20國集團及國際證券事務監察委員會組織曾經發出監管指引，要求各大市場設立相關機制以應對波動市況產生的系統性風險。港交所根據指引建議推出市調機制，並向市場諮詢意見。諮詢結果顯示市場普遍支持建議，香港交易所因此決定推出市調機制。（完）

 (記者 梁慧儀; 審校 曾祥進)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; +852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters Hong Kong, October 24 - Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEx) said on Monday it planned to extend the current market-based market volatility adjustment mechanism to the derivatives market on November 14.
    
    The market mechanism of the stock market has been implemented on August 22 this year. The mechanism prevents extreme price fluctuations caused by major trading mistakes or other unusual events in order to maintain the normal order of the market.

    The market adjustment mechanism for derivatives markets only applies to the current month and next month contracts for Hang Seng Index Futures, Mini Hang Seng Index Futures, Hang Seng China Enterprises Index Futures and Mini Hang Seng China Enterprises Index Futures.
    
    Li Guoqiang, head of HKEx's market exchange, said market participants had the opportunity to reassess their strategies and positions when the price of the underlying shares fluctuated significantly, helping the market regain its normal order.
    
    Instead of limiting the fluctuation of stock prices in normal market conditions, the market adjustment mechanism is designed to avoid extreme price fluctuations in the market due to major trading accidents. The market participants need not worry about the frequent occurrence of market adjustment mechanisms. However, they should exercise caution when trading .   He added.

    When the market price of the contract covered by the market adjustment mechanism exceeds the reference price by 5% of the last trading price 5 minutes ago, the 5-minute cooling-off period will trigger a contract that can only be traded within the specified price range.
        
    Each contract will only trigger a maximum of one cool-off period at each trading session (morning and afternoon session). The cooling-off period does not apply to the pre-opening bargaining session (8:45 am to 9:15 am and 12:30 pm to 1:00 pm), the closing trading hours (5:15 pm to 11:45 pm), the first 15 minutes of morning and afternoon trading hours (9:15 am to 9:30 am and 1 pm to 1:15) and the last 15 minutes of the afternoon trading session (4:15 p.m. and 4:30 p.m.) so as not to hinder price discovery.

    The G-20 and the International Organization of Securities Commissions have issued regulatory guidelines that require major markets to set up mechanisms to deal with systemic risks arising from volatile market conditions. HKEx proposes to introduce a market adjustment mechanism according to the guidelines and advise the market. As a result of the consultation, which generally supported the proposal, Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited decided to introduce a market adjustment mechanism. (Finish)

 (Reporter Liang Huiyi; revisers Zeng Xiang)
 ((joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com; + 852-2843 6386; Reuters Messaging:
joy.leung.reuters.com@reuters.net))
Title: 香港股市：市場波動調節機制下月14日擴至衍生產品市場--港交所

Content:
路透新加坡10月24日 - 中國最大上市鋼企寶鋼股份<600019.SS>周一發布，今年前九個月淨利潤同比增長逾一倍，因去產能，鋼鐵行業供應過剩狀況出現改善跡象。

　　中國鋼鐵行業領頭羊寶鋼股份的季報顯示，1-9月的淨利潤比去年同期增長148.3%，至56億元人民幣(8.2706億美元)。
    
    寶鋼股份在上海證交所發布公告稱，“三季度，鋼鐵市場整體表現活躍，鋼鐵價格較二季度有所回升，但鋼鐵行業供大於求的態勢並沒有改變。”
    
    預計其它鋼鐵企業利潤也有所提高。
    
    周六新華社援引國有資產監督委員會官員報導稱，寶鋼與武鋼已經提前完成今年去產能任務。
    
    中國政府計劃在未來五年減少約1-1.5億噸的鋼鐵產量。
    
    去年，中國鋼鐵產量自1981年以來首次下降，因中國經濟以25年來最慢速度增長，鋼鐵企業對國內需求下滑作出反應。(完)    
    
    ****如欲參考原文報導，請點選[nL8N1CU3ZX]即可擷取瀏覽****  
    

 (編譯 劉靜；審校 母紅)
 ((REBECCA.LIU@thomsonreuters.com; 4169418108; Reuters
Messaging: rebecca.liu.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net))
Content_EN:
Reuters SINGAPORE, Oct 24 - China's largest steelmaker, Baosteel Co.,Ltd. (600019.SS), said on Monday that net profit in the first nine months of this year more than doubled from the same period of the previous year as signs of improvement were seen in the over-supply situation in the steel industry.

Quarterly results from Baosteel, China's steel industry leader, showed net profit for January-September increased 148.3% to 5.6 billion yuan (8.2706 billion U.S. dollars) from a year earlier.
    
    Baosteel Co.,Ltd. announced on the Shanghai Stock Exchange that "in the third quarter, the steel market as a whole had an active performance and the steel prices rebounded from the second quarter. However, the oversupply situation of the steel industry has not changed."
    
    The profits of other steel companies are also expected to increase.
    
    Xinhua News Agency quoted officials of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission as saying on Saturday that Baosteel and WISCO completed their capacity-building tasks this year ahead of schedule.
    
    The Chinese government plans to reduce its steel output by about 1 to 150 million tons in the next five years.
    
    Last year, China's steel output declined for the first time since 1981, as the Chinese economy grew at the slowest pace in 25 years and steelmakers reacted to the slump in domestic demand. (Finish)
